response_from_owner_text: Hi David, Thank you for your kind words. George is a wonderful addition to the Visions Electronics family, full of great advice and a burning desire to save our valued guests as much of their hard-earned dollars as possible. Thank you for the business. We look forward to your next visit. --Visions Social Media Team

review_text: I highly recommend this place. My boyfriend and I were looking for an 8K TV and a washer & dryer. We were shopping here during Boxing Week and what I really liked is that all their prices either matched or were lower than Best Buys on the exact same items, which made me trust making my purchases from here. Rhythm and his team spent lots of time with us to help us make the most informed decisions and scheduled delivery and installation for us too. Everything arrived on time and the installers they sent over were also very professional and patient. They were very careful with our items and tested everything to ensure we were happy with our new purchases.
Sarbjit is an amazing employee! She is always super helpful and always has a smile on her face. I look forward to meeting her every time I come to get groceries. She really is awesome!
Staff is always pleasant. Good variety of fruits and vegetables at affordable prices.
I had a problem with cards while paying at the cashier but the manager , staff, owner were so accommodating in every possible way. Such a humble people.
I loved the Ashoka Asli parathas.They are so good that they convert  ordinary  meal time into a celebration.
Good for all Indian groceries, you ll find everything here
The perfect place to find any indian stuff.

Ms. Sarabjit Kaur, on the cash counter is submissive, kind hearted and instant ready to help every customer. Sometimes, I am facing hard time to locate any item, my first preference is always for her to ask. She always relying with smiling face.
What happened to your limca stock?      I walked 25 mins one way (50 min total) for my limca fix and there was none!!  please bring it back ty

Fruiticana is my go-to independent grocer. I live about 15 minutes away, so its a short, pleasant stroll. It has just about all the basic and essential produce I need, and at prices far lower than other grocers Ive frequented in the past. There are lots of small independent groceries around Fraser between 45th and 49th, but Fruiticana is definitely the best.
Excellent selection of Indian spices. Great weekly specials and fresh produce.
Fresh and cheap veggies and fruits. Much higher quality than the surrounding discount grocers and much cheaper than Buy Low.

I really enjoy at there and there staff members are very co-operative and joyful nature specially sarbjeet, manpreet and loveneet kaur. If I say that it could be one of my best experience at there from last 2 years.  I wanna to go there again ASAP.
Good choice, many kind of products, very low price for some goods
Good quality foods with reasonable price. Mostly asian (indian) foods, but also good option for Bangladeshi who is looking for vegetables and other deshi foods.
This is the best grocery store in Vancouver. They have everything, especially, all the good herbs, spices and unique foods from Asia. I highly recommended it to everyone. Thank you
It is one of the best Indian store in Vancouver, BC. You get parle g biscuits, indian spices like MDH, all veggies and fruits, Indian ghee, yogurt and many more stuff.

Indian music, myriad Indian products well organized and easy to find on shelves and such a large variety of bulk items. Staff were helpful despite the place being so packed. All kinds of spices, Ill definitely come back as Im really interested in Indian cuisine! The special sales were totally worth it too
Good Indian collection. Wife and I go here often.
I needed to buy sugar and salt right on Christmas day when all other stores were closed Fruitica fulfilled my needs. Amazingly, wonderful! Thanks. Blessings.
Great place for Indian groceries!!

Came here especially today to use my Patty Pass and tried the Veggie Deluxe Burger with cheese. It was sooo good. The sauce was the best part. I also have to comment on the prices. Its so affordable. Half the price of most places nowadays. A can of beer is 3.75! My burger (no sides) was 6.75. Unheard of these days! The service was fast and friendly. When I walked in I was the only customer but shortly after it filled up. Ill definitely be back when Im in the area!

This was a neat hole in the wall burger joint. They had some younger kids running the place and they were very professional and delivered a good product. Fantastic to see. The actual taste was reminiscent of a good bbq cookout burger. We had milkshakes and thoroughly enjoyed those too!
Great portion of fries and a great older atmosphere! The burgers are also tasty.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Martin.

review_text: They have a vastly large menu to choose from that is prominently posted on the wall as you come in. Everything is fairly well priced, if not cheaper, for the quality of the food. The front staff are friendly and welcoming. The store space is quite small, so its more so a place to get something to go rather than eat in, but they do have some tables and stools as well. Plenty of free parking as they are located within a shopping plaza. The wally burger I got was delicious and I would recommend.

The staff were kind and friendly. Burger was fantastic . I tried the ring tangler and thoroughly enjoyed it. The fry portion was generous , and salty ! Overall a nice place to stop for lunch if you have a few more minutes than fast food.
response_from_owner_text: thanks Ev we appreciate your kindness

review_text: Awesome little burger joint! We love this place! Located in a small strip mall so decent parking.  Accessible, not many tables though. A big menu! Very tasty, fresh food every single time! The staff are consistently friendly, helpful and down to Earth. We look forward to visiting again and again! Parking: Small but free parking lot Kid-friendliness: Perfect place for kids! Wheelchair accessibility: Accessible parking, entrance and seating.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Shannon that is very nice of you to say. We are fortunate to have such great friendly staff and great customers like you.

review_text: August 14 2021 My friend brought me here during work and ai was immediately amazed and addicted. Came back today to satisfy a long waited craving of the absolute best burgers in town. They taste homemade and created with love and affection. I hear they have been around for a quarter century and I do not see them going anywhere soon, only expanding to distant lands. Thank you for making our day and tickling my taste buds while drooling during each bite. This is what a burger tastes like. If you live far away from one of their locations, make the trip down and you will not be disappointed. Ive read some of the negative reviews and they are bullshivic. The food experience speaks for itself. Even if they screwed up my order or the girl today was mean to me I would still come back for the food. Im not sure whats in their food but its messing with my dopamine uptake. It must the the love. Ps. Not sure what happened to my original post but hopefully this one is similar. Great job team. Youll be seeing more of me until I try everything. And yes, I have thanked my colleague, he is one special guy. Cheers.
response_from_owner_text: Wow thanks so much for your kind words and thank your friend for introducing you to us. We can accommodate you by serving your burger on a bed of lettuce next time if that s what you want.

review_text: Last time I went into a Wallys was when I was a wee lad back in a time where ipods used cassettes and Wallys was across Norquay Park. Ive decided to pick up lunch here after my usual go to was closed, and Im glad I made that decision. I was greeted by a kind Cashier in a storefront filled with grumbling impatient patrons waiting for their orders, her unwavering cheerful attitude was definitely the highlight of the whole experience and the wait wasnt terribly long (15 minutes). The place is usually packed during lunch time and while there is a big parking lot in the complex it gets quite busy making it difficult to navigate in and out. Their burgers were much more better than I had last remembered, not greasy and it had the home style charred flavour. Their Milkshake is still as top notch as ever. They are very generous with the fries, the amount that comes in one combo was enough for two people, the fries were very crunchy and not greasy at all. Definitely one of the better burger joints out there and definitely a must try milkshake place Ive always walked past this storefront but now I will definitely come back to fulfill my burger cravings
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mark. Hope you become a regular with us

review_text: The old school burger joint reminiscent of when I was a kid. Special kinds of burger buns here, which are a USP since the store opened in 1958. I had the beer fries and burger combo. Tasted like good childhood memories. Parking: Parking in the 88 supermarket lot is easy.
You have to try the deep fried pickles with the Wally sauce!! ... thats all Ive had from here but they were amazing
Burgers like they were meant to be. Deluxe Chuckwagon is unreal. Onion rings like you remember. If you want that old school burger experience this is your place.
I used to always love coming to this place growing up. My uncle who has now passed used to love this place and its been in our family for some time as well. Cant wait to visit again!

This place is the epitome of a greasy spoon/hole in the wall. If you dont know then you might not even see it as you drive by, but if you do know... Oh boy. Youre in for a treat! I love a good burger. Not a fancy burger with all the fixings hiding a bad burger underneath. This place will make you a good burger, AND theyll put exactly the fixings you want on it. The fries are so good too. I think theyre shoestring style? My friends also raved about the milkshakes, of which they have a truly amazing number of flavours. Would recommend.
response_from_owner_text: Noal were blushing from your kind words. We appreciate when customers rave about our burgers, thanks. Our fries are made in house from fresh hand cut kennebec potatoes and wed say they are between a shoestring and a thick cut and were so happy you think theyre so good. Thanks for the recommendation and we hope to see you again soon.

review_text: These are the burgers of my childhood. My parents used to take me to the one on Kingsway when I was a kid and even though I dont remember what the burgers tasted like, I knew I loved them. When I found out that there was still a restaurant in Vancouver, I had to go. Unfortunately, during Covid, the seating wasnt available which meant I needed to takeout. I dont live nearby and it was too hot to sit outside or in my car, so I had to take it home. But even at room temperature, everything was delicious. Fresh and flavourful. I cant wait to go again!

I wanted to try out the new Wally since I was a fan of the old Wally on Kingsway. Ill give the burger a 5 star, but 4 overall. The burger was packed with flavor and reminds me of the old Wally. The fries are not the old McCain fries which I personally like, but I dont blame them for switching to hand cut fries as majority of people like those better. The only drawback is the location. Tight and crowded parking welcomes you. The restaurant is tiny, but cute. I really just came to try the burger and it is didnt disappointed.
response_from_owner_text: thanks we appreciate your business

review_text: Little hole in the wall burger joint that serves up  greasy, messy, old school burgers. Great variety of burgers, all day breakfast and hot dogs. Fries are awesome. Milkshakes are delicious. Really friendly good service. Highly recommend.
great burgers. may not be fast but good food takes time.
Great burgers, reasonably priced Amazing milkshakes and Service Food
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mike.

review_text: Classic Vancouver burger joint. Love the greasy spoon look and taste. When one feels in the mood for that this is the place to be.

This place makes great burgers and shakes. The menu is pretty large considering that the physical space isnt huge. They also tend to hire people who havent had a lot of work experience, which is great for the community, so have patience and know that you might have to double-check your order, but its worth it.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks David we appreciate your kind words.

review_text: Unreal milkshakes and best burger joint in Vancouver! Not to mention how many fries you get every time with your order!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Ryan we appreciate your support. Our fry serving is approximately 1/2 lb so theres always lots to share.

review_text: The food is excellent. Burgers are classic, and the milkshakes are so good. The only thing is this place is closed more often than any other restaurant I think I ve seen. What restaurant closes on a Sunday lol? At least they extended their weekday hours from 5pm to 7pm. I will continue to support this place because I ve never had a bad experience with the burgers. They really do an excellent job. And the price is right too!
response_from_owner_text: Hey Justin thanks for the feedback we appreciate it. Us, like many restaurants are being effected by a lack of available qualified labour at this current time which limits our ability to operate at full capacity. We hope this will change in the near future but until then we will maintain our current hours of operation.

review_text: Listen, Im not going to sit here and bs and tell you these are the best artisanal burgers in town. But if you spent your youth in hockey rinks and side shack stopovers on the way home from a baseball game, these burgers will taste like love to you.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Rory we appreciate your kindness.

review_text: Great food and shakes when i was 10, still amazing food at 30!
So far, the best burger in town. Real meat! Real fries    ! Wagon bun  %. Worth every single penny!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you

review_text: A little piece of a Diner. Great burgers, plus they have beer  .

This is the place for my weekly fix for a real burger.  It is very reasonable priced yet the food is 100 times better than your McD, if you consider McD burger is a burger.  Also the cashiers are always fast and friendly and well-trained Vegetarian options: Try the mushroom burger, you will be in for a tasty surprise Parking: It is next to the plaza of 88 supermarket, so most of the time, you would find a space within 1 min
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Karen we appreciate your support and kind words

review_text: Good price, good service, good food . Came in 20 minutes to closing and ordered the Deluxe Bacon Cheese meal and a strawberry shake. As expected the burger was fantastic. The fries were also great, however I do wish they were a little longer as it seemed like I got a bunch of half fries. The shake was also delicious.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks we re glad you enjoyed. We hand cut the fries everyday and unfortunately sometimes the potatoes are smaller than we d like too.

review_text: I take my son here for milk shakes n fries Their deep fried pickles are top notch. Great prices! Recommended dishes Hot Shot Burger with Cheese Bacon and Jalapenos, Fries, Burger

First time here, had a craving for a burger and came here to satisfy it. This is a classic style small town feel burger joint, milkshakes and all. If textures are your thing, than you came to the right place, I have no idea how they cook the fries, but they nailed it, soft on the inside, crunchy on the outside, the bun on the burger is soft and has an almost creamy feel in your mouth. Flavours were on point as well, I will be back for more.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Michael glad you enjoyed

review_text: This place is absolutely wonderful. The staff is always so friendly and accommodating. The food is just plain delightful! Best burger joint around hands down! The inside is not the prettiest to look at and the parking lot can sometimes be a nightmare, but the food makes it all so very worth it. Seriously, if you have ever thought of trying this place but havent gone in yet, DO IT, you will not regret it.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for the kind words.

review_text: One of the best burgers in the city. Great selection, really tasty, lots of options to choose from. The milkshakes were great too! Definitely be back!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Dear, we appreciate your kind words

review_text: Delicious burgers that are juicy and old school. It can get messy, but its worth every bite and every calorie. Wish I discovered this place sooner. They have a multitude of milkshake flavours. Peach is my favourite though. Will definitely go to Wallys whenever Im craving a burger.

No other burger shop in the lower mainland serves better burgers than Wallys Burgers, which serves authentic homemade burgers at a decent price. Favorites include the Wally loaded & the Wally works with chipotle mayo for the fries. Note. There is nothing better than a good burger in its messy form. Wallys burgers are straight-up delicious

Today was first time we orderd here. Our food was $40 worth and it was hot flaming well seasoned and juicy served with crusty buns. Also ordered the English Toffee milkshake and it was creamy and the tempreture is perfectly chilled. It was definitely worth $40. Annie the cashier was very knowledgeable of  all the burgers and Sue the manager is very aproachable and friendly. This place definitely has a good vibe and respectful crew! Props!!!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Charlie we appreciate it

review_text: SEPT 2019 Still a great burger but starting to get pricy. MARCH 2019   go to Wally Burgers on a regular basis.  Went again today.  One of the best.  Burger was juicy and done to perfection.  Fries were crispy and tasty. Staff went overboard to correct a slight error in order.  Very customer oriented and the pricing is reasonable for the quality of the product.  Definately recommend a visit if you love burgers. 2018, Still a bit of the 50s atmosphere.  Tried the deluxe Wally burger special deal at two for $5.00.  As I love my burgers, nothing outstanding have had better.  Fries were well done crispy, not greasy.  Onion rings were done the way I like them as they too were crispy.  For the price its a good deal but not as outstanding as when they were on Kingsway.

I d like to think I m a cheeseburger connoisseur and I ve been all over Vancouver... this is by far the best I ve had. Just a simple burger made to perfection. House sauce is fantastic and the classic buns are perfect. The fries were on point! Hand spun Root beer milkshake is a classic to wash it down!

I do not know what words I have for this restaurant. This restaurants food is beyond excelling, their service is amazing. I fail to see any imperfections in this restaurant. Their burgers are juicy, fries are perfectly cooked, and prices are reasonable. I feel that this restaurant would be the best burger joint in Vancouver. Its placement is not that great, as its in a far corner of a strip mall, but dont give up on finding it. Itll be worth the search. Their shakes are good, but may not be the best in Vancouver.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the kind words.

review_text: I like it, I like it, I like it! If its retro smash burgers from the drive-in era that you enjoy, this is the place. Although it isn t a drive-in, the nostalgic feel and look of this place will be enough. Hidden amongst the stores of the strip mall plaza, here you will find savoury burgers from the time when they were simple and made with a  secret sauce . We ordered two    Hotshots  (basically a bacon burger with jalapeno peppers). The burger was juicy with a great char from the flat top grill. I could have had two, or combo ed it to fill up, but it was a great morsul that we will order, eat, enjoy and repeat in the near future; maybe next time with a good looking milkshake
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Todd. We really appreciate your support and kind words. We hope to see you again really soon.

review_text: The quintessential burger, done right in every way. Patty is juicy and full of flavor. Its the first burger my wife has ever said shes loved! Ive been looking for this burger for 2 years ever since I moved to Vancouver and finally found it.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Derryck we appreciate it

review_text: Fries are nice and salty, bother is perfectly seasoned and perfectly messy, as it should be! The portions are VERY reasonable and I like that they offer chicken burgers too. Salted caramel milkshake is off-the-walls delicious.
response_from_owner_text: thanks Charles we appreciate your feedback

review_text: Read the reviews and was skeptical but finally got around to trying them. Best burgers Ive had in the lower mainland hands down. Bit messy to eat, but what good burger isnt?
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Yi glad you enjoyed it. We recommend lots of napkins at the ready.

review_text: Amazing burgers! Poutine was fantastic. Staff is all super friendly and everything came fast and very fresh. Also super clean in there. Love this place!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Kaity we appreciate your kind words and support

review_text: Double chuckwagon with cheese  and an orange milkshake. Best lunch ever. A hidden gem in Vancouver, the girl behind the counter is super nice. Keep the napkins handy its one juicy burger  .

Oh man what a good Halibut Burger!!! Wallys has amazing burgers, and their fries arent too bad either. Tried the new to the menu Halibut Burger. It was really good. Not greasy, but a thin and crunchy batter.  My partner had the Chuck wagon burger that was huge, and we did share fries, because the portions are pretty substantial. Our meals arrived quickly, and everything was piping hot. The parking structure is large, but so busy. There was alot of Handicap parking available,  thoughout the lot. Im picky however about parking my car in the lot, as i do have a preference to dent free doors. Wallys is definitely Handicap accessible,  and they have table able to accommodate wheelchairs if needed. The staff were all very nice & presented themselves well. All were willing to engage in conversation with us, and when we left the restaurant we were bid farewell, and thanked for our business.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you. We appreciate your kind words

review_text: Love this restaurant! The food is amazing and there are a lot of choices. The staff are extremely friendly and helpful.

Awesome to find this gem. I had thought this place was permanently erased from my childhood when I had learned that the restaurant on kingsway was shutting its doors forever. I ordered 2 wally burgers and a chocolate milkshake and it had brought back memories of sitting outside of the original restaurant on a summers day on kingsway. I have to admit it was very close to what I had over 10 years ago. The bun was toasted nicely and had a generous amount of sauce. The onions felt like it hasnt changed at all. It still had that strong onion flavor with every bite I took. The seasoning felt pretty close to what I remembered. As for the milkshake, maybe the  old Asian woman that prepared it back then gave me an extra shot of chocolate or icecream, but the shake that was served was perfect enough. The staff are super friendly and the prices are reasonable. This location is located in a strip mall so parking is available and free. I knew that the food couldnt be duplicated from my childhood years but this came damn close and Im so glad to see its doors open again.

Very nostalgic for me. I love Wallys Chuck wagon deluxe burger with a banana milkshake! Brings back many memories of eating here as a child (back in the day when it was on Kingsway). I highly recommend stopping by for a taste of Vancouver history! This location is new, but the menu goes back to my parents time. And the food is fantastic! You wont find a better burger around. I wish they had more locations

The Halibut Burger is so so so so good, everything you hoped for in a Filet-o-Fish. The poutine is a must, and for smaller appetites a regular Wally burger will suffice. I think this might be home to the original smash burger, every patty is grilled to crispy perfection with quality tasting beef.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you, we appreciate your support and kind words

review_text: Eating the fries and burgers was like tasting heaven

This is our review based on our visit Thursday, July 16, 2020 (order in person and take out). First, a shoutout to front staff and all the frontline workers braving their souls to deal with the public mass and risking their lives during this pandemic. As we continue on with the new normal and unfortunate spike during last week, it is expected that we all want transparency.  Do staff wear masks?  On my day of my order, no.  I was shocked the 2 staff members that I saw  at the back do not wear masks at all.  I understand that people now want to know if staff members are wearing masks or not (especially cooks) so here is your answer.  It doesnt affect my rating though.  But I sincerely would have hoped the cook staff would wear one though.  Also, I hope they would add on another plexiglass  for the front counter so the cashier wont have to be that exposed to outsiders for health and safety reasons. It only has half a side so when she takes your orders, she will still have be on the side with no plexiglass and I felt bad for her.  Again, it all comes back to safety at this day and time and when staff are safe and healthy, we are healthy (and vice versa).  Hopefully, they would move on to online ordering so we can order, pay online and pick up.  Otherwise, you will have to order in-person and take out.  The wait for your food isnt long either even when I was a part of a wait (customers ahead of me) so its just as fast as McDonalds.  As customers, I also notice other customers are socially distancing too (of course, you would get an  odd ball that seem to not know what is going on in the world and would try to be very close to you, SMH).   Otherwise, burgers are flavourful (not to a point where its so salty that you cant even eat it).  Onion rings are to die so you may want to order more.

Best burger shack ever the staff always have a huge smile when working and go above and beyond in general customer satisfaction. What I like most is that they put in the effort to get to know you like your a distant relative they haven t seen for years kinda level.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks T for the kind words. We thank you for choosing us and we always want all customers to feel welcome and appreciated. Hope to see you again soon.

review_text: Amazing service, everyone is so sweet every time I come. Plus, the burgers are fantastic. Cheap pricing for fresh local ingredients. Don t even get me started on the sauce

Very reasonably priced burgers and fries. All the sauces and veggies all balances well with the size of the juicy patty. Id come visit again if I am in the area. Maybe next time I should try their milkshake?
response_from_owner_text: Hi Kelly thanks for the kind words hope you have a happy 2019

review_text: A great place for your typical burger diner experience. The patties are the thinner, diner type, unlike the large patties found at Romers (which are for plated experience). We also enjoy having a bubblegum milkshake with our meal.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks. We appreciate your business

review_text: Used to eat at Walleys when on Kingsway in the 80,s  Still the best buns in town. It had been years since I had Walleys.  Same great burgers,   big food.
response_from_owner_text: Hey Tony thanks for the kind words. We appreciate it

review_text: Great delicious well made burgers. The fries too were crunchy and perfectly fried. I highly recommend this hidden old gem.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the kind words Andrea it means a lot to us. We appreciate your support

review_text: Delicious , realistically matched with the high review score. If wasn t for the crazy coupon price, McDonald s never stood a chance against Wally. + great stuff
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Braden

review_text: Friendly and smiling staff, great burger for the price, and the French fries were PERFECT. Crispy outside, soft yielding inside, and not overcooked. No wonder theyve been around so long! Oh, and they have BEER now   Its just Bud or Canadian, but its a start.

Underrated! Fries are crispy and fresh like New York Fries. Burgers are spot on. Used to go to the Wallys on Kingsway and happy to see them carry on the name here. Keep up the good work! Best burger joint in Fraserview area.
response_from_owner_text: thank you, we appreciate your kind words

review_text: Good diner-style burgers and poutine. The fries are delicious. Comfort food done right. I just wish they were open on Sundays and later in the evenings for dinner.
response_from_owner_text: Look for us to open on Sundays starting in the fall. depending on how the pandemic plays out well be adjusting our hours

review_text: Yummy!  Had a classic loaded burger with fries.  Hit the spot.  Recommended.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks C we appreciate your support and kind words.

review_text: Great value and fresh food with friendly staff and a clean restaurant. Sensible portion size and the fries were excellent, as mentioned in other reviews. Will definitely be back!
Tasty but the sausages are a bit salty for us.   Definitely way better than MacDonald s.  I recommend this place!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Sharon we appreciate your support

review_text: 5star service on every aspect. Reminds me of when they use to be on Kingsway. Same great food just a new location. Keep up the great work.
response_from_owner_text: thank you so much Pal Gadey we really appreciate you kind words and support.

review_text: Seems a very popular place. Have not tried it yet. They accept coupons from McDonalds and others. Take out only. Parking is tight in this strip mall parking lot.
Good burgers and excellent fries. Try Wallys location at Cates Park in the summer for a special treat.. Glad to see them reopen for dining in.
The iconic Wallys Burgers is still making their legendary burgers! Great food and great service! A real blast from the past
Absolutely amazing each time! Got a regular cheese poutine and it was so cheesy, crispy, and so much gravy was delish! Could barely finish the bowl!
Like a mutant triple-O s but with everything better. This place is out of the way and not your usual joint. The burgers are absolutely killer.
response_from_owner_text: Love the mutant triple 0 reference thanks for the kind words

review_text: Love this place first time I ate there was about 25 years ago lol was in a different location but still great burgers and fries.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Jamie we re happy you enjoyed us again. Don t wait 25 years to visit us again.

review_text: Honestly some of the best burgers I ve ever had. Would definitely recommend. And also great service!
This place is incredible! Not a huge shop, but what they do, they do very well! Go ahead, have an ice cream float and relive a moment of childhood.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Twisted we appreciate the kind words.

review_text: I had a breakfast sandwich and it was delicious. The portion size is like snack size so you do need to make it a combo if you want a meal.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the support we appreciate it.

review_text: I had a great experience from start to finish with Mr. Rooter Plumbing. The technician Chris was on time on agreed ETA. He came in our home to assess the problem and made an estimate prior to doing the work. The estimate price was fair and affordable. Chris was courteous, professional, experienced, speedy and efficient in repairing our toilet that keeps on running. In addition, a big shout out to Mr. Rooter s answering service representative Kim, who has provided such an amazing customer service. She was very pleasant, kind and patient in answering my questions and connecting me with the technician. If you need any plumbing services, I highly recommend Mr. Rooter.

review_text: Garburator was busted, very responsive and arranged an appointment super quickly within my schedule. Provided plenty of notice for when technician was due to arrive, they came on time, we re super friendly and explained everything really clearly. Great service for a reasonable price - did an exceptional job and didn t leave any mess. Would definitely use the service again, 10/10.

review_text: I would highly recommend Mr. Rooter for all your plumbing needs.  Kevin responded quickly, was courteous and up front about what needed to be done and supplied a written quote.  The work was done in a timely manner and their service technician Scott was informative and very professional.

After a sewer line collapse, our first call was to Mr. Rooter. They did a great job of cleaning up and then proceeded to repair the line. This was no easy task as it required a 6ft deep x 10ft long trench to be hand dug. This was completed in less than a week! A Herculean task! Kevin at Mr. Rooter then referred us to BC Preferred Restoration to do major repairs in the basement suite. The floor, dry wall and cabinets had to be replaced as they were all contaminated by sewer water. Steve in the head office guided as expertly through the insurance maze. He was responsive and professional. Ivan s work was top notch and we are very pleased with the end product. Mr. Rooter and BC Preferred Restoration took a horrible nasty incident and made it tolerable with a timely professional approach. 5Star experience.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Peter for this very comprehensive and descriptive review of our services. We appreciate both your feedback and your business.

review_text: My mom had a leak of water outside her house and we didnt know where it came from since it is summer and there is no rain.  I called and Kevin Florkow called me right away to set up a time to see it the next day.  He is very experienced and knew what was the issue and how to go about contacting insurance etc.  All this was done in a day and Kevin contacted the insurance with a quote and immediately approved and the next day people came to start the repairs.  Kevin arranged everything and the job was done quickly and done well.  I will recommend Mr. Rooter for sure.

Thanks for the prompt response, professional service! Our sewer was backing up, damaged both inside and outside of the house. The manager Steve was super helpful throughout the restoration. We definitely recommend Mr Rooter to our friends and family. Again, Thank you Steve
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Kevin Everything goes so smoothly when the Customer Puts their trust in us and follows our recommendations. It was a pleasure working with you !

review_text: We have used their services several times and have always found them to be incredibly knowledgeable and dependable. They deliver precisely what they promise each and every time. Customer satisfaction is readily apparent by the way the entire team interacts with us in a courteous, helpful, and positive manner. The Mr. Rooter team consistently goes above and beyond to ensure that we are satisfied with their work. They have made a lasting impression by working with us and assisting us in the best way possible on every job. We are thoroughly impressed by Steve K. and his teams outstanding performance, which far surpassed our expectations. We highly recommend using Mr. Rooter s services and wouldn t hesitate to utilize them in the future. Jodi & Angelo D., Delta BC Services: Faucet repair , Sump pump repair , Faucet installation , Sewer repair

review_text: Fantastic service! I cannot recommend Mr. Rooter enough! I called them on a Sunday evening with concerns about a strong sewage like smell coming from one of my two condo bathrooms. My boyfriend and I had recently moved into this suite and an inspector had told us that one of the toilets had loose pegs / needed the wax ring replaced/resealed. We decided not to use this bathroom until after we had fully moved/settled in to the suite and until the toilet was properly repaired.. but the sudden strong stentch took us by surprise and we knew we needed help. Thankfully Mr. Rooter is 24/7 so you can call and speak with someone ASAP. I cannot even begin to express how kind and patient the receptionist was! They had initially told me that someone would call me back within 10 minutes after I had explained my concerns, yet after waiting 3 hours with no phone call I ended up calling back 2 more times to see what was going on. I understand how annoying this can be, especially when everyone was busy that night with larger tasks, but I was still treated with kindness which was appreciated in the stressful situation. After my third call I got a text from one of the workers (I believe?) saying they could not come by tonight but they were quick to book me in ASAP to have someone come over another day! Thankfully Tuesday morning was free and we were happy to wait. I recieved a call the day before to confirm my appointment and a call the morning of to inform me that the plumber was on their way over / when to expect them by. The communication was excellent! The individual who worked with me today was a blessing! He showed up on time and had a bright personality which helped to relieve my stress. Not only did he do a fantastic job with fixing our toilet, but he took the time to explain/show me what the problem was and how he went about fixing it. There was no need to second guess his work, it spoke for itself! Everything was VERY clean, professional and he was able to help me with a couple extra things he noticed after inspecting the two bathrooms. Every step of the way he kept me informed about cost and didnt pressure me once to try and get more work done. Having the chance to have that conversation and being able to make the call on what to do was great! I was happy to get the additional work done and am beyond pleased with how much better everything is working. The difference is night and day! Thank you so much for providing an excellent service! I will be sure to give you guys a call again should anything come up and will be happy to recommend you to any friends/family looking to have some work done :) Service: Toilet repair
response_from_owner_text: Hi Krista, thank you for sharing your experience with Mr. Rooter Plumbing. Were glad to hear you enjoyed our services. Thanks again for choosing us as your local plumber and have yourself a fantastic day!

review_text: Best Plumbing service you can ever have in Vancouver! I tried many other well-known plumbing companies and None of them worked on my greasy kitchen sink! And I treated Mr Rooter as a last resort. Steve spoke with me over the phone with such a confidence that you didn t get from other plumbing companies. I knew this is it! Two lads came over in 1 hour after I hung up the phone and only took 30 mins to clear the pipe with a very professional way, bang bang bang, done! Highly recommended, if your kitchen sink is really clogged! They are the second to none!

review_text: We had a water flow/quality issue with our new unit in Port Moody. Once I did that, my unit was serviced the next day and was properly repaired. A huge thanks to Steve at Mr. Rooter, who gave me great advice and the confidence I needed to call the company back! Also, on a completely separate item, my daughter had an issue with her sink in her unit, she called Mr. Rooter and received professional service at a reasonable rate. We both highly recommend Mr. Rooter for your plumbing needs!

review_text: When another contractor cancelled at the last moment early this morning, I called Mr. Rooter and was told a technician would come over within an hour. The tech, Brent, arrived right on time, and after a careful inspection of our old hot water tank, quickly came up with replacement plan that include bringing everything up to the new required building codes. Brent then went to pick up a new tank and was back within an hour. Brent did very clean and careful work, and was completely finished by 1:30 p.m. He gave us clear instructions about what to do if there were any problems with the new tank or installation...CALL HIM and he would deal with anything on warranty ASAP! He also took the time to explain about the new generation of water tanks along with things we should do to ensure their longevity. He also gave us advice about the need to replace our old water pressure regulator at some time in the near future. All in all we were thoroughly impress with the prompt service and professionalism! We would highly recommend Mr. Rooter !

review_text: Impending doom here. Sewer working. Just. Mr. Rooter came and walked us through a minefield. Sewer now working well. Clean out points installed. This was not cheap, but it was NEVER more than quoted. We dodged a bullet. The new toilet they recommended and installed at very competitive cost, is clearly superior to what we had - thanks for that! Met a number of very competent employees at several levels... all were completely honest with us. I recommend. (It has been a little over a month -- all has settled in well! review_text: My husband and I were very impressed with the service from Mr. Rooter Vancouver. Our drains backed up into the basement on a Saturday night. First thing Sunday morning, Jaswinder arrived - in the middle of a snow storm. He was efficient, professional, organized, clean and managed to keep the problem well contained - not easy in this case.  And then he solved the very ugly problem in 2hours. We expected it to take twice as long and cost twice as much. He gave us great advice about options for the permanent fix (it was roots in the drain) but he fixed it so we dont have to think about it for a long time, if we choose (dont worry Jaswinder, we wont!) The call centre person was also great - called back several times to give us updates on her search for a technician and when he would arrive, etc. Highly recommend this company and Jaswinder in particular.  Thanks for salvaging our drains and our weekend! Service: Drain cleaning
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Maureen! Appreciate this awesome feedback! Happy Valentine s Day

review_text: I d like to give a huge thank you to Fraserview Hall for going above and beyond to host my Haldi and Reception events. Working with Fraserview was extremely easy and the staff prioritize their customers and truly want you to have the best experience. The hall itself is a stunning venue with chandeliers throughout the hall, a massive elevated dancefloor, modern carpeting, high quality speaker system and a gorgeous outdoor balcony that my guests enjoyed majority of their evening taking pictures outside on a sunny day. I can t thank the Manager Antony enough for his exceptional customer service. He is solely the reason why I booked both of my events at Fraserview Hall. I had other deposits at another competing hall but Antony ensured me that I was in good hands and now that my events are over I can 1000% say that Fraserview Hall exceeded my expectations. My family and friends are now booking Fraserview Hall for their events after attending mine. It was the most glamorous Haldi and Wedding Reception I ve ever experienced and booking Fraserview Hall was the best decision! The in house DJ was wonderful and played beautiful songs that my guests and myself could dance all night to. I highly recommend booking the in house DJ, they are very organized and prepare all your songs to make sure everything runs smoothly. The food was absolutely delicious, my guests had second helpings and several people told me their favourite items were the vegetable chow mein, fish pakora, chicken tikka, goat curry and bbq tandoori chicken. I also really enjoyed working with the Decor team. They truly worked their magic and made every detail look absolutely perfect. My Haldi night looked like a Bollywood movie set with all the beautiful bright colours, umbrella arch, glittery table runners, gold elephants and fancy decor pieces. They also created the most stunning set up for my Reception which included a hanging floral and crystal walkway, floating candles, chandeliers, white roses with an elegant backdrop for the stage. They upgraded and sourced gorgeous decor and took care of everything. I am grateful for the hard working staff, especially Harmeet and Shrungerri who executed my visions and made them better! My advice to anyone booking Fraserview Hall is to trust the staff, they know what they are doing and you will not be disappointed.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind review of Fraserview banquet hall. We are thrilled to hear that you had a satisfying experience during your recent visit. Our team takes pride in providing exceptional service and ensuring that our guests have a memorable time. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

review_text: The decor was so beautiful and the team was very accommodative and communicative! I am really happy doing my Maiyan and jago here especially for the nice decor services they offer with the package
response_from_owner_text: Hello Gurinder, Thank you for taking time out to share your kind review. We appreciate your feedback and are glad that you had a good experience with our services. We look forward to hosting you again. Take care. Team Fraserview.

review_text: We attended a wedding reception at Fraserview banquet hall on Saturday, September 16, 2023. Overall, it was a great event, and the food was excellent. However, in particular, I would like to thank the gentleman standing outside the front door, who was responsible for security in the evening. We could not find parking so parked in the lot across the street and when he saw us approaching, he let us know that we should move our vehicle, as it would get towed.  During our conversation, we mentioned that we had a handicap parking decal, and he immediately offered us the parking spot that was reserved with pylons right next to the entrance of the hall. This is a level of courtesy that we usually do not see at these types of events. I appreciate Fraserview hiring staff members that care for their guests.
response_from_owner_text: It warms our hearts to read your glowing review! We strive to provide the best possible experience, and were ecstatic that we met your expectations.

review_text: This was way back in 1979. One week stay in a one bedroom suite that had a small kitchen with sitting area as well. People were very friendly and helpful. Cleaning lady was there the very next day and we struck up a friendly conversation. I was new to BC and she told me where to get groceries and household needs at the best prices. I mentioned that I was quite cold the night before and I guess that she mentioned it to the front desk after she was done with my rooms because someone from the front desk came by with two extra blankets for me a few hours later. Those were the days when people were kinder I guess . I dont know how it is now but my stay there was great. The room was fine if somewhat dated, but still  cozy. Good location for getting around.
response_from_owner_text: Aww thanks so much for the memory! Youll have to come back and visit.

review_text: It has been many decades since I stayed at the 2400. I liked the central location and the privacy of the intimate bungalows. When I stayed at the 2400 there was no such thing as internet, the fax was not yet invented. Music was on eight-track tapes and AM Radio. I often wonder if much has changed at the 2400?
The attendant was hilarious and she booked need in when I called. The place was dated but it was clean and spacious. It was super cool to stay in a place so many celebrities had also been.

Nice hotel. Good price. The front desk is really helpful with anything we needed. A bit out dated. But liked the hotel reminds me of the old hotels. Going to stay here again the next time Im in Vancouver. Its close to metrotown mall. The street in front of the hotel is quiet.

Seven days spent in total relaxation. This motel is my favorite in all of Vancouver. The chamber maids are so helpful, appropriate and hardworking... I took special care to leave my room as close to how it was when I checked in... Thanks 2400!!!
Never been here but they filmed X-Files season 3 Episode 23 here.  Well parts of it here.
response_from_owner_text: We sure did! We have been a great filming site for ages, and that legacy continues! Thanks for highlighting it :)

review_text: Clean, full kitchen, exactly as advertised, also very accommodating as my reservation was made for 6 people but we arrived with 7 and they allowed it without any hassle. About 15 minutes from the Nanaimo and 29th Avenue SkyTrain stations. We were only given 2 keys between 7 people though, and theres only 1 parking spot per suite so keep that in mind if those things will effect your plans.
Great location and nice service. In this motel, some movie and serie scenes were filmed (Bates Motel, X-Files...). High recommendable!
Staff are friendly, professional and just plain nice. Rooms are clean and comfortable. I love this place!
Great spot to get away from the downtown scene. Plus cant miss the opportunity to enjoy a nights rest at one of Vancouvers oldest motel with of lots of Hollywood fame.
Clean Decent rooms, average priced, Best Part Though is They Accept A CASH DEPOSIT, no credit card required!!!
Michael the general manager is very understanding and this motel exceeded my expectations.
Always a good experience

review_text: Had a great experience at the photo lab of London Drugs today. I didnt catch the gentlemans name, but he was working on Saturday July 29th at 2:25pm, he said he was off at 5:30pm. There is another popular photography studio down the street that does passport photos beside a denture and tax business. But they were so busy they couldnt give me a time to come back. Plus their cost was a bit higher. So I decided to go to London Drugs as my face was already done with full on makeup...I didnt want to redo my look or come back at another time. The gentleman that took my pic was super patient and kind, I didnt feel rushed and he let me retake a few to see which picture I prefered. The camera had a flash mount attached to it, so your face looks flawless, no filter needed :P He was non-judgemental and super fast in developing the pics as well. 2 hard copies with taxes came to $17.91! Plus all sorts of payments are accepted at LD :) The pictures are enclosed in an envelope and stamped at the back. If you need a digital copy, its $4. But you dont really need digital copies for a Canadian passport renewal. Highly recommended to come here!!
response_from_owner_text: Hello Lori! We are so happy to hear that we were able to assist you with your passport.  Thank you for letting us know and for taking the time to write this 5-star review We hope to see you soon. Regards, Mike

review_text: Gary in the computer department is a magician at fixing macbooks,he fixed mine twice, once when speakers were not working, second time when I had some mild but worrying water damage. He explains things well and shows you what he is  doing and Id highly recommend him! He has decades of experience and efficient. Thanks Gary!

review_text: Being that I live nearby I shop at this London Drugs fairly often. From electronics to snacks, medication to transit passes, and things in between I buy it here. Everything is competitively priced with other retailers, meaning its not the cheapest but the same price as other stores, and well stocked whenever I go in. The staff is friendly and helpful and is always able to show me where something is if I cant find it. Every so often I see some of what I like to call problem customers who raise a stink over nothing, and are usually wrong to boot, but the staff here always handle things very well. I definitely recommend shopping here.

place_name: J-Von Family Medical Centre-Not Walk-In Clinic
review_text: Their doctors and staffs are very helpful and professional. The doctor prescribed me to do the ultrasound receptionist gave me the instruction how to book easily and faster. Once they received my report they called me and arranged me to see the doctor. Also they are so friendly and nice.

place_name: J-Von Family Medical Centre-Not Walk-In Clinic
review_text: This clinic is conveniently located, just a few steps away from where we get off. The doctors are highly professional, quickly identifying the cause of the illness and providing appropriate treatment. They explained the diagnosis report in great detail. The receptionist at the front desk is polite and patient, helping us make appointments efficiently.

place_name: J-Von Family Medical Centre-Not Walk-In Clinic
review_text: Doctors and staffs are extremely helpful and professional. The receptionists are always amazing. I m not familiar with their online booking system, they took their time, patiently and show me how to book it step by step. Doctors answer all my questions without rushing me out, and the wait wasn t too long. I always leave impressed.

place_name: J-Von Family Medical Centre-Not Walk-In Clinic
review_text: J-Von Medical Clinic impressed me with their prompt response and efficient service. Upon receiving the lab results from my x-ray test, they quickly scheduled a follow-up doctor appointment. I really appreciate their extra care for me. Their commitment to promptness and attentive service is commendable.

review_text: The medical s online booking system is super convenient, and I no longer need to call in for booking appointments. This user-friendly feature has made managing healthcare appointments a breeze. I highly recommend it!

place_name: J-Von Family Medical Centre-Not Walk-In Clinic
review_text: Orignally, I gave give Five stars to Dr. Gill for his patience, persistence and general helpful, caring attitude. I still recommend him as a doctor, but my frustration is with his Front Counter Receptionists as I had a missed call from J-Von Medical, but a patient cannot return a call or email them (I tried several times, unsuccessfully)!  In the past, Ive been able to book online and speak with Dr. GILL. However, even though I am an Existing patient, the on-line system wont accept my email (same one I have had for 20 years!) I had to contact Vancouver General Hospital to try and get a message to my Doctor...who I have not heard back from in weeks! I was sent the email by the Doctor to get in touch with this medical clinic, yet it is the very same email that I have received messages  directly from J-Von Medical that states: Do Not email to this address as messages will Not be answered!

place_name: J-Von Family Medical Centre-Not Walk-In Clinic
review_text: Friendly efficient receptionists, the doctors are patient and resourceful. Highly recommended.

place_name: J-Von Family Medical Centre-Not Walk-In Clinic
review_text: I ve been here a number of times for various issues   the doctors are great, and the appointments do not feel rushed. The girls at the front do a great job given the very high volume. While in the waiting room I ve overhead them dealing with some very rude patients (I bet they don t act the same way when their coffee takes too long at Starbucks). I hope those patients realize there are systemic issues in the province and a shortage of GPs as there is not enough financial incentive to become a GP. The result is doctors and clinics being stretched thin and is no fault of the clinic itself.

place_name: J-Von Family Medical Centre-Not Walk-In Clinic
review_text: Took my son there for his check-up recently, and he was super anxious about it. I thought he would freak out like when we were at his fluoride treatment, but surprisingly he was really into talking with the receptionists at the front. The ladies were super considerate and cheering to my son. They also gave him some stickers when we walked in, I thought that was really nice! Thank you ladies for making our visit easy and smooth!

review_text: Excellent doctors at this clinic. Dr. Zong goes above and beyond for his patients! The medical office assistants recently gave me a call to book for check up in person appointment was very efficient. With added booking online for virtual appointments made it easier for me have more regular doctor check ups as I am not required to wait long walk in times. And when I did have to go into the clinic I felt exceptional safe with all the Covid protocol the office had. Only complain I had was that during my short visit there, some possible wait in patients did try to barge in while being very rude to the office assistants. Its not something that clinic have control over, but during pandemic time, its truly sad that people are not more understanding of protocols.

place_name: J-Von Family Medical Centre-Not Walk-In Clinic
review_text: Once you walk in, you know you are in good hands. Although many people on here complain about the receptionists (yes, I think they need some more training in telephone communication, manners, courtesy, etiquette, etc.), I do think that this clinic is super efficient in my personal experience. Let me give you a few examples: 1) While the clinic my cousin goes to regularly refused to refer him  to a gastroenterologist, J-Von did it timely and soon he had the endoscopy and colonoscopy done; 2) While the clinic my cousin goes to never called him after receiving the endoscopy and colonoscopy results, J-Von called as soon as they received the fax and booked him immediately for a follow-up to give him peace of mind; 3) After J-Von prescribed my mother a new drug, J-Von called us a few days later for a follow-up. Besides, Dr. Zong, a young doctor, has up-to-date knowledge and is English-Mandarin bilingual. I want to ask you: How many clinics would go that far to do these? None! If you had an unpleasant experience here and if it is all trivia (like with the receptionists, etc.), come on, have some patience and give it more time! It cant be wrong.

place_name: J-Von Family Medical Centre-Not Walk-In Clinic
review_text: I had my first appointment today,  Joyce did teeth cleaning for me.  She is very patient and detail-oriented,  did an awesome job. Howard Liu is also very friendly and helpful, without being pushy about making my next appointment.  They even tried to ask my previous dental office for my x-ray so that they can save money for me!  Awesome experience!

place_name: J-Von Family Medical Centre-Not Walk-In Clinic
review_text: First off, I have to say I dont usually rate medical/dental clinics. After all, I dont go around town trying different clinics. If I dont like one, I just dont go there anymore. And if I find one thats satisfactory, I will stay there. Im guessing most people are like me. And once in a while (if youre lucky) you will come across a clinic that goes above and beyond your expected level of service and knowledgeable staff. Such is the case with J-VON Medical and Dental. They have set a new standard of what customer service should be. They also have a very well trained team of medical experts and dental professionals. The first time I walked in I was greeted with a friendly smile by the super helpful reception team. They were able to book an appointment time that worked for me, given my busy schedule. And when I came in for my appointment they recognized me and greeted me by my name. How awesome is that? It really felt like a warm personal welcome. The clinics are always clean, and the place looks so modern. All the equipment there looks new and the technology used in some of these are pretty slick. The dentist who was assigned to me was named Howard. I cant say enough of his professionalism and respect. He works with his patients to ensure they have all the information to make the best decision with regards to the treatment plan or procedure. I highly recommend this medical/dental clinic because of the friendly knowledgeable staff, exceptional service, and highly trained professionals. And on top of that, they are so conveniently located next to Metrotown Station and super clean and modern.

review_text: Rob is without a doubt THE BEST SMP Artist in Vancouver. I probably spent over a year researching SMP Artists in and am SO happy that I went with Rob. Thanks again for everything Rob!

place_name: Vancouver SMP | Advanced Scalp Micropigmentation Artist - Rob James
review_text: I want to express my heartfelt gratitude to Mr. Rob James. The journey my wife and I undertook in researching SMP was quite extensive, and locating a truly proficient specialist proved to be highly challenging. Encountering Mr. James was a stroke of luck for us, and we couldnt be more pleased with the outcomes. Especially, he achieved the most natural results concerning my hairline and color intensity, which is truly the most satisfying aspect for me. Believe me, not only is he the top SMP specialist in Western Canada, but he is also among the worlds leading experts. I have searched for SMP specialists in various Asian countries, including Korea, but finding someone who delivers results as natural as Mr. James was exceedingly challenging. Once again, I want to express my gratitude to him.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so, so much Sang, I really appreciate it. Wonderful working with you and I look forward to seeing you again in 2024. Until then take good care and thank you again. Rob

place_name: Vancouver SMP | Advanced Scalp Micropigmentation Artist - Rob James
review_text: I recently completed a scalp micro-pigmentation class with Rob and I couldnt be more impressed with the experience. place_name: Vancouver SMP | Advanced Scalp Micropigmentation Artist - Rob James
review_text: Rob is quite knowledgeable about his work and comes across as a genuine, kind and a warm hearted person. I wasnt quite sure in the beginning if SMP was for me. In our initial consultation he walked me through the process, and advised me about what to expect and what can/cannot be done. I liked that he did not attempt to sell himself, gave me pertinent information and answered all of my questions which enabled me to make an informed decision. Previously, I was considering going to the US for this procedure which would have been cumbersome and expensive, but after meeting Rob, I knew right away that he would be my preferred choice for getting SMP done right here in Vancouver. My SMP required four sessions, the first three sessions (4-5 hours each) were spaced about 10 days apart and the final touch-up session around 35 days after the third. As someone who is afraid of needles, I was pleasantly surprised that getting SMP was not painful at all, no numbing cream was used on the scalp, and there were times when I actually dozed off listening to the nice music playing in the background. Conversations with Rob were interesting, entertaining and insightful which made the sessions go by like a breeze. We talked about world affairs, travel, relationships, philosophy to name a few and shared a few good laughs as well. I liked his studio. It was clean, roomy and inviting. The location is ideal, quiet and it is very easy to find free street parking only a few paces away which saved me time and money. My look and hairline gradually improved over the course of the sessions. We adjusted the hairline to achieve the subtle and natural look I wanted. Its been two weeks since my final session and my SMP is looking great. I must say Im quite amazed at the transformation which has made me look younger and may have easily erased a decade off of my age. My friends can hardly tell that I have SMP done which speaks volumes about Robs art and skill. I highly recommend Rob James for SMP procedure as he is a true professional and an artist hard to match in this field. He is a good conversationalist, is skillful and experienced in his trade, and he really makes a sincere effort in listening to you, addressing your concerns and providing the best results possible based on your requirements. He is a pleasure to work with and I believe I have also gained a friend in the process.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very, very much for the kind and super detailed review, I truly appreciate it. Likewise it has been a pleasure getting to know you over the last several months. Look forward to catching up again. Until then, enjoy your summer and take good care. Rob

place_name: Vancouver SMP | Advanced Scalp Micropigmentation Artist - Rob James
review_text: What can you write about Rob that hasn t already been written in other reviews? From the consultation to the SMP itself, the experience was first class throughout.  The sessions go by in no time - talking to Rob is like talking to an old friend. A word of advice: do yourself a favour and just listen to Rob and trust in his process.  He s an absolute master at his craft. His meticulous nature makes it so his expectations for your SMP (and experience overall) are higher than even your own. Rob has a level of integrity that isn t common nowadays.  He s reassuring, and, more importantly, realistic about what your SMP should/will look like. I was all about density going into the process.  Rob explained to me why he believed a higher density would not look good on me, as it wouldn t naturally tie in with my existing hair/stubble.  When I kept pressing, he politely told me that he may not be the SMP artist I needed. He went so far as to courteously offer to direct me to another SMP artist who would be willing to help.  If I wasn t already sold on Rob, this sealed the deal.  He genuinely cares about his clients, and wants them to leave looking and feeling amazing. I m thrilled with the outcome as my SMP looks phenomenal.  It looks so unbelievably real that even my dermatologist had no idea it was SMP! I don t leave reviews, but leaving this one was a no-brainer.  Five stars all round.  Thanks so much, Rob!  -JR

review_text: I found Kevin very professional to deal with and the results were great! The ink that Kevin uses is better quality and doesn t fade so I m very happy. Would definitely recommend his services to others.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Taz. The lady who worked on your scalp before was a beginner. SMP is like getting your Drivers license. You first get your L (learners license) then you need at least 20 clients before you can get your N (Novice license) then after that 80 clients before you get your class 5 graduated license. Im at 230 clients to date (as of april 27th 2020) :) I can take on any case as Ive developed the skills, experience, and knowledge of every skin type out there.
