review_text: They love to help people, being in the business for a long time in Vancouver s Collingwood-Kingsway area. I just walked in  early in the morning today on a (I know) busy Friday for them having one punctured tire to be repaired & for winter tire changeover  following seeing my tire concerns,  the staff told me that he will just organize the already scheduled work lineup at hand and assured me that by midday the work on my car will be done. By noon time; I picked up my car as the requested tire service was done. Kudos to Randy S. in charge of the shop and the crew who ve made it possible. Top-notch, quality service with integrity. More Power Big O Tire Kingsway Vancouver!

I recently purchased a new set of wheels and tires from the Big O Tires in Victoria and was advised to get the lug nuts tightened up after 200km of driving. I called last minute before a road trip and these guys were super accommodating (it was a quick job) and Rod got the wheels checked and had me out the door in less than 10min. Thank you so much for the great service!

Randy has helped my husband for years and finally it was my turn to get a new set of summer tires. He was very informative and his assistants are just as helpful. Very fast and efficient service, when booking the appointment and at time of drop off/pick up. Will recommend him and his team to my friends!
response_from_owner_text: Awesome! Thanks Rachel!

review_text: I m writing this review from a repair last October. I was in Vancouver staying over in a hotel for a medical specialist appointment, and woke up to a flat tire. I was panicking b/c I couldn t miss this appointment, but also had to get back on the highway to the interior before an approaching snow storm. After hearing this, Randy got me sorted out and back on the road in less time than it took me to inflate my flat and limp my truck to the shop. Besides being an awesome guy for many people in similar situations to mine (as you can read in other reviews), I trusted them to be my regular mechanic shop for all my vehicles when I was living in Vancouver.

I had a nail in one of my back tires and was told by multiple shops that my tire couldnt be repaired since it was too close to the sidewall... Big O Tires was the only shop that repaired the tire and saved me from having to buy new tires. Their service was fast, professional and inexpensive.  I highly recommend Big O Tires for all your cars needs!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you!   (its a healthy boy btw)  :)

review_text: Randy s a great guy. He patched my tire with a fairly large hole, that I was sure was a goner, for a great price, and saved me from buying a new $700 set. Thanks a lot Randy!
response_from_owner_text: Your kind words are very much appreciated Caelin!

review_text: Randy was very helpful he fixed my tire and saved me some money . I was in and out fast he also has good customer service skills I will definitely be back. Highly recommend
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Gavin!

review_text: I came in with a flat tire, Randy told me - he was completely booked all day, so I planned on leaving my car here, but he offered to look at it very quickly! He fixed it within 15 minutes! I was so happy! He was honest & didn t overcharge! Randy is a straightforward guy, and he cares a lot about his work! Come with a smile & be friendly and you will get the best service!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks!  :)

review_text: I ll definitely recommend Steve if you re looking to get new tires at this location. He s patient and decent. He gave an accurate approximation on installation time and he also explains to me how to apply tires rebates. Keep up the good work

Randy and his team did a great job!  The Acura dealership said a leak in the sidewall of the tire can not be fixed - well  needless to say - Big O tire can fix them!!! Saved me a lot of money - great service! Highly recommend!!!!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Tom!  :)

review_text: I ran over a nail, and called tire places and dealership, hoping to patch my tire. All these places said it was not patchable cause it was too close to the sidewall and they wanted me to buy new tires. When I called Big O tires to see if they had my tire, Aaron asked me what happened and I told him about the nail. Aaron was confident he could fix it and when I went in, met up with him and Randy. Man, they were so honest and sincere, got the job done the same day! We need more people like Randy and Aaron in our industry. Thank you so much guys, I am now referring all my friends and family to you guys!

Randy was awesome and funny with his customer service & skill! I got my tires change yesterday  according to the schedule and cost less than I expected, cheaper than the other shop that I asked. Really professional! Highly recommended! P/s: see you someday in my restaurant! B&D
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Bella!

review_text: I am very happy with choosing this shop! They were able to source winter tires of a rare size in the middle of the manic winter panic buying spree, at a reasonable price as well. The technician was fast and very respectful. I did however, drive away with a leaking valve stem.. I returned a few days later, and they made time to replace the stem while I waited. Before I finished eating my lunch the repair was done and was on the house to boot. If you swallow your pride and listen to instruction, you will understand why this is best tire shop in Vancouver!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Renard!

review_text: Came here the last 4 times I needed some tire work and purchased my winters here as well. Randy is a straight shooter and the shop is well run. He was able to get my winter tires on, no rims, the day we were getting blizzard on 2 days ago. Randy can be a cheeky guy but it s all part of the charm. Felt he was always honest, which is the most important thing for me as someone who s not dealing with cars or mechanical things daily.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Jonathan!

review_text: Went for a slow leak. Service was fast and friendly. Randy has great insight to people, and great people skills. He hit the mark on my life and gave better advice than my councilor. OH WAIT this was supposed to be about tires and service. The human concern is the most important service there is ! Thanks Randy An unforgettably great experience.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Phil. Im humbled.

review_text: It only costs me $85 for repairing one nailed tire. Plus the manager repetitively took his time to teach me not to look at the 360 degree surround view screen when parking. He gave me a life lesson saying that not relying on the parking assistance would make me a better person than I am now. I did not realized there is so much that I could improve in my life. I came to fix my tire but I never expected to get life-saving advice today. It was a great start of lovely Saturday. Everyone in Vancouver (even other province) must visit Kingsway Big O tire to get their tire job done. I am not paid to write this 5 Star review. It is my honest opinion. Highly recommend.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Daniel. Youre a good person. Fyi, usually tire repairs are less if they injury isnt on the sidewall or shoulder of the tire. Were happy we were able to save your tire  :)

review_text: Just had 4 new tires installed along with a 4 wheel alignment for my Audi. Job was done on time and very reasonably priced. Randy was extremely professional and pleasant to deal with. I would highly recommend this BigO location and will definitely use there service again. Great job guys!

This is a place that has saved my neck a few times when I needed to put in my winter tires. They are accommodating and can book you in for next day usually and even at the end of the day. To me thats paramount as Im busy during the mornings and until the evening, compared to Canadian Tire that usually can book you in until 4 /5 days later this flexibility  to me is a big thing. They are polite and have been efficient and I think their prices are reasonable. So Ive been quite satisfied with them and Im planning to keep coming back.

Side wall damage cannot be fixed - is not entirely true as I managed to get my car tires sidewall damage fixed at a decent price. Great service, quick and easy. I walked in the store, waiting for 30 minutes and it was done. Kudos to the excellent turn around.

The proprietor Randy could not have been more helpful.  The purchase and installation of snow tires was done according to schedule and cost less than I expected.  The entire experience was stress-free and refreshing.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Peter. Its a pleasure having customers like yourself.   :)

review_text: Highly recommended!!! Randy and his team were super helpful fixing my car with very competitive price!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Winnie! Its always a pleasure.

review_text: I booked an appointment for alignment, AC and an oil change. There was problems with my ball joints so I was advised to replace with new parts, and purchase new tires before doing the alignment. The AC was recharged and working great Oil change was done very fast. The staff is very friendly and seem transparent and trustworthy.  I expressed some of my concerns about price(I am not well off) and I was given reasonable alternatives and explanations. So far great experience, will update if something changes =)
Great tip they can do side wall tire repairs and have been doing it for decades, was so lucky I went there, saved me a lot of money

The owner has super helpful and nice, and Im definitely going back to them next season. I could tell he was stressed one day, but he never was rude. When he finally had a moment of reprieve to chat me through getting some tires, he was super attentive and nice! I think more compassion is needed for everyone providing essential services through this time, I cant imagine what it would be like to face an onslaught of feisty, bored, stressed-out customers that demand things operate as if there isnt a global pandemic going on. I had a great experience and would recommend going here for sure.

Called to have a flat tire repaired.  They were able to schedule me within the next hour. The tire was repaired and balanced within 20 minutes at a reasonable price.  They were too busy to chit chat, but their service was friendly and efficient.  Randy and Tony thanks for the fast repair!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the encouraging comments Chris!

review_text: Talked me out of spending $500 there to install a set of used snow tires. Looked like good tires for a reasonable price which they had there on consignment.  And they were very flexible with my appointment. But then when I expressed some doubt as to whether we actually needed these tires, Steve insisted my current all-seasons were in good condition, would be very sufficient for the type of driving our car sees, and suggested that I NOT go ahead with the sale & install. This is a level of honesty I am not used to seeing. I HIGHLY recommend these guys!!

Was very impressed with how personable all of the staff is.  They were very accommodating and professional.  They had my tire (not very common) in their warehouse and delivered within a couple of hours.  Would highly recommend to anyone needing a tire replacement.  A very big thank you for your help with everything and for offering for me to pull around back and have my tire changed in the rain to speed the process up because your shop was full. Cheers, Steve

I m shocked by any review that says the owner is rude. Randy has gone above and beyond with me and my tire problems. Mercedes Benz quoted me over $3000 to replace my run flat tires because of nails and puncture holes. I told my friend about my tire problems and she recommended Randy. He was extremely accommodating, honest and was friendly even when I called afterwards with a question. My 3 tires are all fixed now and I saved thousands of dollars. I recommend this location to everyone who needs quality tire services and honest opinions!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind words Stephanie!

review_text: I had a flat tire repaired here. The next week the same tire was flat. I thought maybe their repair had failed, but it turned out there was a second screw in the tire. They repaired the second hole and only charged me the $20 they would have had they repaired the second hole on the first visit. I thought this was fair and reasonable considering there was no way of knowing when the second screw punctured the tire. I would use them again for flat repair. They were courteous and honest.

I managed to wreck a tire with no hope of repair. I spent hours searching and on the phone trying to find a replacement tire. I was delusional enough to think I would only need one new tire. To Big O s credit they gently suggested that given my tires had done 50,000KM that I should replace both front tires. They got me checked in the same day. The change took less than an hour. During this time I got several calls to discuss changes. All positive. Great customer service.

I was calling around for quotes on a new set of tires. I found their price to be reasonable and the staff friendly. I was given much higher quotes from less friendly tire shops. I went for it based on that experience. They did a great job on the install and i went back a week later for the allignment. Will go back again.

Had a great experience here. Randy was super helpful over the phone and email. Got the best price in town and the quickest seamless service I ve ever had in the auto industry. Love my new tires and would recommend this shop!

Called in for help 2 days ago with my punctured tire and Randy informed me that he is fully booked BUT he asked me to come in the morning the following day to squeeze me in. We were informed that it will take at least an hour or so for the job to get done. They delivered, adjusted all of my tire pressure as well w/o being asked. Would definitely go back for any tire situation

Great service!! I phoned in the morning, they just needed an etransfer to order my tire sizes, which was fair, and they did them that afternoon! It only took about 30 minutes and the worker was very friendly and helpful. Will be coming back!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the kind words Danielle! We wish you an awesome summer!

review_text: Awesome quality of work and punctual, had my run flat tire repaired here and the nail was in the sidewall. The receipt says warranty for the life of the tire! Who else offers that?! Been here once before to buy 35 Toyo MT tires for my truck, in both instances I was treated with friendly staff and unrivaled service. Will def reccomend to friends and family.

I came in for the tire replacement on my BMW 530i. Staff was friendly and able to book me in at the same day I called. They used touchless tire mounting machine which wont damage your rims. Great work and please keep it up!

Great service, great price. I had called or visited 5 different stores looking for tires. Surprisingly even compared to Costco and another wholesaler Big O was the cheapest. Fast quick service. Randy was upfront and told me that usually it takes 1hr to install but my larger sport tires would take 1.5hrs. The shop was busy, seemed like a lot of repeat customers. Highly recommend.

Great for car newbies with little to no knowledge of fixing cars. These guys were very accomodating! Very easy to book appointments. No nonsense, direct to the point and even willing to give out professional advice for free. They work fast too! Talk to Steve or Randy for efficient admin work. They were polite and no veiled condescending comments unlike other shops that Ive encountered. They had an emergency repair going on for my first appointment and couldnt get my job started and was not able to call me to let them know. But when I rolled in Steve gave me a sweet deal as compensation instead. And on my second appointment Randy honored that deal even though Steve wasnt there confirm it for me also he made sure to make me stick my new insurance sticker on my plate before driving off (so I dont get fined), if thats not above-and-beyond-customer service, I dont know what is. Shout out to Tony who actually did the work on my car.

I hit a curb and put a tear in the side wall of my tire and I thought for sure I would have to get a new tire. Randy managed to fit me into his hectic day and also managed to patch my tire saving me the hassel and cost of getting a new tire. He was extremely professional and efficient and did a great job. I will definitely be going back. Great experience
Fast & friendly service.  Theyre also the only location in BC to repair sidewall tire punctures. Will definitely go here again.

I called early morning about my damaged tire to see if it can be replaced.  Randy, was more than willing to help and make time to get the tire replaced. By midday I was out of the shop good to go with a new tire. Great shop and great service!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Aman and for your positive attitude! You made my long day a happy one.

review_text: Great price and great service. Fast turnaround time on my walk in with a flat tire. Will come back for sure
response_from_owner_text: Thank you!

review_text: Needed a tire repair, they were quick fast and helpful and great customer service today.  My dad needed a tire repair last year and came to this location, he was quite pleased with their service. Which is why I came back. You wont be disappointed. While I was paying for tire repair, I was talking to the gentleman about our driver side window wondered if they fix that as well otherwise we were on our way to another mechanic, thankfully the gentlemen said why yes we do, lets take a look. The mechanic came back with actual part costs, options and he was also able to fix today. Again great place and people that work here, they give you straight forward answers not vague answers or options. Prior Ive called a few places and they couldnt give straight answers or costs or had time, I didnt feel comfortable going to those places or  trusting them. BUT This place Big Ol Tires made our day by being amazing, helpful, straightforward and most of all was able to help us with a reasonable cost as well. I will forsure go back if I need any repairs done or to buy tires from this place, hard to find places like this when you need emergency repairs done.

Ordered a new set of rims to install onto my car and brought it in over the weekend to get them on. There was a small hiccup due to a communication error, but Steve went above & beyond to find a solution and was willing to work past closing to ensure that I was able to go home with my car. I appreciate the awesome customer service and how helpful he was.
Randy made some excellent tire recommendations for me.  Staff were all very helpful and friendly.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Peter :)

review_text: The service at Big O Tires is over and above! I had a flat, and luckily was parked only about a block down the road from Big O. I could hear the air hissing out of my tire, and realized that I only had minutes to react or would have been in a real bind. I ran over to Big O, and even though they were closed, Steve was able to fit me in and fix my flat without question. Thanks for saving my night from disaster , and for being so accommodating! Great service!!!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the kind words Chris. Were all in this together.

review_text: Had a flat, changed the tire, and dropped it off to get it fixed after work. Everything was done quickly, smoothly, and professionally. I really appreciated that they were on point in this emergency even when busy. Will definitely come here for future car issues.

Again, a big shout out to the mechanics at Big O Tire on Kingsway, they are simply the best, thankyou Steve for your prompt, and always courteous service, I always know my car is in good hands with you guys. Fast, efficient and the best place to take your vehicle when you need the jib done right. J.Huberman

Ive come to Big O several times. Mostly due to flat tires and repairs but Ive also thought about purchasing tires here. The only reason I havent purchased tires here is because Ive ended up finding sets of used tires for my car for much cheaper than sets of new tires. Staff here, especially the owner/manager and Steve, both are very friendly, knowledgeable and fair.

Randy and his crew do an awesome job.  I go here for all my car mechanical work.  They work fast and have competitive pricing.  Always satisfied with the job and would recommend if you need any work done.

BigOTires on.Kingsway is always my go too with my car. Customer Service at its best, they have always given me great service and advice. Take my Lexus in there for all my tune ups and most recently for my new tires. The Manager there ( Randy ) and his team are efficient, fast and alway explain what they have done, best of all never any hidden charges you tend to.get with most mechanic! I would definately reccomend BigOTires to anyone looking for Service with top quality!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review Jay! Our team gets a huge dose of smiles when customers recognize their efforts. Have a safe and happy season!

review_text: Been coming here for the past 8 years. Great tire guys especially when it comes to services such as: tire repair (never paid over $40), rotations and balance, and changing. Never been back to BMW for my tire needs after my first visit!

This shop is awesome, great customer service. Went far and beyond to get the results we needed. Quick and reliable, general Tire repair, fixed my window. Great to talk with, relatable and genuine work. Thanks guys. Tony, your the man with the window work. Good job.

A big thank you to Steve for taking the time to help this desperate customer who had a flat tire just before closing time. Steve was closing up the shop just as I arrived but he took the time to do this repair for me. Very professional and thoughtful!!
response_from_owner_text: Awesome and thanks!

review_text: Much better than OK Tires on West 3rd. Honest friendly staff, much more reasonable in price and while they should serve free coffee though. Oh, the machine they use wouldnt scratch up your wheels, supposedly better than the Hunter Road Force?

SIDE WALL repaired!! I tried everywhere and got turned down till I stumbled upon this place.  Ironically, I didnt see their sign and went in asking them to remove the tire for me.(because I decided to do the repair myself) Randy asked me if I wanted to keep the tire so I told him yeah, I want to fix it myself since nobody will repair sidewall damage. He looks at me with a smile and asked me if I saw their sign eyeing towards the window. My face lit up with heavenly angels striking the chord. Did I ever luck out. Thanks guys! They took my tire right away and I was out after a short wait. Everyone was really nice. Id definitely go back again.

I want to thank Randy and his staff for the awesome tires and alignment. I cant believe the difference from my old Pirrellis to the new BFG Force Comp-2 AS Sport tires. It feels like a brand new car now. Great prices and even better service. JOB WELL DONE THANKS RANDY!!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Dan!

review_text: Requested a quote late at night online and got an email the next morning first thing.  They were able to get me in that same day which was awesome considering its the busy season and close to the holidays.   I found it strange that they didnt try to up sell me on anything or make any recommendations of things that i might need, but i prefer that to a store being pushy about an up sell.  Overall very satisfied.
If you are looking for somewhere to fix your runflat tire, here is the place! Owner and staff are helpful and friendly. Definitely will come back again!
Really went above and beyond fixing my tire. Really great staff, very good price, wish I could leave a six star review!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much Liam! A great compliment from an awesome customer!

review_text: I was referred to call Randy by Big O west broadway. He suggested calling the manufacturer direct to find the last tire in my oddball size in Canada saving from buying 4 brand new. Thank you Gerry
response_from_owner_text: Its awesome that it worked out well :)

review_text: Randy at big o saved me  . After such a great experience I was not surprised to see such great google ratings online. He could have taken me to the cleaners as I would have paid being in a desperate situation but he saved me close to 2,000. I even left him some old tires he is consigning for me now and he even told me he would get me more for them after I low balled myself! I am a customer for like now even though I have to take a longer drive there from home.
I came in here for a tire rotation today and everybody was friendly and welcoming, the waiting area was clean, and I was in and out pretty quick. Id recommend this place.

Great service from Randy!! Made a same day appointment to fix a flat tire and even tho he seemed incredibly busy, randy was very professional, polite and did the job quickly, at a very reasonable price.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you!  :)

review_text: Apparently they one of only a few tire shops in BC that will do side wall repairs...and this saved me the cost of having to buy a new tire today
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Giuseppe!

review_text: Had a leak in my tire late in the day - despite being very busy they had me come by and had the tire fixed within the hour. I greatly appreciated their prompt help which made a bad day turn out ok.
Fast and very kind. Flat tire repaired and its patched not plugged! Would come here again :)
response_from_owner_text: :) thank you

review_text: Very happy for the work done on my car! Quick balancing of the tires, resulting in no more shacking! Thank you for your kindness and good service
Fast, efficient service. Answered quote online within 24 hours. The ONLY certified sidewall repair centre in Vancouver. Repaired tire like it never happened - within an hour!

Lots of communication about the status of the repair, which was great.  Also, they helped me out with options for the best deal possible, and were very friendly. I will be using them again in the future.
Had to have the tire repaired but had been told it couldnt be done until I took it to Big O Tire and was looked after. Excellent service by Steve!

Where do I start. I had a weekend from hell. Lost my keys for my acura el in the middle of nowhere. Stranded by coldwater. Had to pay crazy off road tow fees, Hotels and 415 in mechanic fees (after we stupidly tried to hotwire it) to get back to vancouver to work. Now I have pretty well zero dollars...and still need a spare..not knowing that if I left my back door open and not my front my alarm would go off. So the alarm starts going off and itwont lwt me start it with the dam butterknife Im using until I can afford a key. Im bawling at this point. Im so stressed. Im half a block from this shop though. So I try my luck and stroll over in tears. These gentleman and I regret notknowing thier names. Helped me get my car going so I can at least get around for a bit. Compassion goes such a long way in business and Im so greatful. Out of the kindness of their hearts they helped me in a tough time and when I asked how I could pay them back he told me not to worry. I would come here with any future issues. Thank you. Thank you so very much. I cannot express how grateful I am to this company. The one gentleman who stayed to helpandthe manager who gave the go ahead to do so. Awesome folks.

I bought new tires there last year and one went flat. They repaired it for free while I watched TV, hung out on the comfy couches and had complimentary coffee and bottled water in the lounge. Was perfect.
I came in on a sunny afternoon a few weeks ago to beat the Winter rush on tires. Good deal on my All weather Maxis AP2 tires (recommended by Steve) and fast, efficient service!
This place is my go-to for tires or tire repairs. The staff give excellent service and are quick, yet thorough. I also got a great deal on my winter tires too.
Great Service and ordered me the tire i wanted.  Service is professional  and owner has great knowledge on tires! Explained things clearly and had the best price.
These fellows are awesome. Great service, fast and efficient. Highly recommend this place if you need tires for sure and I am going to use them for a tune up soon

my daughter had side wall tire leak ,fountain tire could not fix ,well they did and will be getting my business for new tires in the future. honest advice , my daughter is a single young mom ,sure appreciate the help .

I dropped by without an appointment and close to their closing time due to an emergency tire issue but they were very friendly and accommodating. They got the job done in no time and very honest with their services.
Took my appointment in on a Saturday when Im sure they didnt need to,  friendly and fast service. Fair prices. Happy with my visit
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the kind words Taylor. Were happy we could save your tire. Have a great weekend!

review_text: Had a screw in my tire. Fast and professional service.
Big ups to Steve! Service was prompt and straight-forward. Came here to patch up a tire which was done quick and efficient. Price was reasonable too.
Best place for your tire service! thanks Randy, super nice and professional! PS: donot forget to make an appointment before you go!
Amazingly caring team and owner. They will take care of your vehicle the same way they take care of their clientele. This may be my new home for vehicle repairs for the next little while. Thank you.
Great service, Frendly staff. I had my car back to me in 30ish mins and my leak is fixed. The fella at the front desk is a tip top geezer
If you need snow tires, this is the place to go! I got my tires ordered and done without any problems.  Tran and his team did a fantastic job!
Randy is personable and professional. All work done in a timely manner for a reasonable price.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Robert!

review_text: Big O Tires Kingsway staff are professional , helpful and very fair and honest. Thank you for your good service and quality.
response_from_owner_text: Awesome! Thank you Atie!

review_text: They found and brought in great winter tires and steel rims in a very hard to find size during a snowstorm at a great price. I couldnt be happier with the product or service I received.
Our bunny bus (a mini-van) needed one hard-to-find cheap tire (and wheel)  right before the first winter storm of the season, they really delivered.  Very professional and pleasant!
Helpful, reasonable and efficient. Ive been here a couple of times and have had a good experience. I found Randy and his team to be professional and fair and I will use them again.
thank you Randy and the shop team
We were told by 2 different tire shops that they couldn t fix our tire, and we would have to put on a new one. Big O fixed it for us the same day and saved us about $250.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your great review. When people are happy with our work our guys get a bounce in their step! Thanks again!

review_text: Only place to fix sidewall damage on a tire!!! Very fast and saved me from having to buy a whole new set of tires!
I came here a few weeks ago and Steve went above and beyond to get me the tires I needed in a timely fashion. Efficient and friendly service :)
AWESOME service from Randy & Mechanic Tran, great to know I have a reliable mechanic SO close to home. Will be recommending these guys to all my co-workers @ Kodak...Cheers guys and THANX
Randy s service is awesome. I really appreciate his professional skills and highly recommend this store. Canna Zhou
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Canna!

review_text: They were 15minutes to closing but took me in anyway. I didn t have a spare tire but they had one in my car s size after they had waited for the delivery to come. Couldn t ask for a better service!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the kind words Jarlyn :)

review_text: Friendly service with decent prices. Theyll actually tell me no, dont need XYZ service if I dont need them. Recommend everyone I know to them.
Fast, friendly service.  They were able to get me in the same day to repair a leaky tire.

We have booked Ritz Limousines on two separate occasions, with both bookings being very last minute. Ritz went above and beyond to accommodate our requests on both occasions. They excelled in punctuality, arriving exactly as scheduled. Their customer service was impeccable with courteous and attentive drivers. Vehicles were new, comfortable and spotless, ensuring we had a smooth and enjoyable experience. We would highly recommend Ritz Limousines to anyone looking for a limousine service!

Incredible company to work with! Jeff was so efficient in following up with us and getting our group booked in, the Limo we rented was gorgeous, it looked brand new and our highlight of the night was our OUTSTANDING driver, Jay!! We couldnt have asked for a better experience all thanks to him, he was so helpful and patient with our large group, it made all the difference- Thank you Jay! I will definitely be using Ritz limousines again in the future, they are the best weve worked with! Thank you Ritz!!

This is the second year weve used Ritz Limousines for our dental office and they truly are amazing. Best part was we even got the same driver, Jay, who was the best   . He was there early to pick us up, also very patient. The party bus we got was really nice and exactly what we needed. It fit the whole crew comfortably. The lights and sound system was the best. Cant beat rolling up to good ol nickleback lol. I very highly recommend this company from its booking staff to the Limo Driver, they are hands down the best in all areas. Thank you Ritz!

This was a perfect experience - we used Ritz Limos to get from one venue to another with our family for my sisters wedding. It was so much fun to have everyone stay together in between ceremony and reception. It was a 10/10 experience and I would highly recommend their services. The planning and communication beforehand was clear and so easy to work with. They went above and beyond for us!

We hired Ritz for our wedding and they went above and beyond to ensure excellent service. After losing my wallet at some point in the night, I phoned Ritz the day after and Sonny searched the bus, found it, and arranged to meet me to drop it off after working another event. They are easy to work with, punctual, and thoughtful. Highly recommend!

I was so impressed with the Ritzs customer service.  We barely fit into the fill sized SUV for the first trip, and they sent a coach for our second at the same price! They showed up about 20 minutes early for our first trip, and showed up an hour and fifteen minutes early for our second! They waited for us both times. No need to worry about missing a connection with that kind of promptness. We had the same driver for both trips, Rey, and he was courteous, friendly, and professional. I was very impressed with Ritz Limousines. Would definitely use again!

Called a few companies and Ritz by far was the most friendly and service oriented. We rented a party limo bus for a highschool graduation, driving 24 kids. Our driver was extremely punctual, friendly and very easy to work with. Now, the bus was clean, in great condition and the sound system and lighting were excellent, exactly what the kids needed to enjoy the ride. We made a stop for pictures, our driver communicated clearly how much time we had in order to make it on time for the reception. I highly recommend Ritz, I will definitely use them again.

Jay was an incredible driver! The party bus was massive and had a great sound system, TVs playing my favourite movie, and not only a pole but poles along the ceiling to hold on to while you were walking! Such a hilarious and fun way to travel. Great communication from admin and very punctual. Highly recommend!

We had a great experience working with Ritz Limousines! Jeff was very good in communicating with us and responding to needs.  Our driver Adi was very kind, accommodating and helped to make our day very special.  I would definitely recommend Ritz!

Jay was our driver for the night and was phenomenal. He arrived at our location on time and was extremely friendly. Following the pick up he was able to accommodate our specific drop-off location at no extra charge! Would highly recommend to anyone.

We hired Ritz for a bachelorette party this past weekend and it was so great! We got one of their party buses and have nothing but amazing things to say! Our driver Rey, was so kind and professional. The bus itself was so nice and clean! AC worked perfect for a warm day. Rey was so punctual and even extended our ride on the way back so we could get full use of our paid time! It was just so great! 10/10!

I would highly recommend Ritz Limousines service. Sam was so amazing for setting up our night. Rey, our driver was the epitome of customer service. I would never hesitate to recommend Ritz Limousines. Thank you so much!
Their customer service and callback response time was wonderful. Took care of our needs to the best of their ability when our event got canceled. We definitely recommend using this company.

From the first inquiry, Ritz Limousines was friendly, well priced, quick to respond and excellent customer service. Both Jeff and Sam were great to deal with. They went out of their way to help and make the day perfect. The driver Harm was friendly, professional and excellent in his communication. Would definitely recommend Ritz Limousines.  Thank you.
Super great experience with these guys for my bachelorette brewery crawl last night. Our driver Jay was fun, punctual and reliable. Would not hesitate to use again, thank you!

Ritz was very professional and attentive. Sunny was great, punctual and engaging. I will definitely refer any friends and family to use Ritz. And Ritz will be my go to in the future. Thank you for helping us close our cruise out with a relaxing drive home.
We got a party bus for the evening brewery hopping. Service was great, he got us set up with our Bluetooth right away and interior was great. Would definitely use again and recommend

We hired Ritz for my nieces wedding for all transportation to / from events. Ritz was very organized, professional and on schedule.    They communicated with us on a regular basis as well as returned our calls pretty much immediately. Thanks Sam.

We had a great experience with Ritz Limousines for my daughters birthday! We wanted a simple pickup and drive around, with the chance to stop for a few photos. Without a real destination, I was unsure how the afternoon would go but Gary was a great driver, and kept us on time and on track to get the full use of our time. The weather was colder than expected, so we didnt take as many photos as planned, leaving us a little extra time to tour around. He chose a route that allowed us to see some things and keep the kids singing along, with opportunities to stop for more photos if we liked. Ritz sent plenty of Day Of communications to make sure we knew they were coming and when. Gary arrived ahead of schedule, and was very polite and accommodating, even as 7 teen girls screamed out their favourite lyrics at him while he tried to turn the car around. We felt very comfortable with him as a driver. He was polite and made sure to check with me before making any changes to plans. The limo was clean, the dispatch service was helpful, and the car arrived on time and did exactly what we needed. We would definitely use Ritz Limos again in the future!
We had an excellent experience! Rey was so pleasant early to  pick us up and right on time to pick us back up ~ I would recommend Ritz for anyone looking a professional limo company.

Sunny was accommodating on a very last minute request for my daughters birthday. They were just awesome in every respect all around. Our driver was the nicest guy that you could have for a driver. I highly recommend Ritz and will be using them in the future when the time comes. Keep up the excellent service.

Thank you to Ritz Limousines It has been great working with your company and your expert team on our golf occasion. I hope to have the opportunity of working with you again in the near future.A big thanks to our driver Rey Colleen
Amazing trip. I booked Ritz for my bachelorette and they provided great service leading up to the day and day off! Raj was our driver and made the ride the most enjoyable part!

Ritz Limos are by far the most professional service in Vancouver. Their limos are clean modern and luxurious! I have used a few other companies but got misled about price . Ritz isn t the cheapest but the best!

We have used Ritz Limosines a few times and will continue to do so.  Sam has given amazing service and has accommodated our needs above and beyond. Raj was our most recent LimoBus Driver and was friendly, fun and was extremely accommodating.  All of our friends who joined us had nothing but positive feedback.  Thank you for making our event unforgettable.

Suchhh a fun experience!! Our driver was so lovely and made sure our friend s birthday went perfectly. He was so accommodating and nice to talk to. Definitely recommend, I can t wait to book again for my birthday

Raj was amazing he was very patient with our group and made sure to wait for us to be comfortable and settled in. Overall we had a great time and he demonstrated how to use everything provided on the bus, my party had an amazing ride. I would definitely recommend booking with him going forward!

We booked Ritz for our daughter and friends graduation.  Our driver Rey was friendly, prompt and the whole group felt extremely comfortable.  This was our first time using Ritz, but it wont be our last.  Thank you Rey and Ritz Limos!!
Driver was on time, personable and the trip took the time that it was supposed to take. Vehicle was clean and spacious. I will definitely use Ritz again.

Ritz Limousines was amazing. I booked a partybus for my cousins wedding. Sam and Raj both provided great customer service and were so easy to work with. Highly recommend this company for all occasions.
A large group of us had a fantastic experience with the limo bus and driver Ray. I recomend this company which deserve 5 star.
Our driver Jay was amazing! So kind and made the trip super smooth. I will definitely be booking with Ritz again in the future!
Our Girl Guide unit booked with Ritz Limousine as a shuttle to and from camp and I highly recommend their services. Amazing communication with the drivers, very accommodating and incredible shuttles.
We had an awesome experience and were given the royal treatment!
Rey from Ritz is the man! Took care of my crew to/from Morgan Wallen. Bus was early & spotless. Thank you

My friends had booked ritz for a birthday party and ray was our driver. Bus was very clean and spacious and ray was very easy to get ahold of. Pick up and drop off was smooth. Also shout to ray for making sure everyone was safe and good before going in and out of the bus. Also stopped for a washroom break along the way.
Such a fun way for a bachelorette group to get around. Our driver Jay was awesome. Would definitely use their services again.
Amazing service! Super friendly! Definitely will be booking again with this company!

We rented a limo for my grandfather s birthday. There was 11 of us in a very spacious awesome stretched limousine. The price was right, the driver was amazing. She drove us to the restaurant, took us on a scenic tour and even suggested to stop for ice cream. Definitely booking with the same company again for my birthday this year! Highly recommend!

We just hired Ritz Limousines this weekend for our Christmas party and they were great.  Couldnt have asked for better service right from the dispatcher to the driver.  Sam the dispatcher ensured that we were completely set up for our evening even adding an extra trip to and from our party as we had too many people in our group from what we had originally booked.  Raj our driver very friendly, punctual right down to the minute and ensured that we were well taken care.  Most importantly Raj was a great/safe driver!!  Ritz will be the only car service we will use in the future!

Everyone I talked to whether it was through email or over the phone was extremely helpful and so kind! Our driver Jay was super thorough with us and made our experience on the party bus such a positive one!

We booked with Ritz for a concert venue with a group ~ they did not disappoint!  Great communication, professional, super accommodating and an overall fantastic experience! Would highly recommend Ritz!

Hosted my birthday party with Ritz limousines and it was such a fun time :) They were very professional and arrived on time with everything organized. Thanks so much!  Looking forward to using Ritz again
Jay was so professional and accommodating. We had so much fun on the party bus. Highlight was the 4 fake fireplaces on the party bus.

One of the best experience with amazing services. I did made few last minute changes to the pickup and drop off location and Sam accepted without saying a work and charging extra. Regarding the chauffeur (Jay) is such an amazing person and very polite. He made sure that my guests are happy and are having fun. Will surely use there services in the future.

Ritz Limos was awesome for my event. We reserved 4 busses to transport over 100 guests between 3 venues. All of the busses were on time and in great condition. The drivers (Jay was our lead) were also amazing, making sure everybody had a great time. We will definitely be using Ritz in the future for our events!

We rented a limo for a pretty large group of grads, Ritz, Raj, was super attentive to the kids, he went above and beyond to make sure they had a memorable grad limo experience and then got to their dinner. Thank you Raj!!
Just had my birthday party a week ago. The service with Ray was amazing he made sure everyone had a good time and drove us home safe. Ill definitely use Ritz Limos and ask Ray again in the future
Our driver Jay was great and the overall customer experience was amazing.

This is the best limo service I ve had so far. Raj was on time and happy to see us. He shuttled us between wineries and was such a sweet heart (opening the door, making sure we were all accounted for, making sure the music was good, PATIENCE). At the end we ran 30 min late and we felt really bad (we tipped extra, due to the inconvenience for him). He was so accommodating, didn t get mad at as and was so kind. This is my new limo recommendation. Lovely driver.

Raj was friendly and professional. He texted before he arrived and was on time. At the other end, after the event, he kept in touch prior to pick up so we had lots of advance notice. The ride was comfortable, nice temperature and our choice of music. We had a good experience. I d recommend Ritz Limos.

Ritz limousines is hands down the best limo service in the lower mainland. They are more than accommodating, super friendly, and well priced. If you get the opportunity, I highly recommend Raj as your driver. He s fun, prompt, and has fantastic customer service. Going forward, I will only be using this company.

Great company and party bus!! The staff were so nice to work with and they went the extra length to make sure that we got the best deal possible on a party bus. Great service, would highly recommend their services for any event !!!
great experience. drivers are really nice and you couldn t even tell we were driving. accommodated the group of us extremely well, would book again and recommend!
Got a party bus for a 30th birthday and the customer service was excellent and the driver, Raj, was awesome. Would definitely recommend for any event!!!
Good rates, professional drivers (especially Ray), nice and clean fleet, and always on time and most importantly, flexible!
Great communication ahead of the event. Friendly staff with a top quality fleet.

Just booked with ritz limousines. Ray was literally the best party bus driver. Stopped whenever we needed to and was overall fantastic. I highly highly recommend!! Will definitely be booking with them again in the future!

Had a great experience with Ritz celebrating my 21st birthday! Driver Jay was awesome, friendly and made our experience great! I will definitely be using Ritz again for my party busses or limos in the future!

Ritz limos was one of the best companies I have booked with! Our driver Sunny was great, very friendly and communicative. The party bus was brand new and beautiful! Will definitely book for all future limo/party bus needs. Highly recommend
High class service with a luxury experience. Very accommodating and well equipped to meet your needs of the night. 10/10 would rebook & recommend to have the ultimate party bus night!
Great experience with Ritz Limos. Our driver Sonny was excellent. Very friendly and informative. Their cars are spacious and clean. Would definitely use them again.
We hired Ritz Limousines for an event, absolutely amazing. Best experience I ve had on a hired bus. Staff was amazing and extremely accommodating! Could not recommend it enough!
Sonny was a true professional. Great communication, took care of all guests (aged 10-75) and didn t rush us. Some of the best pricing out there as well. We ll be back.
Our driver took very good care of all of us tonight. Ensuring we all got home safely in this crazy storm. Thank you, we would definitely use this service again and would ask for you.

Great experience getting from the airport. They brought a party bus to pick up four of us. It was a nice surprise after a long flight home. They also accommodated our last minute request too I had forgotten to book anything until the night before we left. They made it work.
It was a great experience working with Ritz Limousines!  The team was very communicative and responsive, with excellent customer service.   Will definitely work with Ritz in the future again!
Amazing service as always. Thanks Ritz for making Prom night a special experience for our kids !
Sonny was the most professional and fun driver we had for our xmass party. We would not hesitate  to have him for our permanent  driver in the future.  Totally  recommend  him.
Amazing company 10/10 service!! They were so accommodating for us and had great flexibility with our changing plans! Highly recommend them!
Great service from start to finish. 100% happy. Will use them again, for sure!
Had the best experience of my life great memories and even better service. 10/10 highly recommend. You will not regret the experience. Best night of my life
Excellent service - thank you so much Ritz Limo - you have been very accommodating for my needs - I so recommend using this company for any group events :-) - thank you
Awesome ! Jay, our driving was amazing! Thank you
I had a great experience. Amazing driver and a very luxurious vehicle. Really enjoyed my ride with Ritz Limousines.

Man it was good times. I travel from Korea to Vancouver from time to time, and Ritz has always been there to pick me up from the airport and drop me off at my destination. This review is about a wedding that I attended in Vancouver. Ritz was there with me from start to finish. The chauffeur drove at a safe pace and made sure I was comfortable at all times. They then picked up my friends and took us to and from the wedding. The chauffeur waited for us and made sure that our things in the limo were safe. They were very knowledgeable of the area and were communicating to us which roads they were going to take. For any of you who are from out of town and here on a business/personal trip, I highly recommend Ritz Limousines. Comfortable, professional, and pays attention to the finest of details.
Great prompt and professional service. Highly recommend them to friends and family. Will use there service more often for events.
Best customer service. Experienced team

Love the service. I had 2 different drivers now and both were strict with rules but still allowed us to have fun. Its just dumb that the government is being so harsh on the  party bus  industry. Even still we had a great night out. We needed to move our pickup time up and they were able to accommodate. Really liked that. Guaranteed to pass on the recommendation.

Booked the 35 person limo bus to take out of town youth team to Aquarium.   Good communication from company on what the bus was like, including photos, and route it would take. As we were a bit early the driver made an impromptu stop for team to take some photos around sea wall which ended up being a highlight of the day. I would recommend this for team functions as it kept all together and was an excellent bonding experience.  Inside was appropriate as well for age group: clean, spacious with great sound system for team to play music. Price wise was very reasonable for size of vehicle and what we wanted to accomplish in the time we had to do it in.  Thank you

Very clean and professional services. We have booked with Ritz multiple times now for work and private events at the Fairmont Vancouver and Whistler etc. Great communcation and met all our needs. A++++++

Hi have dealt with Ritz limousine over the past 5 years, the service has been excellent, they have been on time and they are very professional to deal with, I would highly recommend using them. Thanks, Gary
The driver was excellent and super down to earth. The limo was superb and really felt like a VIP experience.
Excellent Limo company. Great prices great service always on time and the drivers are outstanding. We only use Ritz and couldn t recommend them enough.

This company is a gem of a company! I first began planning an event and dealt with Sam in October 2019 for April 2020! With covid the event was moved to 2021 and Sam was so wonderful to deal with! He changed our dates, kept the reservations and worked so well with us throughout covid. He didn t raise the price or add any extra charges. He honoured our original contract a year later. Highly recommended! Their drives are great and know where they are going.
Prompt and professional! Sonny was friendly and efficient - highly recommend.
Amazing service and great party bus experience. Don was a great driver, super friendly and warm.
This was the best party bus experience I have ever been on !! The bus was so much fun and the staff were incredibly professional, highly recommend!!

While booking with Ritz, I had the pleasure working with Sam, he was kind, genuine and took the time to explain everything in detail. I booked a party bus to take a group of 30 to a concert and back. Our driver Javog showed up right on time with a perfectly clean bus, stocked with water (both ways). He was also a pleasure to work with and Ill definitely request him next time i book with Ritz!
I love the party bus I had. Perfect with funky lights. White outside and amazing inside. The driver was so caring and hosting. I had no complaints. Awesome service

We hired Ritz Limos this past weekend for our large bridal party and they did a great job accommodating us.  We had last minute change of plans due to weather conditions and the driver was very understanding and was extremely helpful.  Couldnt have asked for better service for such a potential stressful day.
If you need to book something ask for Sam! He was a pleasure to deal with and very communicative throughout the booking process

Wicked night out for us. Booked my stag and wedding with them. Awesome rate. I booked it on time was actually more affordable. Our driver Jas did everything to keep communication with us. Right on guys. Recommend Ritz. A+

New Client and First Time Experience: I spoke with Sam basically throughout the entire process for my event. His customer relationship skills are top notch and I really appreciated the one on one customer feel you provided for me. I myself have worked customer service for years and its always great to chat with someone who has the same kind of attitude. It 100% seals the deal. I was so impressed with how we worked out plans for my transportation on the phone call, that before I had even had my event, or seen our ride, I was already bragging about this company lol Great Job. Finally our bus arrives and its a gorgeous, white, 30 passenger limo bus, absolutely blown away and so were all my guests! Two fantastic guys greeted us and welcomed my crew aboard the boat with again flawless customer service relationship skills. It was a beautiful bus inside and out. You guys killed it from beginning to end and I will be back(Even though I told Sam this was my last limo bus before 30) with more events in the near future! Thank-you so much for an absolutely fantastic experience.

Excellent service. They went above and beyond our expectations. We had a package with a bus and vintage Cadillac, both vehicles were amazing. They were upfront about the seating capacity in the bus, quoting us for a comfortable number of people. We will use the service again, and would recommend it to anyone. Thank you.

If I can give them 6 stars I would. We had multiple cars booked; 2 busses and a stretch. I was quoted a price that was about the average quote I was getting, but what got me was when I was asked to come view the vehicles. No other company asked me to have a look. So I started to request to see the vehicles from a few companys I had gotten quotes from. 2 companys said no and 3 others allowed me to view. By far Ritz was honest about the seating capacity and size of the busses, the stretch SUV was the same. The day of service we got a phone call from the chauffeurs which was nice. All three vehicles were stocked with ice and water which was nice for a extremely hot day. The chauffeur I was with did a fantastic job; professional, polite, and courteous. For my future events I will book with RITZ again and definitely recommend them for anyone looking for good rate, great cars, and service.

Ritz Limousines was fantastic! On time reasonably priced and professional. Have used them to go to the airport and the party bus. I have used a couple other companies before. Even flagged down limos from downtown like taxis with bad experiences. Ritz are the only people that I trust now to drive me around. If you are looking for professional, friendly and quality service then look no further. I highly highly recommend them for all limousine services.

Ritz is my go to from now on. I didn t book the party bus but a friend did for our night out. Amazing! Such a beautiful bus it looked brand new and super clean. Compared to our outing using different companies this company stands out.
Great service! Had them pick us up before and after our cruise. On time and very helpful.  Will definitely use them again.
Reliable, clean and great service. Will be using them again for future events!
