review_text: Recommended to try this place! The dessert tastes amazing. I m not a big fan of sugary sweets, and Minus Cake got the sweetness right!   The cake is fluffy with a creamy mousse texture that melts in the mouth.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: I really liked. A nice little place. The service is excellent and we tasted very good desserts. The desserts are not too sweet, they are just right. A varied choice: some combinations are available (bubble cake and drink) but you can also make your own combination. I tried number 7 and the mix of flavors was well thought out!  I would like to go back to try other flavors.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: I got the Rose Oolong Peach Cake + Honeycomb Dalgona Latte and my friend got the Vanilla Strawberry Shortcake + Iced Shaken Lychee Black Tea. I would highly recommend the rose peach cake as its something I havent been able to get anywhere else and it tasted divine! The rest was sweet and tasted exactly as expected, especially the strawberry cake and the lychee black tea. Not to make that sound bad, theyre staples in every store for a reason (they never miss)!! Though, not going to lie, wasnt a huge fan of the honeycomb in my dalgona latte as it was too sweet and it was slightly unnerving every time Id encounter its crunchy texture. Still drank it all, but probably wouldnt get it again... Other than that, the decor was nice and clean and the atmosphere was quiet and serene. Also, its a little on the expensive side... so definitely more of an experience than a regular hang-out spot. Hope the employees enjoyed the relaxing morning as it seemed like a slow shift (to be fair we went around brunch time on a Tuesday). Tldr, worth it to try the rose oolong peach cake and experience the fun of the stacking cake cups.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: This is so goooooooooood omg! Both combos were delicious and the girl who works at the place is very sweet and helpful. Totally would come again to try all the other combos.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: I have to say, the idea of dessert with a bubble tea was just a thought. Now Ive found the real deal. So far I am looking forward to come back and try more of it

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Stumbled across this gem on social media and knew we had to try! Wow it did not disappoint!   The cake bubble was seriously the best treat I have had in ages!  So many options to pick from.  Bold strong flavors, creamy moose. The drink was fresh with no artificial flavor. We will be back again!  Just wish they opened sooner!!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for coming by Brittaney! Have a great day!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Visited this place with my wife on labour day. Nice little shop with cute interior decoration. Service was good. We were a bit confused to see the menu but the staff was explained to us very patiently. Friendly space to hang out with friends and family. Price is reasonable since can enjoy bubble tea and cake at the same time. After tasting the combo we both enjoyed their preset combination. Very unique, creative and aesthetic cup design. The peach cake is my favourite one and they sold out around 3pm today, Im glad to got it. I even ate too fast before I realized to take a picture! Rum cake can taste real rum flavour inside. They hide some raisin inside the cake to bring out the whole texture. Drinks used simple ingredients but very refreshing. I saw they were washing and cut fruits for preparation. I love to see business to use fresh ingredients to highlight their standard in food industry. Very pleasing experience for afternoon snack, will definitely go back again with our children to try their other products!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: So fun and delicious!! I love that you can mix and match the drinks and cake. My fav so far is the tiramisu cake with the brown sugar milk tea
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for coming by! Have a great day!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Ordered combo #5. The matcha latte (I asked them to switch corn milk with regular milk for my drink) was very tasty. The cake went perfectly with the drink. Now I understand why they make these two items a combo. I especially love the decorations in the shop. The two ladies at the front desk were very friendly. The containers they used are different from usual bobble tea shop. I can tell they put lot of efforts on everything. More on the pricy side, but worth trying!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Really cute place selling both cold tea and CAKE--all in delicious and unique flavours. Came here yesterday and they were very organized and systematic with Covid rules in place. I got the earl grey cake which was very creamy and not too sweet. I also got the honeycomb dalgona latte and  recommend swirling the foam with milk thoroughly before drinking.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Good combination, dessert and drink, right amount of sweetness. Cute little place. Several options to choose.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Great desserts that were much more then I was expecting. The cake and the drink pairing is such a neat idea, I will definitely be back to try another. I got the seasonal coconut taro ube cake with the mango sago coconut slush. The cake was not too sweet and a perfect light summer cake. The slush paired well as it was not too sweet. My friend and I both got drinks and found them less sweet then we were expecting. For me, I found this a pleasant surprise, but she got a matcha drink and didnt like it as much. So, if you are expecting or wanting a bubble tea level of sweetness, might want to check with the staff about which drinks are sweet. The service was quick (much quicker than bubble tea usually) and I would love to come back and try more flavour combos.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Love the cake+drink combo concept! You can easily devour the delectable   and immediately go for a sip of the  , rinse and repeat   Wonder if someone patented that design because it s just genius and perfect for devouring on the run Had the  cake + lychee iced tea combo with zero sugar and boy this combo was super yum! Cake was sweetened just right and took me back to my childhood when I gorged on Melona treats, but this was better! The Lychee tea had really refreshing fruit bits, this combo is solid! Also tried the   raspberry   cake + hawthorn dates refresher with zero sugar and this was fab too. Now here s my 2 cents on the pricing of the 2 dessert combo - it s pretty fair y all! First we typically pay $7 for a decent cake anyway and also another $7 for a good quality non powdered bbt (you know what I m talking about) and this place is a one-stop shop for you to address your need for a little something nice and sweet. Would I come back again, you bet!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: The staff, location, desserts, and atmosphere are so worth it! A unique treat. A mouse like cake of your choice with a yummy drink. Id recommend it for a date night idea, a unique treat, a birthday adventure. And the staff were very friendly to boot!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: The fresh mango passion fruit combo was great, but I think the cup design is a bit odd because the straw is kinda stuck and can t stir the drink because of the top round cup.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Perfection each time! I trust no one else to make my cakes. The whole process is done by email, turnaround is quick and professional. I love that they offer delivery and for the quality, the prices are comparable. Thank you Minus!!!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: I live in Calgary and wanted to get something as a surprise for my close friend who lives in Vancouver. Found this little bubble tea bake shop online and they exceeded my expectations. They went above and beyond in terms of my delivery and cake request. My friend absolutely loved it. Definitely recommend this place for being so accommodating and sweet. Phenomenal food and service. Thanks so much again!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: I m not sure if it s a drink place or a dessert place, but who cares! You can have your cake/bbt and eat it too! Decor is adorable. Cuddle cakes are so soft and delicate, not too sweet, and so delicious. Dessert cups a little on the pricy side, drink + dessert cup = $13-14

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Amazing   really good drinks and desserts, fast service and friendly staff - interior is really cute too :)

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Very innovative desserts and drinks here. Definitely unique and never seen before. They combine a cake and a drink which you can eat and drink with one hand, perfect for on the go. Not too sweet, seems they tailored it just nicely. Friendly owner, very helpful staff. Street parking is a bit limited. Left: blackcurrant rum raisin cake with lychee slush Mid: chocolate cake with Oreo slush Right: Earl Grey cake with dalgona latte *Edit: owner told me there is more street parking around the side, and a larger parking lot behind their building! Now it is even easier to visit!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: We went last week for walk in but realized they don t open for walk in anymore. Everything pre order only. We are their returned customer so didn t check google before we went there. Luckily meet the owner, she let us know she becomes newly mom this year and she wants to make sure cakes made with freshly everyday so she has to make this difficult decision. No maternity leave is cruel for a mom, and she has to take care of her baby plus working everyday. Please be nice to small business owners, they are trying to make things better!!!!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Amazing cakes and drinks! We go every week :) the cake/ drink combo are very cute very IG-able! Delicious cakes. Our fav are chocolate, chocolate caramel, green tea yuzu, and strawberry. Yummy, dif textures inside, not too sweet.  Drinks are very yummy too!! Matcha latte has got loads of matcha powder! Jasmine tea with pearls and milk foam is nice too I like it that this particular tea is unsweetened I think..

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: One of the best dessert place. Wonderful drinks and all kinds of seasonal cakes. My favorite place.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Gorgeous, delicious, light and not too sweet. So happy. Thank you so much for such a beautiful cake!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Ordered a birthday cake and I am very satisfied :D! The cake is very pretty and it was delivered on time despite I asked for an earlier delivery time at the last minute.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Amazing cake and such lovely people - a perfect local spot. LOVE this bakery.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Been ordering a couple of times! Although a bit pricy but the desserts amaze me every time!!! Will be recommending to all my friends

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Late Review We have ordered from Minus Cake Boutique for many festive occasions and our favourite cake is the Jasmine Pearl Lava Cake. It is very creamy with subtle salty and sweet caramelized filling. Unfortunately when I bought the 8inch cake for my mothers birthday November 27, 2021, we discovered the cream in the centre was sour- like sour cream. This made the entire cake taste weird and off-putting . We called the next morning to ask the baker if they knew what happened, although they were not sure and had some hypothesis (maybe they forgot to thin out the cream with fresh cream?) Minus Cake Boutique took ownership of their product and offered to refund (if we bring the cake back) or make a replacement cake. I purchased many times from Minus and a refund was not what I was looking for. I simply wanted to inform them about the quality of their item. There was no way my family could eat another whole  8inch cake (we hate wastage and were determined to carve the sour cream part out of the first cake and make do with what we had) so I suggested making a smaller 6inch one so that we could taste what the cake should taste like. Minus Cake Boutique delivered and we picked up the remade cake and I am grateful and super happy to say, it tasted just the way we remembered it to be. Thank you very much for coming through with excellent customer service. We are very happy and will continue to buy your specialty cakes in the future. Already eyeing another cake for our next festive celebration.
response_from_owner_text: Hello Sigman, Thank you so much for allowing us the chance to rectify this quality issue. We appreciate your patronage to date and look forward to serving you more!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: The best cake place ever! Ordered a wonderful birthday cake from here and it s just perfect. The flavour is superb and the it looked amazing! I ve tried many cake places and this is the only one I will keep ordering cakes from. The drink with the mini cake is really tasty and unique too, aside from being a little pricey.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Ive been seeing a lot of posts from this cake boutique and decided to try it. I really like the overall decor. The presentation of the cake and  drink is very unique as well!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Absolutely delicious. Much better than a traditional bubble tea. Can tell its made from quality ingredients.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: I ordered a mango mousse cake for my birthday and I have to say, this is the best mousse cake in Vancouver!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Wonderful little cafe, I brought my girlfriend here and she enjoyed the cakes and drinks. Definitely a great dating spot if youre looking for something cute. The aesthetic of the place has a great setting for photos. The drinks we had were Earl Grey cake/Rose chocolate & Mango coconut cake/green matcha :)

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Cake is so pretty and taste good!! Drink also good too!! Highly recommended~

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Drinks: Passion Fruit Grapefruit Refresher and Strawberry Peach Slush Cake: Brown sugar hojicha mochi cake and Earl grey toasted At first I was worried that the drinks was going to be too sweet since there was no option to tweak the sugar/ice level, but they turned out to be just right for my taste, not too sweet. Cakes were yummy too. Again, not too sweet and very good textures.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: I place an order for a cake for my nephew for his 1 month. The cake was yummy! Not too sweet and just the perfect flavor. The display box was top notch better than the white soild box. I have order dessert here before and it was good flavor. Will order a customize cake for my sons birthday

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Great dessert shop - their combos with tea/milk and cake are super creative. I got the Strawberry combo and no regrets! Place is super clean and they follow all rules during COVID times.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: I came across this dessert shop while waiting for sharetea and the line was too long so I gave this place a try as I saw the menu on the window and seemed fresh and interesting.. Having drink and cake at the same time in one cup is definitely a game changer! At first I was a bit skeptical thinking of the combo would be too sweet but surprisingly it wasn t at all. Visited this place 2 times and my favorite combo is the peach slush and peach oreo cake.. the earl grey cake is pretty tasty too. Strawberry milk taste a bit bland but once you stir the strawberry compote well on the bottom..It s pretty amazing..the pear osmanthus drink was bit too light for my taste but my wife loved it..overall great place with friendly staff and great desserts! Def becoming my go to place!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Got a customized cake for my moms bday and she loved both the way it looked and the taste. Also got a chance to go get the cake and drink combo from the Cafe! Both are delicious and have been taking a lot of friends there. I follow their IG, so not surprised to see when they close early because they are selling out everything sometimes.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Great friendly and quick service. Flavour pairings were great, interesting, and satisfying.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Those cups are sooo adorable. PRETTIEST Desserts EVER! Love the earl grey cake and strawberry fresh milk! So Yummy. Highly recommend checking out this cute place and you will be happy you did!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Wide variety of drinks, tasty cakes, and really cute decor. Limited seating, but super cosy!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Definitely worth visiting, the design, combination and flavors are unique and you can choose from a very large variety of unique flavors. I love the Japanese matcha cake and Choco London milk tea most.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: What an intriguing cup design - combining cake and drink together! I had combo 1 - vanilla osmanthus lychee cake + osmanthus pear juice with basil seeds. At first, I thought it would be too heavy/sweet. But to my great surprise, the combo was just right! The cake was light, moist and not too sweet. I love the drink, so refreshing. Will go again!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Nice ambience, delicious food and drink. The strawberry milk tastes delicious; the milk is not diluted like such in other bubble tea shops.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for coming by! Have a great day and hope to see you again

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Amazing! Amazing! Amazing! The minus cups are completely genius. Both the drink and the cake are perfectly flavoured and not too sweet.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Best place to grab dessert and more. Fabulous idea and excellent presentation of the food. Love the cake and drink combo. Not much space to sit. You may want to get it delivered or grab it and enjoy in your car.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Lovely cakes pair perfectly with their bubble tea.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Great flavour! Lovely texture.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Little cute boutique cafe, fresh smoothie is so tasty!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Cake was tasty and right level of sweetness. Also it was aesthetically pleasing as well. The cafe interior was also very cute. Would be a nice place to hangout post pandemic.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Had a great time here. Deliciously moist cakes and hand crafted bubble tea. I personally believe its better value than share tea next door.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Nice and clean place. Tasty food! I ll definitely come back again !

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Traveled from Victoria to try this! It was delicious and 100% worth the trip.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: I have nothing but good things to say! Kind staff. I have boughten two cakes from here as birthday gifts for others and heard nothing but raving reviews back. Really cute interior.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: The cake is really good and not too sweet and the variety of drinks is phenomenal. I ve been back more than three times already!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: It is pretty nice taste with beautiful appearance!!! Love it a lot!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Such a cute shop, and fun concept. And the gourmet drink and cake are so tasty!! I completely recommend trying the kiwi lemonade! Its refreshing

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Had the Pandan Pineapple Coconut Cake with Fresh Kiwi Lemonade and I loved it! Probably will order less sweet for the drink next time.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: very cute little dessert place in the neighborhood! very interesting concept and beautiful presentation!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Have ordered birthday cake from them twice, and loved the look and loved the taste.  Also enjoyed their dessert cup + drink combo.  Very neat!

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Hai we celebrate our daughter birthday this month cake was fantastic everyone loved it my small suggestion is to add more flavours and more design please and thank you

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: Innovative design for combining cake and drink . I had cake#8 + drink#8, taste great, will definitely come back to try others!

review_text: The girls are super sweet and the cakes are freaking amazing!!!! The earl grey latte and toasted rice cake are to die for.

review_text: Delicious, recommend No 2 and 8

review_text: Super creative internet celebrity dessert shop Ordered #6 Xiantao Oolong combo The drinks and cakes are not too sweet It won t taste too greasy There are so many choices that I have difficulty choosing. The store is also great for taking photos Will try other flavors next time

review_text: The idea of the small cake milk tea is so great, I am no longer afraid that I will not be able to enjoy the two delicacies together~ I look forward to more flavors in the future.

place_name: Minus Cake Boutique (Pre Order Only, No Walk-In)
review_text: The combination of cakes and drinks is very special, and the store is also very delicate

Yesterday night we ordered butter chicken pizza and creamy cheese pizza, these pizzas were amazing! The chicken was tender, and that buttery sauce was something else. It had a bit of kick, but the creaminess balanced it perfectly. Unique and tasty   Creamy Cheese Pizza was a cheesy dream. Loads of cheese all over the place. Thanks Paragon Pizza for satisfying our pizza cravings tonight! If you re looking for some seriously good slices, give them a try. You won t be disappointed!

So, I just ordered my first pizza from Paragon Pizza today for lunch at my work place. It was awesome! I ordered a Butter Chicken Pizza, and added onion and tomato. There was a lovely little zing from the banana peppers in the background, but it was not overwhelming. It was too much food for me, so I offered some to my team coworkers, and their response was that it was very good, indeed. One of my coworkers had a second piece, and it was only a small pizza to begin with. Definitely a spectacular choice for pizza, so check it out!

Treated my family for pizza from Paragon the other day. I was drawn to promo deals via Door Dash and Best Eaters Combo ($39.99) seemed perfect for 9 of us. I ordered Butter Chicken Pizza, Everything Special, chicken wings and bread stick. I didn t know bread sticks were substitution for additional wings for the order. Food was pretty good. All my families were happy even nieces and nephew. Wings were very tasty too. One niece told me it was bit spicy, but everyone else liked it. The deal was unbeatable. Bread sticks were good too. I wish they had extra amount of wings in stock. Food was pretty memorable. I liked 2 free pops included in the combo.

I love their pizza! Perhaps one of the best pizzas I had in Vancouver (pizzas are usually loaded).. Absolutely love them.. They do have deals and sometimes, I was lucky to get pop or mango lassi free with my pickup.. Folks, I highly recommend them

I ordered house special pizza one hour before, and the young lady did so well it was really busy and she was working her self, but she still greeted amazingly. she was super fast and prepared the pizza in 12 minutes. I really appreciate I will definitely order next time from her or because their recipe is really good.
Best hospitality ever. I love the pizza. The pizza tastes so good. I want more. It is a must try for pizza lovers. The menu was well planned for veggies and meat lovers.

Their food never disappoints. No matter what the contents of the pizza, all pizzas taste delicious. We have tried their paneer and chicken pizzas and they are  mouthwatering and quite delightful. Also appreciate the fact they have stayed consistent in providing this taste over the years, always felt good about ordering from there. Go to for Indian style pizza!

Great taste and prices. I would recommend this to all those who are looking for some pizza options with Indian touch. Especially loved their creamy paneer pizza   The one in picture is a tandoori chicken pizza for my boyfriend which he said was equally good

Great family owned restaurant, reasonable prices, customer service, and delicious pizza! The owner gave my kids a free slice of pepperoni pizza while we waited and drew a picture on the box for my kids. Love the extra thought and will definitely be coming back here again!
I am not exaggerating or kidding when I say this is the best pizza I ve ever had
We got the cheese pizza and it was amazing!! Staff is super kind also :)

Revised review: omg the pizza here is so good! Do pick up to ensure your pizza is fresh and is the correct one. I ordered my pizza after dance class around 10 and it was ready in 10 minutes. I highly suggest ordering a pizza and picking it up vs buying a slice at the window. I bought the shahi paneer pizza and the flavours are amazing. If you like indian style pizza, this is a place to check out. Original review: Pizza was ok. Stumbled upon this place while waiting for the bus. Ill try ordering a whole pizza next time. It might be better. The slices are $2. It appeared that they were cooking many pizzas to prepare for the highschool lunch rush
Just loved the way they make it Indian style . Their creamy veggie paneer is beyona amazing. Thank you for the good pizza .
Butter chicken Pizza was yummy, with lots of toppings.
Surprisingly this is the tastiest pizza I ve had in Vancouver. A literal hidden gem. So tasty

It took all of about 2 minutes for our pizza to be para-GONE! They went absolutely above and beyond for my partner who has celiac disease by going and purchasing gluten free crust even though they were out at the time. The delivery took a little longer, but they just wanted to make sure we could safely eat our pizza. When it got here it was fresh, hot, and delicious! The pepperoni seemed to be sliced from the sausage of god, because it was far above average. Thanks Paragon! We ll be ordering again :)

A great spot for fresh pizza. Had the any slice for $2 special and it was fast and tasty. Good sauce levels and good cheese amounts. They do a really good job and you can t beat the price and convenience.
Delicious and great food I have had in my neighborhood . Thank you Vamshi and team for the understanding the customer needs and customizing the food products. Definitely revisit!!!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback

review_text: Good Indian style pizza and good price. The topping is nice. A little fast service would be really nice. Give yourself ample amount of time for your order. It takes a while as mostly only single person working in there.
Really good pizza, and very friendly staff
Great customer service, amazing pizza! I can tell they love what they do! I strongly recommend Paragon Pizza!
Very delicious pizza and affordable!

I visited to Vancouver last week and I heard from so many relatives about paragon pizza. They told me to try it once. We ordered butter chicken pizza from them. I went there for pick up of pizza and I was very impressed from customer service and moreover they give free dips with pizzas as well. Taste of pizza was so good and it was not that expensive too. For family parties it is highly recommendable.

This isnt your ordinary fast food pizza place like pizza hut, dominoes and many other pizza chain. This is a local pizza shop with very generous amount of toppings. The ingredients taste fresh and the weight of their slices had to be at least 2 times heavier than a chain pizza shop.
Fresh and delicious, my go to pizza store always, they never disappoint on any pizza, must try.
Best pizza in South Van. Excellent customer service. On time delivery and delicious pizza for all kinds of pizza lovers.

Used to be Round table pizza and is mostly the same.  I recommend their specialty pizzas as they are loaded up with toppings.  This is also a traditional thicker base and crust so if you are looking for thin crispy bases this might not be for you.

I placed an order around 10:55and the closing time was 11 but the girl who took my order she was very polite and sweet to took my order . She was very generous to served me at that time. She made my day and also the food was very delicious.

Have been ordering from Paragon since I moved back to Vancouver almost two years ago. The pizza is always hot and fresh, and their service is always genuine and friendly. Cant ask for much more than that.

Really like the pizza here and they have always been nice and friendly to me so I wonder about other peoples experince and what they did to turn it sour... I always pick up because Im not lazy and its not easy or pracrical running around delivering pizza. Funny pretty much all the reviews that are bad are delivered.
So yummy! Highly recommend. Delicious for me and my cat
Got the supreme. Great pizza and fairly quick. They sell slices also.
Butter chicken pizza and creamy veggie paneer pizza are very delicious.customer service is awesome.i always get delivery within time.i had great experience with them.

yummyyyyyyy.....creamy veggie paneer is really delicious ..I tried so many other locations for pizza but nobody can beat paragon pizza...I always recommend others to try atleast one time then definitely u will eat again and again...
Osm pizza really good crust flooded with toppings and so good flavors Loved it
Best taste pizzas. Everybody must try. Staff is very nice and respectful.
I loved their pizza one time. Super great pizza
Delicious ! Had it multiple times now and consistently tasty
Best pizza place in Vancouver, Shahi Paneer is the best pizza in town, simply divine, Paneer is pure cheese, not the fake stuff with chemicals we put in our bodies willingly.
I ordered pizza for the very first time it was very tasty.Delivery was to fast,Really impressed with the quality of the pizza nd well experienced Staff.Love the pizza place
Paragon pizza is best for me forever..really its best from all corners,its taste...yum ...delivery each &everything.another pizzas cant beat it .I highly recommend to everyone to try it.
Best and friendly place to order pizza. Yummy chicken pizzas. Such an amazing experience with PARAGON PIZZA. Wanna to eat everyday....
Pizza here is really good, prices are not bad as well.
So delicious. Good customer service. They also help me to charge my phone , during the power cut. Thanks.
wow very yummy. I really love the paragon supreme pizza& creamy veggie paneer.best best pizza in town.
Paragon pizza is the best pizza in Vancouver I think. Service , quality and price are great. I recommend Paragon pizza to everyone

guys i must say a really loved the fried fish n chips and chicken pakora here and must try other pizzas too
I highly recommend the Chipotle chicken pizza from this place .!! These guys are very good in chicken specialty pizzas !! Its very place to order food for your party !!
Amazing Pizza. My favourite pizza from this place is Butter chicken. Best Pizza in Vancouver
Awesome taste and varieties of pizza and it will be delivered hot no matter what the weather is.
Yummy .delicious.top quality ingredients. I suggest to everyone try from this pizza store.
One of the best place for crispy and delicious pizza specially vegetarian one . I love this place
The 12.99 walk in pepperoni pizza special is the best pizza in south van :3
Razia is a stunning dynamo, and she will build a wonderful pizza for you.
Delicious margherita pizza and quick service. Buy 10 get the 11th free!
Great local spot. Never disappointed! And love their chipotle chicken pizza
Good Pizza and Good Proportions, would get some more again!
Very delicious pizza. Good price and quality
Best shahi paneer pizza ever. Must try.
Very fast service , I surprised. Pizza was very delicious.
Chain serving pizzas with a variety of toppings & sauces in a simple space.
Very clean store and food was awesome with good combination of price.
We have been customers here for years and have never had any complaints
well, what can i say, i love their pizza,
Amazing, love the pepperoni pizza!
We order from there every two weeks
Always delicious. Highly recommended.
non veg pizza very tasty

This is like a hidden gem! The food was amazing and the service was great. I got the $12.50 pick up special for the rice, naan and curry. I was waiting to get food at KFC but the line was too long! I was walking around and decided to opt for this place instead as it said  best curry  on the sign. The service was quick, the food was fresh and you could tell the meats were marinaded in the curry due to the nice colour gradient from the protein. Super flavourful, the mild curry is basically non-spicy and everything was packed nicely and a good portion. Didn t get a photo of the naan as I was too hungry and forgot  Would come back and would recommend.

Best place in town for butter chicken. Ive been here many times and the quality and quantity of the food are very much worth the price. I ordered a large butter chicken, lamb curry and 3 naan bread, which is enough to feed 3 people, and I was given 12 pieces of naan bread. If youre craving authentic Indian food, check this place out.

5 stars for the butter chicken. Seriously the best I ve ever had. The pick up special was super generous, four big pieces of naan, and probably 3-4x the amount of rice and curry in the pic. All for 12.50. The tandoori pizza was only OK. Good crust and nice charring on the bottom but bland cheese and tandoori pieces were also meh. Get the butter chicken.
I ordered chicken and mushrooms pizza on Monday. So delicious and the bread is just right not tough or too soft

BUTTER CHICKEN IS A MUST! Uber eats review! I got the butter chicken and and chicken tikka masala. they are both amazing! Give amazing portions for your buck with lots of flavours. Don t ever change your recipe or portions because this is too amazing. Butter chicken: this is my favourite out of the two. Lots of flavours, chicken and spices. Don t forgot to ask for tomatoes, onions etc on the side. Also get their garlic naan! It matches so perfectly with this dish! Chicken was a bit dry, but I like to shred them into pieces. Love the amount of chicken Chicken tikka masala: this is super delicious and have a more refreshing herb and spices taste to it. Has onions and peppers in the dish if you like more veggies in your dish. Would definitely come here again and order! The best butter chicken I had so far in Vancouver and highly recommend for those to come and try!
Hands down the best butter chicken in Vancouver. Also the most affordable, $13 for a full meal with rice + naan included
Best pizza in the town !! Today I first time ordered one tandoori chicken pizza from this restaurant and it was delicious, best quality
Had best Indian style pizza after soo long, must try. Highly recommended.
Classicaly good pizza. Get an order of the fantastic butter chicken! 10/10
Delicious pizzas, ordered on DoorDash arrived on time! There are soo many paneer pieces on my Pizza!

As you have probably guessed from reading the other reviews, this place really does have the best butter chicken. My husband and I came across this place by accident and thought we d give it a try - what an amazing accident! We normally get their pick up special, really nice portions and the food is always hot and fresh. It s also run by some really nice people, we always get a friendly hello and great service.
Only thing I miss about Vancouver is Papa days. I lived right down the road so the owner himself would deliver my pizza, absolute gem of a person.
I fully recommend the Indian menu. Best Indian takeaway Ive had in BC since arriving from Europe.

I m a regular customer their and my go to is the butter chicken special and a soft drink staff and the taran is very friendly I highly recommend you come and try papa days they never miss always perfect

While on my way to Tswassen, I had a quick pit stop and ordered their Butter Paneer Masala Pizza. The Pizza was overloaded with veggies and paneer. It was delicious and lip smacking. The staff was super friendly and they also made sure that the pizza stayed hot by keeping it near the pizza oven, and packed it when I came back. The smell was so good, that I forgot to click a photograph and just munched on the slices. Amazing  restaurant for a pick up and enjoy some amazing Indian flavoured pizzas. I bet their Indian food is awesome too. I will be back for more.
This place has some of the best curry in town in my opinion. Looking forward to trying a pizza some day.

We recently moved into the area and my room mate got their butter chicken. Hands down the best weve ever had. Chicken tikka is oh so delicious. Cant wait to try there pizzas now. Also were always greeted with a smile or a happy hello.

Five stars is about ten stars too few. Honestly, Ive only ever ordered the same thing from them:  Large Butter Chicken, Large Rice, and Naan... Papa Days Pizza & Indian Cuisine has become my reference for what Butter Chicken should taste like. Heres my advice:  Go! Flavorful is an understatement. Large, hearty portions is an understatement. Friendly folk who smile and clearly love their craft is an understatement. A magically fantastic place.
The food is great   everything khana is amazing Shai paneer,  tikka masala and they have the best butter chicken in town...

I laughed as my hubby drove by the place and said  wow, they claim to have the best butter chicken in town  he gave me a straight face like he was sort of offended, and muttered  ... they do  fast forward 3 weeks later.. gave it a try and wow, the butter chicken really is good. Has a lot of flavour and good price for the amount. Definitely will be my go to for butter chicken, was worth the commute.
We ordered medium Tandoor Paneer pizza, it was fully loaded and the taste was amazing. Cheese, sauce, toppings all great. Quite little restaurant with extraordinary food. Definitely recommend
Been going here awhile, they really put love in their food. They have a pickup special that is a good portion for a great price.

I love this place! I work nearby and order from them once every 1-2 weeks, and our workplace also ordered in from Papa Days for both our staff Christmas lunch and a snow day pizza party. Both the indian cusine and the pizza are very well done. I find Papa Days to taste way more authentic than the majority of Indian spots in Vancouver, especially for the price and speed of service. Any dishes Ive ever ordered are always ready in 10-15 minutes, and the servings are huge for the price. This is a small, family run business and the owner is extremely nice and always does his best to accomodate any requests that I have. I definitely recommend it.

This place has amazing butter chicken! Good prices, great food, great service. Every time I pick up food, its always super hot and fresh. The pickup special is so much food, its always 2 meals for me.

I order the spicy butter chicken carry out special at least twice a week. Comes with rice and buttered bread. Cant be beat for the price. $12.00 after tax. Call in 15/20 minutes before arrival and its hot and ready.

I have been coming to Papa Days for my Indian food for 9 years because it is the best Indian in the city!! All of my out of city friends love it and request every time they are in Vancouver! Family run and friendly, amazing food and taste. Forget Vijs. This hole in the wall is where it is at.

Good Indian food in large quantities for take out.   We ordered the large portion and it served the two of us 3 meals each!  Butter chicken had more tomato than usual, but was still really good.  Chicken Masala was a good amount of spicy.

Been coming here since last 2 years. Love the food always consistent with their quality, taste, and customer service. This evening I picked up palak paneer & naan and taste is no different than i tried it for the first time. Words can t describe how much me, my girlfriend and our brother love this place.
I usually get the Indian take out special. It is reasonably priced, large enough portion for 2, maybe 3, and it s hot and ready quick. A great option if you need to pick up something delicious quick.

Great food and service - especially love Mom s special saag - wish she cooked this every day!! Hidden gem of a restaurant worth the u-turn and busy traffic in the area. Parking: Never had a problem finding a space - that said, there isn t a copious number of spots.
Had a paneer and veg pizza, very tasty .   recommend to everyone

First time ordered from them, and We loved the food, ordered a regular pick up special dal makhani and Butter chicken. The food was tasty and the portions were good too. Also, their Dal makhani tasted like Gurudwara langar dal.

We love Papa Days!! The best Shahi Paneer in Vancouver. When me and my bf went through our vegetarian phase we would order from them at least once a week. The employees are always so nice on the phone and helpful when we ask for their opinion. Portions are fairly good, we usually pay for 2 large orders (shahi paneer and some other curry) plus tons of garlic nan and we always have a good amount of left overs for the next day. Support local
Excellent food! I have had my fair share of butter chicken but this place is top notch in Vancouver. The service is exceptional! Will be back again.
Best butter chicken in town. Husband is a fan of tandoori chicken pizza. Always received with warm smiling faces.
Have ordered from here numerous times personally and at work. Great experience every time! Best pizza crust out there. I have been a customer for over 5 years without a single issue ever.
Stumbled across this restaurant and decided to order the take out special. Wow the butter chicken, portion size, and price is amazing. My new go to spot!
Delicious and good prices. Quick for pick up. Had shahi paneer pick up special, butter chicken pick up special, and malai kofta. All great flavours and lots of food!!
Fantastic food, great pizza, the Indian dishes are their forte, and these guys can do it all ... even lasagna.  Great prices, if youre in the area, drop by.  Will not regret!
Loved the food, would definitely visit again
I drive all the way from kitsalano Best curry.  Great price Great knowledgeable owner In trying to persuade him to do Curry chicken pizza The first in Vancouver for delivery
Never had a single thing here that I wasnt impressed with.  Order here all the time and will continue to!  Butter chicken, curry chicken, lasagne, pizza...its all good!
This place offers the best pizza and currys in lower mainland. I always order from this place, my food usually is ready within 15mins. Great customer service skills.
Classic mom&pap pizza joint.  Not greasy like Pizza Hut, not soggy like dominos.  Decent price & usually under ten minutes.  Warm atmosphere.  No delivery
Tasty Indian food. I crave the biryani and thought it was the same at most places but this is still my top spot for takeout. Efficient and well-priced.
Owner / guy at the front was really friendly and welcoming. Pizza was great and exceeded expectations! Will definitely be ordering again
Authentic Indian food. Fair price, excellent service. Superb !!
Best lamb korma and butter chicken in Vancouver
Seen this place for years.  Got take out butter chicken and curry chicken.  Very tasty and good portion size.
For the price, this place has the best butter chicken in town. They even give you lots of naan to go along with it. Cant beat it.
Desi taste and they cook food with love. It reminds me of Indian Dhaba Desi taste and all dishes are awesome. Specially Palak Paneer with garlic naan. Good combo options for all.
Wow, super and yummy After so long, finally got amazing pizza taste. Tried first time and it s really nice.
Food was great! Ordered multiple dishes enjoyed all of them with my family! Will continue ordering from here!
Ive tried all the non franchise pizza in the area and they are by far the best. And the best price for 2 large pizza aswell.
I love their pizza. They also have india special pizza.
Hey , had a great experience with them. Everything is so yummy, a great customer service experience. A good Indian joint in Vancouver.
Staff is super friendly.... food is fantastic.... my favorite is mixed vegetables with rice and a bottle of sprite and for my son a cheese and pineapple pizza.... will always be my favorite place
Very good pizza price is a bit expensive.  Amazing veggie and also like that it comes wit free ranch
This joint has it down to a science! Super satisfying pizza everytime and the menu features a fine tuned selection of classic favorites and specialty recipes.Yum!
Nice food just cooked like @home. Not just packed with spices but equal taste of food
Amazing food! Owner is  so nice.  A little gem tucked away. 5 STARS
The Butter Chicken Pizza hands down, best Indian pizza I have had in all of Winnipeg or Vancouver.
Butter chicken and chicken tikka masala just tooo good.  Raita is one of the best Ive had!
Ordered a butter chicken and it was awsome. I must recommend this to my friends. Best in vancouver.
Take out special is my go to. Butter chicken and Chana Masala are both great.
Wow ordered malai kofta it was soooooo good Loved it would definitely order again and again Also the delivery was fast and the delivery person was very nice and friendly
Quick friendly service, great food, great prices, nice clean place. Their pizzas are unparalleled! Absolutely amazing!!
My favorite go-to place for butter chicken special and the owners are always friendly.
Been coming here for ages, one of the few remaining places in Vancouver for affordable tasty food with generous portions.
The food was absolutely wonderful. Menu is perfect. Will be back definitely!
Love the butter chicken pizza here! My go to spot when we visit Vancouver!
Best pizza Ive had in awhile. Ive tried the butter chicken pizza, whats next on the menu?
Great tasting curry ! The Indian guy taking order is so niceeeeee !
Best better  chiken
delicious butter chicken ! I must say all those reviews are True :)
Very good food  very affordable. Very friendly staff. Highly recommend.
One of the best Indian food and pizza in Vancouver. Love it
butter chicken is amazing ! really cheap for a good portion !
True Best butter chicken in town. Superb service.
Fast and the food is really good also the people who work there are nice
Best food and customer service
Im in love with their butter chicken and naan bread.
Ordered the meat lovers pizza.  It was great!
Really love their pizzas ! Do try them
Tandoori pizza is amazing. Always a good deal.
just had the butter chicken, it was bomb! CHECK THIS PLACE OUT
Butter chicken is best and affordable prices
Love the butter chicken and naan
Very tasty chicken wings

place_name: MJ Physio & Massage (Fraser Street Physio) - Physio In Vancouver
review_text: Staff are amazing! I ve been a patient in this clinic for almost 3 yrs now for my Physio therapy with Krishna. She s such a great PT, helps me alot with my treatment issues. And lately I m doing my massage therapy with Tony also. They re awesome! Great job! Thank you very much.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback, we will keep it up. krishna has 25 years of experience and is an amazing physio for sure .

place_name: MJ Physio & Massage (Fraser Street Physio) - Physio In Vancouver
review_text: I am utterly greatfull  Mrs Rajwant chahal Physiotherapist she is very kind, attentive and very gentle with patients. And she is a great human being. And the simran she is very kind and helpfull im extremely reccomend this place to every one. We are visiting at our baddest moment but like these people make it brightest moment. Thank you very much for all.

place_name: MJ Physio & Massage (Fraser Street Physio) - Physio In Vancouver
review_text: I chose MJ Physio because they had a physiotherapist that could help with my concussion and it was close enough that I could walk to it with minimal symptoms. Im so happy I found it and Krishna! Ive been receiving concussion therapy for two months now and its like Im finally human again. I can walk, bike, and drive again, and my cognition and screen time tolerance is improving with the exercises. None of this was the case when I first started with Krishna. During my first session, Krishna quickly identified that my vision was affected by the concussion and that is the likely cause of my symptoms. It was a huge relief to understand why I was feeling so yucky and have a plan to fix it. Thank you so much!!!

place_name: MJ Physio & Massage (Fraser Street Physio) - Physio In Vancouver
review_text: i went there for my uncle physio appoinmnt.Dr Krishnajeeja treated my uncle really well before going to the appoinmnt my uncle was not able to move properly . krishnajeeja helped him really well nd educate him how he can take care to prevent nd heal from the injury really fast. Dr jeeja is very professional nd knowledgable . I recommend everyone to visit this place for fast recovery.

place_name: MJ Physio & Massage (Fraser Street Physio) - Physio In Vancouver
review_text: Krishna treated my left hip bursitis and knee injury from golf, on 1st day of season. My pain was so bad I couldn t walk & completely bent over the next day and on. I should ve gone to my doc for a shot(which I found out later), but a week later, I went to MJ physio. She used ultrasound & tens machine to help heal. She told me about certain exercises that I should do to strengthen & stretching my glutes & hamstrings, as I wasn t in good shape to play golf. Doc said it d take 6-12 weeks, but I played my first golf 5 weeks after injury and I played better because I was more stronger in my core and glutes. I m still getting treatments b c of sore left shoulder & back and she s used shock therapy for shoulder and it has rapidly helped the shoulder. My back pain is also getting better. 6 weeks later now, I m playing golf better & I can run if I have to, btw, I m a newish senior. I m planning to check in with Krishna from time to time if I feel aches & pains. Thanks much, Krishna!

place_name: MJ Physio & Massage (Fraser Street Physio) - Physio In Vancouver
review_text: My experience is wonderful with MJ Physio & Message. They spend good amount of time on patients and provide the appropriate advice according to the case. I went for my wrist pain issue and now its relived.

place_name: MJ Physio & Massage (Fraser Street Physio) - Physio In Vancouver
review_text: I highly recommend Krishna Jeeja for Physiotherapy. She is professional, knowledgeable, and a very kind person. Her skills as a Physio are unrivaled and she truly cares for her patients. I have been struggling with my knee pain for more than a year now, but she helper me to recover from my injury. My knee is so much better now and I highly recommend her to anyone who needs physiotherapy treatment! The clinic is clean and well-equipped and the staff is super friendly.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you  Karthik for your comments.

place_name: MJ Physio & Massage (Fraser Street Physio) - Physio In Vancouver
review_text: I had symptoms of bppv, Krishna was very quick to fix the vertigo and dizziness issues I was experiencing Just 30 minutes after my visit, I was feeling completely back to my usual self.

place_name: MJ Physio & Massage (Fraser Street Physio) - Physio In Vancouver
review_text: I highly recommend MJ Physio & Massage. Krishna is knowledgeable, kind, and professional. I was having a lot of pain and mobility issues in my right shoulder. Krishna was able to provide excellent care and different techniques to improve it. Thanks again.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you TG , yes Krishna is our lead physio @ MJ Physio and she is an asset to our organization.

place_name: MJ Physio & Massage (Fraser Street Physio) - Physio In Vancouver
review_text: From the reception staff to the physiotherapists themselves, they are all professional, knowledgeable and caring. Dr. Rajwant Chahal 2 has been both professional and personable while expertly assisting me with my diagnosis and recovery. I can t tell you how very grateful I am to you for giving me my life back. It is very clear that your unique service and expertise cannot just be replaced by any other physiotherapy . My back injury and rehabilitation has been superbly handled and I wouldn t have regained by strength and capacity without her support.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Maya for taking the time to leave us with an excellent rating and valuable feedback. Were glad that you liked our service.

place_name: MJ Physio & Massage (Fraser Street Physio) - Physio In Vancouver
review_text: Highly recommend MJ physiotherapy Krishna for magical pain reliving therapy. She is an amazing and Professional Physiotherapist. She helped me with my knee pain and back pain. Front desk staff is resourceful, helpful ,kind and welcoming. Thank you Krishna
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Rupa for your feedback and observation reg our therapist and front desk .

place_name: MJ Physio & Massage (Fraser Street Physio) - Physio In Vancouver
review_text: I went to MJ Physio, Surrey after undergoing a major surgery for rehab. From day one, the attention and the service provided was amazing. They planned my recovery very well, step by step and provided lots of different exercises to do them at home. Mr.Ram is very knowledgeable and he made sure of my full recovery within a short duration, also gave me the courage and confidence throughout my recovery period, thank you Mr. Ram. MJ Physio has lots of talented professionals and provide service & care that are unparalleled to anything, I highly recommend MJ Physio for any physiotherapy needs.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Ganesh for your positive feedback and appreciation.

place_name: MJ Physio & Massage (Fraser Street Physio) - Physio In Vancouver
review_text: I am taking treatment at MJ physio for my back pain with Krishna Jeeja. She is an excellent, professional and gives friendly care too. I feel very relaxed with her treatment and caring conversation during the session. I would strongly recommend her who is looking for a physiotherapist.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mythili for reviewing MJ Physio .

place_name: MJ Physio & Massage (Fraser Street Physio) - Physio In Vancouver
review_text: I went to this place and had Physio. I had neck pain had couple of physio sessions and now my neck pain pretty much gone. The staff recommended me to do some of the neck exercises.

place_name: MJ Physio & Massage (Fraser Street Physio) - Physio In Vancouver
review_text: I dont even bother going to doctors anymore when I am injured.   Its so discouraging just getting handed around with nobody ever being sure what is wrong.   I just go to Krishna.  She actually knows what is wrong and quickly implements various modalities of therapy and exercise to help fix it.  The staff is pleasant friendly and professional and the rooms are clean.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Nixie for your feedback , yes Krishna is our most experienced Physio and MJ Physio is proud to have her in the team .

place_name: MJ Physio & Massage (Fraser Street Physio) - Physio In Vancouver
review_text: I have been taking treatment for my tendonitis from Krishna. She paid attention to my ailments and offered the right course of treatment. Taught me exercises to do at home. I feel better now and is able to carry out my daily activities without pain. I would highly recommend Krishna of MJ Physio for all your physiotherapy needs and to become pain free.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Suresh for your appreciation and review , yes Krishna is our lead physio in MJ Physio

place_name: MJ Physio & Massage (Fraser Street Physio) - Physio In Vancouver
review_text: Mr. Mohammed Sohel Ansari 2 is very  nice and knowledgeable in treating my knee injury, he even explain it to me clearly whats going on and introduced me to different exercise to help me recover from the pain, you can feel the big improvement on every steps of his treatment. I am very happy to meet this very kind and knowledgeable physiotherapist .
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Rosendo for your feedback about Sohel, he is an asset to MJ Physio and puts in lot of hard work to give the best .

place_name: MJ Physio & Massage (Fraser Street Physio) - Physio In Vancouver
review_text: As an Indian Classical musician, I have been tirelessly working through sitting cross legged and playing my tabla for over 10 hours a day for 30 + years. Needless to say, both Professional Hazard and age has caught up to me and I need intense physiotherapy for my neck, shoulders, arms, hips and legs. Basically, a full overhaul of my joints, ligaments and muscles. I came to see my dear friend Krishna Jeeja at her MJ Physio clinic on Fraser St and 41st in Vancouver and started my treatment. I was quite nervous as asides from the few massages I have had with my wife at couples spas I have never been to any sort of therapy in this regard. Krishna completely made me feel at ease, explaining to me the details of my therapy and what was required. She made correct analysis on all of my problem joints in my body and exactly described my pain as if it was me talking. She is very knowledgeable on the workings of the human body. I feel an intense decrease in pain ever since Krishna started treating me, as a matter of fact I feel much better now than I have in years though I am aware it will take more than a few sessions to correct my body alignment. As I have been having intense pain in my ankle bones as well as my shoulders and neck Krishna was very quick in identifying the problem as bursitis. I assumed that only cortisol can treat this pain but I was hesitant of ever getting that treatment done. After Krishna told me they treat bursitis through laser  I am looking forward to getting laser treatment done in their Surrey location. I will recommend this place to anyone in need of physio. Krishna is kind hearted, professional, direct and an absolute joy to talk to. She is friendly and makes you feel at ease. Their facility has a nice gym, state of the art equipment and a very friendly receptionist. For the first time in my life I feel that I will get better and continue my work in music. Thank you Krishna and thank you MJ Physio for being there- and thank you for supporting the Arts in our city ( MJ Physio is one of our major sponsors for our Mushtari Begum Festival of Indian Classical Music and Dance) and selflessly donating your time to our Vancouver community. I give you 6/5 stars!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback and appreciation Mr. Cassius Khan , MJ Fraser street physio is honored is to have great musicians like you as our clientele

review_text: Update .... This year I have fallen in love with Pickleball, playing almost everyday. The problem , playing outside on the hard court surface almost everyday,  it was giving me knee pain . My family doctor said it is arthritis in my knees and will have to ice and rest my knees every time I play.  Went for treatment with Ram . He checked me over and said with my range of motion ,I do not have arthritis . Ram gave me stretching exercises as well as IMS ( deep needle),muscle contraction and other Physio treatments . I can happily say my treatments were successful with no more Knee pain. I have been going for preventative treatment now every 2 - 3 weeks and still pain free playing Pickleball or Raquetball everyday .  I tell my story to anyone who has any sports pain. Ram gets my highest recommendation....Thanks so much Ram! posted 2019 : I was unsuccessful  with massage therapy  and chiropractors for my sports lower back pain. After one treatment with MJ Physio I felt less pain and could continue my gym and raquet sports workouts . After 4 treatment sessions I feel completely healed . Their treatments of IMS, massage , stretching , electrical contraction machine and an exercise regime has completely made my back 100 % better . Highly recommend Ram and his Partner to my family and friends if they have muscle / joint pain. Thanks MJ Physio for your excellent effective treatment for my lower back injury . I will not hesitate to call on you again if I have another injury.

place_name: Launder All - Commercial and Residential Laundry Service in Vancouver and Lower Mainland regions of British Columbia
review_text: This is the best laundry service experience ever. The receptionist was really helpful. She was very straightforward and made everything so easy. I didn t have Canadian cash and was unable to get cash from all those ATM machine. Fortunately they also accept U.S dollars and made the process so easy. Price was reasonable. I only spent $6 for both washing and drying. They don t have seats inside and the store is kinda small, but their service is too notch.

place_name: Launder All - Commercial and Residential Laundry Service in Vancouver and Lower Mainland regions of British Columbia
review_text: I use this laundromat for bedding and other things that my home machines cannot do, and there are always machines available at a great price. The couple who owns the business are always ready to offer advice on which machine to use and which setting for various types of clothing / bedding. Much better than other laundry options in the neighbourhood IMO.

place_name: Launder All - Commercial and Residential Laundry Service in Vancouver and Lower Mainland regions of British Columbia
review_text: I used their pickup/wash/delivery service yesterday and had a great experience. The price was fair, the person I talked to on the phone was friendly and helpful, and they also got a huge stain out of some of my stuff... Cant recommend enough :)

place_name: Launder All - Commercial and Residential Laundry Service in Vancouver and Lower Mainland regions of British Columbia
review_text: Really friendly and patient staff. Only downside is parking is hard to get by. There s parking behind the laundromat but it was hard for my camper van to get in because of cars parked on the other side of the narrow street. I parked in front of the store with the parking meter.

place_name: Launder All - Commercial and Residential Laundry Service in Vancouver and Lower Mainland regions of British Columbia
review_text: Great laundromat! The owners are so friendly and nice! Sadly there are hardly any laundromats left in Vancouver, and I hope they stay in business for many more years! I get a family run business vibe, they are hard workers and they are always busy doing tons of drop off orders but I ve never had an issue with needing a machine when I come in, have never had to wait even at busy times. They run their business very efficiently and don t put up with shenanigans. Everything takes loonies or quarters, but they will give you change at the till. Largest washing machines are $7/load, and the dryers are very fast. Usually a big load will dry in 30 minutes and cost $2.50 ish.

place_name: Launder All - Commercial and Residential Laundry Service in Vancouver and Lower Mainland regions of British Columbia
review_text: I really appreciate the nice woman greeting me and then showing me how everything works! It s funny, I never realized how much little things like this matter until I ve gotten older. THANK YOU!! Going to new places can be unnecessarily scary - your approach is greatly appreciated

review_text: Customer friendly staff. Price is reasonable.  Clean washroom. Big machines.  Busy locatiion. Morning is the best time during the week days. In & out 2 hrs.

review_text: Ive been using Launder All for my massage therapy practice linens for the past year or so. response_from_owner_text: Thanks Natasha so much for your huge valued reviews and hope you are more successful in your next journey   keep in touch

place_name: Launder All - Commercial and Residential Laundry Service in Vancouver and Lower Mainland regions of British Columbia
review_text: I come here from the Hastings-Sunrise neighborhood about once a month to do all my laundry. I love their extractors. Its like an extra spin cycle for your clothes. I took a picture. It lessens the time your clothes need to be in the dryer. Just that convenience alone is worth the $1/load cost. Its also supposed to help your clothes not get worn out so fast. After my clothes have been in the extractor for all of a few minutes, I only need to run them through the dryer for about 30 minutes and theyre totally dry. They have a variety of double loaders, triple loaders and Jumbo machines for the washers. The dryers are huge and easily take my three washers worth of clothes in one. The people running the place are very helpful. Theres plenty of tables for folding and baskets for transferring your clothing. They have a change machine and a vending machine for laundry supplies. They seem to be one of the locations doing washing for the one of the hospitals? as theyre always doing massive loads of whites or what look like regular issue surgical scrubs. They have a wash and fold service for people too busy to do their own.

review_text: Good laundromat.  Much more parking at nearby businesses on the weekend as those businesses are not open (ie. dental shop). The extractors are fantastic. review_text: Not only did they wash and iron my shirt at super short notice but these guys are one of the only dry cleaners open on sundays (which was a lifesaver for me). Also the price was cheap! Im so thankful for the people at this place im going to be coming here from now on for everything I need washed. so good.

place_name: Launder All - Commercial and Residential Laundry Service in Vancouver and Lower Mainland regions of British Columbia
review_text: This place has the nicest, most friendly staff. They are always willing to help and offer services above and beyond.. Love the pick up and drop off service.

place_name: Launder All - Commercial and Residential Laundry Service in Vancouver and Lower Mainland regions of British Columbia
review_text: Launder all is the best dry cleaning in Vancouver!! Awesome prices, friendly staff, great neighborhood, honest people and the best part is I picked up my jacket that I knew had a hole in the pocket to find it repaired (or missing?) ! BONUS!! Go here.

place_name: Launder All - Commercial and Residential Laundry Service in Vancouver and Lower Mainland regions of British Columbia
review_text: I enjoy this place and the people there are friendly. A good turn around when dropping off my clothes to wash.

place_name: Launder All - Commercial and Residential Laundry Service in Vancouver and Lower Mainland regions of British Columbia
review_text: The women, assuming owner, sooo helpful! - Im 26 - Ive never done laundry before. Like literally never - My dad cooked. My mom cleaned up - Was expecting the whole thing to be a nightmare - She saved my - Nuff said -

place_name: Launder All - Commercial and Residential Laundry Service in Vancouver and Lower Mainland regions of British Columbia
review_text: Dryer broke down in my building, came 6pm at night. My loads dried in 24 mins, in that time spent time talking to the awesome people that worked there.

place_name: Launder All - Commercial and Residential Laundry Service in Vancouver and Lower Mainland regions of British Columbia
review_text: Clean machines and friendly atmosphere. Staff is always friendly and keeps a close eye on the machines, so stepping away while your machine does its thing is never an issue.

place_name: Launder All - Commercial and Residential Laundry Service in Vancouver and Lower Mainland regions of British Columbia
review_text: I really have no time to do my own laundry so I drop my laundry off at launderall and the ladies are very professional and my clothes are so properly folded and they smell nice I am so happy with this place I highly recommend.....

place_name: Launder All - Commercial and Residential Laundry Service in Vancouver and Lower Mainland regions of British Columbia
review_text: AWESOME PLACE..I do my laundry there all the time..The people who run it are the most friendliest people I have met..so easy to talk with and always helpful. I recomend anyone to this place.... Norm G.
