I love love love the curly cheese fries! My favourite flavours are the sour cream and onion, original cheese and the sweet corn! A bit difficult to park in that area and it s very busy but the food itself just takes you back home to the Philippines.

Potato Corner brings back some great memories for me. I loved them in the Philippines and I still love them to this day. So happy they have 2 locations here and this one is nice and spacious. Friendly and helpful staff, great selection of fries and flavours, cool drinks. If you love salty snacks, make sure you grab some Potato Corner! Waffle, curly fries and tater tots are awesome!!
It s a great place to have flavoured fries. We went to Landsdowne mall and they have their food truck. Best service. Highly recommended!!

I went during a non-peak time so there was no line-up. I agree with the other reviews that it takes quite a while to get your order. My order: Sour Cream & Onion Loopy Fries (size: Mega) I really liked how it wasn t greasy at all. It s like a hybrid between fries and chips. The seasoning was great, not overly salty (had a hint of sweetness to balance the flavour), and evenly coated as well. Very crispy, and stays crispy - no sogginess even at the bottom. Process: They take your order, and then you wait for your fries to come out of this (air fryer-like?) machine - which takes a while, then they dump the fries into a tray, scoop them back up to throw them in a bucket to shake with seasoning (by hand), then throw them BACK on ANOTHER tray after seasoning, then scoop them up into your bucket/bag. Seems tedious, but I assume they have their reasons as they re a huge chain and very popular in Asia.

Really yummy fries! We got the spicy seasoning and it was delicious (reminds me of asian snack seasoning). The loopy fries were really fun as well, definitely want to try the other shapes and flavours!
I am honestly addicted to Potato Corner. I can eat it every day. My personal favourite chili barbecue

I love this place. It is pricy for just French fries but the seasonings are addictive especially the sour cream and onion. Ill always order the largest Tera size. All the fries are made to order so theyre hot and freshly fried to order. A very nice treat to have once in awhile.

Nicest person on Wednesday closing august 2, Avin if I m not spelling the name he opened the store after closing we reach there at 8:05 he made us order with such a big smile on his face. What else you need in this world when you ve such a kind heart people. Thanks to you man. ThankYou Avin You re the biggest asset for the company.
If u like heavy seasoning on chips, these fries are the next level. Licking finger good (literally) *They make it fresh, so the wait can be long
Staff is really helpful, following all the covid rules, temperature check. I tried bbq waffle for the first time and it was very spicy and delicious.
Tried chilli cheese fries from food truck, it was so good,  aman  provided best customer service.
Yummy! Fresh, hot and delicious bbq potato waffles! Excellent service and friendly staff.

Went during a non-busy time, so there was no line up. It didnt take too long to get them considering the fries came fresh out of the fryer! They were generous with the seasoning and it tasted amazing! Had the perfect amount of seasoning and a great combination of crunch and soft texture. Will definitely come back.

I had a tera size loopy French fries, and it is good! I choose two flavors,  sweet corn and an all-dressed flavor. Sweet corn is always my favorite, and all-dressed is also good but a little bit sour but I can accept that Vegetarian options: It have the vegan chili BBQ flavor, sweet corn and Wasabi flavor, so its also convenient for vegan eater Kid-friendliness: Sweet corn flavor is very sweet and has a tasty corn flavor, super good for children
So happy to have one at BC..they have more  options than what we have back home which make the place even more interesting..
The 5 star review is for the quality of the fries and flavors. I tried the sour cream and chili bbq flavors. Great tasting freshly cooked fries! I ll definitely be back!
My favourite potato in Van. Highly recommend the source cream and onion.

Still early stages of their opening so line ups a bit long (30-45 minutes depending how long is the line up) and waiting period for the fries (roughly extra 10-15 more minutes) since I guess most of them are still on training. Taste is different from the one in Philippines from way back then but its still pretty good! Recommended fries and toppings would still be Regular Fries with Half Cheese half Sour cream ( or straight up cheese!)

Amazing. Perfect. The most tasty fries. Best combo in my opinion is Cheese on Waffle fries. Wait times are totally doable if it keeps staff and customers safe. They usually start closing a half hour before they close so get there in time! :)

Friendly staff, very clean inside, great for a quick snack! Great fries, reminds me of the Philippines. Love the Chilli BBQ flavour. It is a little pricy but I understand that the power comes from the Philippines, which staff mentioned it takes about 2 months to come.

Delicious and still taste the same from what I remember when I was younger. Yes there is a long line up since the store is really small and not allowing many people inside for everyone s safety. And they cook everything fresh so you can enjoy more when it fresh. Remember Covid be kind.
Best Combo: Curly & Chili BBQ
The staff here is so approachable and patient as well
Yummy tasting fries as expected    The checkout process was quick and smooth. A bit of a wait but totally worth it!
Omg this place has amazing fries. It was freshly made and piping hot. We got the cheese and it was delicious
I love their fries! But 90% of the time there is a 30 min wait.
Reminds me so much of my childhood. I m really glad there are more Filipino catered restaurants/cafes opening up here in Vancouver!
best fries in BC!!!!  Have no idea why so many ppl gave 1 star?????
So far so good. My wife loves it.
Loved the fries!!
I LOVEDDD ITTTT    so yummmyyyyy
The truffle seasoning is amazing
Friendly employees
the best fries ever !
Chili BBQ is the best
Wicked idea soo good!!
Get a bigger size

A very famous French fries fast food restaurant. I wanted to try it before the epidemic started, but I never came because of other things. This time I finally tried it! The quality of the fries produced in this store is very stable. The fries must be freshly fried to taste the best. They are crispy and not greasy (maybe they are fried in an air fryer). If you are coming with two people, it is recommended to order the Terra portion, which can be paired and taste two flavors at once. I personally recommend Sour Cream and BBQ flavors, these are the two flavors you can t go wrong with. There are also new flavors in the store, and interested diners can try them.
Gursimran is the best.

Came in here today to try them out.  I was the only one there.  They didn t have BBQ but the staff told me to get Corn.  So I ended up getting Corn, Sour Cream and Cheese.  They made the fresh.  They didn t have fries pre made.  So the fries were fresh and hot.  I watched her make the friend and it is quite the process.  I can see why people complain about the time.  But it s made to order and it s a process to season the fries.  My kids and family loved the fries.  The kids loved the corn and I wish we ordered bigger size.  Next time I would order larger size cause it didn t not last long and it s not much of a price increase for a bigger size.  Really friendly staff and can tell she took pride in her work.  I hope they continue to provide excellent fries without compromising the quality for speeding up the process.

Yummy fries and friendly service. It usually takes about 7-10 minutes to get your order because they make each batch when ordered. Parking: There is some street parking out front but not a lot. You can find more along the side streets but you may have to park farther away. There is also a small paid lot as well.

The fries were very flavourful and I love the unique flavours they have (ie sweet corn, truffle, wasabi) that other stores don t have. They also offer different shapes of fries like the waffle shape. The staff followed strict covid protocols like taking my temperature upon entering and asking me to use hand sanitizer. I was the only one in the store that ordered and the fries took quite a while to be ready.
I was surprised that they have it here in Canada. I really missed this fast food place when I was a little boy in Manila, Philippines. It brought so much good memories.
Pricey but really tasty and fresh fries. I love how every bit of my waffle fries were covered in seasoning. We had the truffle and the BBQ. Really good! I will definitely order again.

I love this place and I found out recently they have drinks now, too! However, every time I go to this location, I get disillusioned because they dont have the flavours they listed on their website -- only a handful :( Edit: They now have all the flavours on a consistent basis so I ve changed my review to reflect this.
Fries are great! Limited flavours to choose from but they taste good. Improved from the last time I came here (few months ago). Fries were crispy and cooked perfectly.

I dont know if it happened to be the batch, or the lady who made the batch, but I felt like the taste in Manila is more flavourful compared to what I had.  It was still good, just not as good as the ones Im used to in The Philippines.  Ill try them out again and update if in case it tastes better.
I was skeptical about the fries here, but I was wrong. It was delicious! The wait time is a bit long though, because they fried the fries right after you ordered. No pre-fried fries.

Taste still as great as the ones that I used to eat in the Philippines. I came in when there is no line up around 6:30 so I didnt get to wait for an hour like the others did   Just be patient no need to rush over just because its open
Waited for a while, roughly 15 - 20 minutes. But the staff was super nice, and the sour cream & onion fries were pretty delicious.
Brings back childhood memories back in Phils. Nice to have them in Vancouver Just dislike waiting for fries for more than 20-30mins each time.
really good flavor of fries i wish they are selling their seasoning powder for the fries, but a little bit pricey.
The fries were Crispy. It Tasted delicious Because There wasnt too much Oil .
The food is great, didnt have the problems other people had with service and time (I only waited for 4 minutes), the price is a tad expensive for some fries though.
Walked in at 2pm on a Saturday. No line. Pretty tasty but not the best value. Would eat again.
They had good covid protocol and serve really tasty fries.
First time coming here, it was busy. But it was worth it. Came here from a recommendation. Now Id recommend it.
Reminds me of the Philippine chain. Pretty good! Long lineups though.
Flavorable potato fries.
Really good fries
The waffle fries are delicious, but the cheese powder on top is really sprinkled too much, a bit too salty

First experience of this  seasoned fries  was okay. Nothing crazy or different from just doing this yourself at home. Grabbed the  Tere  size which is their extra large fries option that you re allowed two different flavours. We ended going with the Chili Barbeque because they didn t have the plain barbeque seasoning. This was probably my favourite over the truffle seasoning that we had. The truffle flavour is there but also it s very salty in my honest opinion.

Maybe I had good timing but their wasnt too many people and the wait time was pretty normal. I got cheese fries and they tasted pretty good. They only let in 4 people so you would be waiting outside for majority of the time. Parking is just street parking for 1 hour. Along the back, in the resendential area, their are some parking. I got the cheese fries and they are decent. I would not wait 30 minutes for these if you see a big line. If they used thicker or crunchy fies, it would be better
Great fries and flavors just the way I remember it from back home. The line up though is really crazy and the wait is too much for just a takeout  . Just wait until the hype is over.

Made to order, so everything comes hot and crispy from the fryer. That said, its really only fries with four optional toppings, which is much less and not as interesting as to what the chain offers overseas. I would certainly not wait in line for this.
they have two ovens, one order per oven, about 10 minutes per order, no wonder there s always a line up, fries are yummy though
You have to wait a while but the fries are pretty good and the flavours they have are great!

Dang Good Ice | Same Day Ice Delivery in Vancouver
review_text: The marketing agency that I work for has used Dang Good Ice delivery service on numerous occasions for various events and parties that we have hosted over the past few years! They have been nothing short of fantastic in terms of product, service, as well as fair pricing! Highly recommended!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for kind words. We hope your summer bbq went well. Looking forward to servicing you for your ice delivery needs

place_name: Dang Good Ice | Same Day Ice Delivery in Vancouver
review_text: Weve recently had an outdoor event server 700+ people, and Dang Good came in at the last min to help us serve cool down drinks to our attendees! The big cooler rental was able to keep the ice overnight to be used in the early morning next day because the ice we needed outside of their delivery window. The delivery service was fast, simple, and totally reliable, especially on the weekends! Thank you to Christina, Jeff, and the rest of the team to making this happen. Many happy faces that day. I will be putting them on my order for my next event!
response_from_owner_text: Wow, what an incredible event you hosted for 700+ people! Were absolutely thrilled that we could assist you with our Vancouver Ice Delivery service, especially on such short notice.

review_text: Highly recommended. place_name: Brandon Gee-Moore Top 1% Realtor in 2019-2022 (MLS Sales Greater Vancouver Real Estate Board)
review_text: Brandon is an exceptional realtor. I can say this with confidence because of my experience with other realtors. First of all, Brandon truly cares about the service he provides. It is more than just a sale for him. He takes time in getting to know the client and what matters to them the most. He is not pushy which I appreciated a lot. However, if he thinks something is the right fit he will encourage you to move forward. For us, build quality was extremely important. Brandon understood that and he used his deep local knowledge and experience to guide us to find a home that was built well. There were many viewings we went to where we were willing to settle because we were tired of looking. Brandon stopped us from settling. There were offers that didnt go through and it was upsetting, but he didnt give up, and he kept us going. Brandon has lots of knowledge about the region, most of the local builders, and has access to insider information as he comes from a family of realtors. Brandon is professional and very approachable. I truly believe if it wasnt for his knowledge and expertise we would have never been able to buy our home in a crazy competitive market like Burnaby! If you are struggling and serious about buying, go with Brandon, you wont regret it!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the kind words Aratrika!! It was definitely a long journey and I m so happy it all worked out!! After all of the pain, stress and tiredness we found the best home possible in the end!!

From Mortgage Specialist to House Inspectors and everything in between. Whether you are thinking about buying, selling or both, send them a message. I promise you you won t be disappointed. Thank you for everything you have done for us!

review_text: I had a great experience with Brandon. Brandon was professional and prepared every step of the way. He provided sound advice and was always available to answer my questions. No hesitation in recommending Brandon to others!

The massage was very thorough and very good. Like in any other establishment of this kind the girl wants to upsell the service when you are most vulnerable and decide with the wrong head! I agreed to a service and let me tell you what followed was worth every nickel and dime spent and even more. It was the best service that I had in my over 60 years experience. I will definitely be back to see Sophia the next time Im in the city! Highly recommended!

However I did get a call the morning of my appointment to check I was coming in and the staff were friendly. I had a really good experience with Dr Mark Abbey, as a foreigner in Vancouver without my own Dr here it s always hit and miss with a walk in clinic. I found Dr Abbey was friendly and actually listened to why I was there rather than pushing me out the door moments after arriving which is how I feel most of the time seeing Drs in this city. It was nice to feel like a person not a number (:

review_text: Probably the best clinic on the drive. Ive been going here for all my problems for the past several months and havent had any problems. They always answer the phones, they take walk ins on short notice (they dont close right when they open like other clinics on the drive), and the bedside manner is impeccable. Most other doctors make me feel rushed and I feel that the doctors here take the most time that they can with their patients, which seems to be a rarity here in Vancouver. The clinic is small but well kept and is relatively accessible from commercial-Broadway skytrain.
response_from_owner_text: We would like to thank you for taking the time to review. Your kind words are very supportive to staff and our doctors. We look forward to being your clinic of choice!

review_text: Dr. Yousefzadeh is a kind, caring doctor. Though we only had a phone chat he really took the time to listen and take my concerns seriously. He also went out of his way to ensure that I was able to start my medication as soon as possible. He was proactive with the imaging I needed and I appreciated how diligent and professional he was. It isnt often you have such a wonderful experience simply over the phone. Thank you Dr. Yousefzadeh for taking me seriously and being so awesome :)  I also felt like the front desk really listened when I expressed my concerns. Very good experience :)

review_text: I really had a good experience with Dr.Abbey, Mark. He was very empathetic about my problem. Thank you Commercial Drive Clinic for quick response! Amazing staff.

Some days it was a little difficult to get through by phone and I was unable to leave a message due to it being full but well worth the wait. I have been helped by Dr. Dickey and by Dr. Norman T. Tong who are both amazing. They are amazing because they actually listened to what I was saying and helped me with no hesitation (you expect this from doctors but it is hard to come by). I am very grateful for these doctors alongside the staff working at this clinic, specifically for their professionalism and for the their help in improving my quality of life. I sincerely thank you all!

review_text: Walked in to this clinic several months ago after seeing a doctor elsewhere (that told me I had a bad cold and prescribed me cough syrup with codeine). I was sick for weeks and couldnt breathe and was staying up all night with a rattle in my chest. Walked in to this clinic, was seen right away with no wait time at all, and explained my situation to the doctor. She didnt say much, which at first I thought was off-putting, but I quickly realised she was doing her job properly and professionally. She assessed me, told me I had bronchitis and that I had gotten much worse since the other Dr. at another clinic had misdiagnosed my symptoms. She quickly prescribed me some antibiotics and an inhaler to help clear my chest. I felt better within a couple of days. If not for her I fear I may have gotten much worse. 10/10 would recommend this clinic, as the staff are competent and understanding. They arent customer service representatives, they are health-care professionals, and thats what I want when I see a doctor.

Dr Gillian Fisher and receptionist Nina are brusque, highly competent, kind, overworked, helpful, and professional. If Dr Fisher had her own practice, Id have her as my own doctor in a heartbeat. Dr Roger Dickey and other doctors Ive seen here have also been great. The wait gets longer as the day progresses, and sometimes the last hour or two are already full by mid-afternoon, just like all walk-in clinics in the neighbourhood. I recommend going as early as you can, or plan to go to the park or do errands nearby.
Dr Amir is by far the best doctor Ive ever went too, hes knowledgeable & fast and helpful. The receptionist are amazing too!

I love this walk-in clinic. Ive never had to wait. The doctors aways listen to me. I dont understand why its rated so low. I always come here when my family doctor is too busy and booked far in advance. IF I could get my family doctor here, I would! Seriously, check it out!

Doctor was amazing. There was a long wait, but that depends on when you go and how busy it is. It is after all a walk in clinic. And the doctor spent a full 25 minutes with me because I was a complicated case. And I appreciated what she did, I walked out with much fewer worries , and she made sure I got the tests I needed. They even called me for a follow up the next day.
I find it odd that a lot of low reviews.  Every time I come here, everyone is very attentive and approachable. The doctors and receptionist are concise and friendly. I recommend this place.

review_text: Possibly the most unreliable clinic in the city. The front desk, please  Get a new job and hire a donkey to work for you instead, it will do a far better job than you can ever.

I don t know what is going on with this business? I was going here and seeing a doctor. I had my medical exam for my professional license and then got a requisition for some lab tests. After months of waiting the doctor never explained the results and when I call the office ( nearly impossible to get through) a young man promised me that a doctor would call me back at 2pm that day. I suspected I wouldn t get a call and sure enough no response after months of trying to get ahold of the doctor and office staff. What a completely incompetent, unprofessional and irresponsible business! Don t use this walk in clinic it s a joke!

Avoid this place for gods sake. A bunch of liars. They told us three (!!!) times month after month that signed us up to MRI queue while they never actually did it. They told us that they CANT TELL US WHICH PARTICULAR CLINIC WE ARE ASSIGNED TO. They cant. Ofc you cant if you never did it. Liars. Stupid, arrogant. Hope you guys have 0 working days week instead of 2. You didnt deserve a penny from MSP. How dare you to make a human suffer for a half a year from backpain and be afraid to tell you simply lied. P.S. to the owner: check my email which I sent on Mar 18, 2023, 3:06 PM asking about MRI date. Which you never bothered to respond ofc.

review_text: Made an appointment 3 weeks ago online. Never received a confirmation or a phone call to confirm, so I took it upon myself to do that. To my surprise, no one answers the phone or checks their voice mails, so its incredibly difficult to get ahold of anyone to confirm. Arrived on a separate scheduled date and time, and was told to come back in an hour because the doctor was going on break. I already rearranged my day to accommodate this medical appointment, so why cant anyone from this office call me to do the same? Overall the staff are unprofessional and inconsiderate of clients. Improvements severely needed.

review_text: This office is so disrespectful they told me a doctor would call me and it s been two days they have not called me. They need to find a new solution where they can accommodate everybody s needs. I m very unhappy and disappointed at this.

Terrible experience. I walked in with a requisition. All I needed was a self-administered swab tube.  Receptionist said they couldn t fit me in with a doctor. I don t need a doctor, I repeated several times. I just needed a tube for a self-administered test. They said I needed a requisition. I already have a requisition. They take it, grab a tube for me. Tell me I can t use their bathroom to do the self test, I would have to go somewhere else. I literally walk to the walk-in clinic next door who were more than happy to let me use their washroom to complete the test. I go to drop off the tube at LifeLabs, only to find they have given me the wrong tube. Great. EDIT: In response to the reply - new and training is one thing, but this receptionist was dismissive and patronizing. I had a simple request, and she made the interaction frustrating and I left in disbelief, unsure of what I had done to make her so angry with me.
response_from_owner_text: Dear Chelsey, Thank you for taking the time to leave your concerns. We apologies that you had a bad experience here. Both of our staff are new and they are on training, we will do our best to speed them up. We have tried to contact you multiple time regarding this issue.

review_text: I called in this morning to make an appointment for a botox consultation and the receptionist told me I had to come in right at that moment as there is no one waiting and they dont do appointments. Given that I work about 10 mins away, I arrived approx 20 mins after the phone call and had to wait another  8-10 mins while the receptionist was on the phone with no acknowledgement. After she took my ID and set me up, I asked  her how long it will take for someone to meet me and she tells me that the doctor has gone on break and wont be back for another at least 30 mins and that there is someone else in front of me. I have no issue waiting my turn and am not upset by this at all. That was completely fair, I saw the women ahead of me waiting before I got there. When I tell the receptionist that I was under the impression there was no wait given what she had told me on the phone, she told me that since the doctor saw no one was there, he went on break. I am not saying that the doctor does not deserve a break but at least schedule the breaks or close the clinic for the 30 mins - 1 hour that break takes place. I have seen many clinics use this method and it works best. My issue is not with the doctor but the incompetent receptionist, given my friends experience, I will come by again for a consultation and we will see if this is an overall staff problem.

review_text: The initial appointment went fine but the follow up did not. The receptionist offered me a 10 am call two days later to review my X ray results but they never called. I wasn t able to reach them by phone or email. No effort was made to follow up with me on my results.

Accidentally deleted my earlier review when trying to update it. That one was basically went to the doctor with a problem, doctor gave useless advice to which I told him Id tried that for a week and I needed him to help he responded telling me I hadnt done it. Basically on go here if youre about to die and have no other options. The staff,  both reception and medical are awful and wont help with anything. The update was going to be I needed a form signed by a doctor, just a signature. Turns out this walk in clinic no longer has a doctor so its just a useless building with a rude receptionist wholl take all your details before telling you that theres no doctor and wont be for at least a month. No reason to ever go here.

Receptionist ignored my phone calls and when I asked her why she said she got my messages but didn t feel like responding.  Then she said she didn t get them because her phone wasn t working right, then she said she didn t get them because her computer and printer were not working.  I called 9 times today, left various messages on more than one day and received no response.  She hung up on me, said she owns the place, said she doesn t have to respond to calls she doesn t want to, and interrupts patients.  Very unprofessional ever since the pandemic.  I have been going here for 10 years or so and was treated like garbage.

I came to see a doctor, the woman at reception ignored me standing outside for about 5 mins even though it was during their hours of operation. Eventually she answered the door and told me they re doing phone consultations only - then please update your website to clearly state this because right now you re misleading people who need to see a doctor in person.

Signed up and confirmed an online virtual appointment over 1 week ago and never got the call at the scheduled time or any further contact of any kind. Clearly incompetent. First impressions are everything so obviously I will never attempt to go back here for any reason. If they call right now Ill tell them they are trash and hang up......but they wont call lol
response_from_owner_text: Hello Light, thank you for taking the time to leave your rating. Could you please get in contact with us directly? We would like to find out a little bit more about what occurred during your most recent visit to our clinic. Thank you. Clinic Support Office: commercialdrivemedicalclinic@gmail.com

review_text: I originally came here because they update their times on medimap and I saw that they consistently had short wait times. I loved the doctor I saw the first time, and have been back twice since. However, the receptionist ruins the experience and the way that the clinic runs makes it impossible to give this place a good rating. Their times listed are absolutely inaccurate. For example I was there today at 8:50am expecting the clinic to open at 9am. On the door they have no times posted, only online. The clinic finally opened at 9:30am. I walked in and the receptionist said they were not open for walk-ins as no doctors would be in today. I asked why that was not at least posted on the door, she replied theres nothing I can do. I told her that she could post something, even a piece of paper on the door with that information, or update their voicemail (of which they have none) Well at this point Ive taken the day off work, I still need to see a doctor, and all of the clinics are at least an hour wait time. I highly recommend staying away from this place.

Not what you would expect from a doctor, I was 3 times to this place and all of the there times was a complete disappointment. They did not bother explaining what should be done, they never ordered the important analysis that should be done until I went back there and further more when the analysis came back they never bothered to call and when I went there the doctor spent 1 min to give me the result with absolutely zero explanation except, you are good, you need some Vitamin D. WOW I went to the pharmacist next door to get the vitamins and the pharmacist explained 1000% better than this doctor. I felt much more comfortable talking g to the pharmacist than this doctors. If you have choice and if you are there for important reason other than mild headaches or something not very serious than please please find somewhere else. they are a joke

place_name: BC FLOORS - Hardwood Floors, Carpet, Tile, Vinyl, Flooring Contractor
review_text: The project manager, Eric, was very organized, friendly, and professional.  He orchestrated various trades such as tilers, plumbers, painters, drywallers, and so forth to install our flooring.  This included water proof laminate in our legal basement suite and a quartz counter top.  Our main floor tile was replaced to create a more modern feel in conjunction with our hardwood while our en-suite bathroom was completely re-formed into a beautiful Roman inspired modern bathroom! Eric went above and beyond helping us during our three month renovation and was able to problem solve using evidence based rational thought instead of  winging  it or just  going with his gut.   This resulted in solid solutions at reasonable prices.  Although the renovations weren t cheap, the price for quality of work (and we chose higher end materials) was worth it.  As has been said, you can have something cheap, fast, and correct but you can only ever get two of the three so if you want a quality job at a reasonable price then it might take a little longer but if you remain flexible, then it s worth it in the end. Thanks to Eric and BC Floors and we will definitely recommend them to friends and family!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much

place_name: BC FLOORS - Hardwood Floors, Carpet, Tile, Vinyl, Flooring Contractor
review_text: I had a flood and needed my kitchen, hallway, living-room and bedroom floor redone. the team at BC Floors (Oleg, Max and Leo) were fantastic, Oleg came out the day I called to see my place and I received a quote a day later.   They also spent time helped me pick the right floor (hardwood vs laminate). Max was very friendly and always communicated well and let me know about the progress and levelling before they proceeded to make sure I was in agreement with the costs   Leo worked extremely hard (staying late and weekends) to get my floors done in less time than originally estimated. Leo really has a talent for flooring  I would highly recommend the whole team. i love my floors and dealing with BC floors made the whole project easy and stress free. They cleaned up everything and very very knowledgeable and quick with all their communication. I have already recommended them to my friends and family
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Tess for you kind words. It is a pleasure to hear that we met your expectations. Please enjoy your new oak engineered hardwood flooring. BC FLOORS Flooring Company www.bcfloors.ca

Customers that compose mean spirited reviews instead of being grown up enough as an adult to avoid appearing vindictive, childish, infantile and just plain dishonest simply because they are paying?!. place_name: BC FLOORS - Hardwood Floors, Carpet, Tile, Vinyl, Flooring Contractor
review_text: Just got services completely finished today. Overall they were good and professional and I am happy with the final result. Of course, if you dont mind waiting for almost 3 months. I cannot even get my stairs done during on moving date, the installer came before Good Friday then told me that they were in short of a key material. The final invoice amount is much more higher than sales agreement, our sales agreement was $12,213.9 but I got charged $13,589.4 ($1,375.50 extra charge ) You wont be able to match the description on  invoice  and sales agreement, they look like two different cases. If you dont have any other choices, like myself, then yes go ahead with them.
response_from_owner_text: thank you for your business!

place_name: BC FLOORS - Hardwood Floors, Carpet, Tile, Vinyl, Flooring Contractor
review_text: Friendly helpful and accommodating. Prices and selection were very competitive. Installed luxury vinyl plank. Interaction with staff in office and on site was good but project did take about 3 times longer than quoted. There was more leveling work than anticipated which added understandable time but there were delays due to running out of materials and conflicting schedules with other projects. They did confirm my painters could come paint mounted baseboards one day but painters had to go home when they showing up and baseboards had not been mounted as promised. Was also promised exact material match on stair noses but was told on day of install that it would be best match similar material. It looks great but misleading promise on sales floor. Translucent silicone used on edges of half the stairs and white caulk use on there half because they ran out of materials which looks strange now. Some risers have scuffs and glue marks. Also last minute changes from vinyl transition to metal transitions for technical reasons on slope of transition which should have been identified in two site visits before project started. They worked to rectify issue and supplied extra transitions so we can change them on our own in the future. Had a hard time getting all baseboards remounted as agreed and ended up remounting some on my own to save time on project and not have to keep asking. Had to point out several corrective action where material did not hide properly under baseboards, stairs etc. These were corrected quickly but ended up leaving some because I got tired of pointing them out and having to schedule site visits. Told me they would screw down plywood floors in areas that had squeaking but this not done. Quite a bit of scuffs on jewly painted walls and resedue of leveling compound on some walls which I had to scrape off.  I am very conflicted in this review because they did try there best to fix things but it seems like lots of the things should have just been done right the first time. We are happy with the floors and would have given a higher rating if we didnt have to go through the little stresses along the way. It may have just been a bad month but I would have a hard time referring them to friends and family after our experience. Bitter sweet unfortunately.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your business Adam! We did the best we can from our end

place_name: BC FLOORS - Hardwood Floors, Carpet, Tile, Vinyl, Flooring Contractor
review_text: Installation was decent overall, but they messed up one of the rooms and had to cover it up with awkward looking panels near the edges where the floor ends at floor-to-ceiling windows. Other issues: - Original expectations were that they would do the kitchen flooring as well. But they bailed on doing the entire floor because of some custom cabinetry that is raised above the flooring on elevated stilts. So half of the kitchen flooring is incomplete (old flooring hidden under the cabinetry). Would have been much better to be up front about that at the beginning. - They promised to replace our baseboards, but during the renovations they said the original baseboards were fine and asked if they would just use those. We ask for them to go ahead with new ones thing they would do the full job. Instead they cut new baseboards without painting them properly and never added caulking. So we were left to do that our selves. - They messed up one of our closet doors (couldn t get it to fit back in) so they cut it. Now the one door doesn t match the height of the other. Overall, a lot of the issues could have been prevented with better communication on their part before and during the project. They also rushed at the end to finish up. We offered to give them more time, but they already had other projects waiting to go right afterwards.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Steve, I apologize for this. My team has been reaching out to you but you haven t replied. Can you please reply to our team so they can discuss how we can correct ? Thanks

place_name: BC FLOORS - Hardwood Floors, Carpet, Tile, Vinyl, Flooring Contractor
review_text: I have a small job on floor tile replacement. Contacted them and they came over for estimates which was a certain amount. Then, I contacted them again saying I want to go ahead with the work and ask for a final estimate. That guy said he will give it to me next day which he never did. Then I contacted him again, he texted me the labour cost which was 500 dollars more than what he told me . I asked perhaps theres a mistake? He never replied .
response_from_owner_text: I apologized for this. Usually for small jobs, jobs are normally quoted based on piecework rather than $ per square foot as mobilization costs for small jobs and medium jobs are almost the same. Nevertheless, I will find out who and will make sure that this will never happen again.

place_name: BC FLOORS - Hardwood Floors, Carpet, Tile, Vinyl, Flooring Contractor
review_text: DO NOT even think about BC Floors. I had the most horrible experience with BC floors. They basically act as middle man and subcontract your project to others that literally have no knowledge of flooring and they will ruin your material and flooring. First off, I had to call Keit, the project manager to give me a quote, literally everyday two to three times. After a full week of calling her, she finally gave me a sloppy quote without coming to my place to see what the scope is. I had a tight schedule and made the worst mistake to pay them to do the job. Then their subcontractor came to my place without knowing what the scope of work is. He was supposed to remove the existing flooring on the stairs and install new stairs using the materials I have bought. He totally damaged all of the stairs while removing the existing stairs and noted that the floors now need leveling and demanded more money. As I was deep into this mistake, I agreed. Then he installed all flooring and stairs wrong and ruined the whole floor and stairs. The stairs nosing fell off after 2 days and I noticed that it is sitting on a hollow space!!! The flooring moves when I walk on it. When I complained to Keit, BC Floors PM, she accused me that I am lying. I had to fight a whole week with BC floors to prove that their subcontractor has ruined my materials and the stairs. After fighting for over a week and getting penny pinched along the way and arguing with me over every $10 I paid, I ONLY got around 88% of my money back and NOT the full payment. I have already spent more than $1000 out of pocket and still need to find another contractor to fix my stairs. I have never experienced such horrible service and customer service. So, if you really value your time and money, I recommend finding another company for your floors. Otherwise, you will end up losing lots of money and time.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Maryam, I have discussed this issue with your husband Graham and we have agreed on the compensation and I have already returned your money. I do sincerely apologize this.

place_name: BC FLOORS - Hardwood Floors, Carpet, Tile, Vinyl, Flooring Contractor
review_text: Small job changing carpeted rooms to floorboards. Prompt reply with email and phone.  Rocked up to find out the guy I had been in contact with is the only one guy does the estimates and that he wasn t in the store. Apparently it s by appointment only. Was told to come anytime. Up selling by the lady who was there with nonchalant attitude. No thanks.
response_from_owner_text: I apologize for this. Even though your job is small, please understand that we care for all customers no matter the size of the job. You can come any time to view the materials but it does not mean the guy you are speaking with is there as he manages projects as well. It means that there is someone who is always there at the showroom. Please understand that estimating is an art and not something exact and maybe you misunderstood that the lady is up selling you. She is also an estimator but may not be familiar with your case. In construction, every project is unique. It is best that you speak with the guy you normally speak so things will be consistent. Again, my apologies

place_name: BC FLOORS - Hardwood Floors, Carpet, Tile, Vinyl, Flooring Contractor
review_text: As it stands, weve paid $3,500 in labour and lost $1,000 in materials for BC Floors to destroy our staircase. Keit and Nikita are dodging our calls and buying time and only giving half solutions. The latest solution was a mismatched repair where the stairs dont match the rest of our flooring. The stairs were installed 3 weeks ago and already 2 steps have come apart, with the nosing starting to peel off other stairs. The stair nosing came with a reinforcement track, the installer threw that out. Unbelievably unprofessional, not a company you want to do business with. We called them 4 days ago, they did not take our complaints seriously, until their inhouse person came by and confirmed the stairs were a disaster. They have now admitted fault, but cant provide us a timely solution, they just keep buying time.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Graham, I apologize for this and I have returned your money as agreed including material compensation.

place_name: BC FLOORS - Hardwood Floors, Carpet, Tile, Vinyl, Flooring Contractor
review_text: We paid over $5,000 to have our hardwood floors sanded and 3 coats of Bona Traffic HD applied which was supposed to help protect our floor from scratches from our dogs.  14 months later, the floor is horribly scratched already.  It has also changed colors under a kitchen carpet. I emailed the company advising them of the challenges we have had  together with pictures, and they said that the warranty had expired after one year.  I let them know that we had delayed coming to them as I wanted to wait until a lengthy renovation was completed.  I tried making the case that the damage that was evident in the pictures had obviously developed over the past 14 months instead of over the last two months.  I suspect they only applied one coat of protection instead of the three.  Unfortunately, no subsequent response from the company.  I sent another email asking that this be escalated to a manager.  Again no response.  Very very disappointed.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear you had a frustrating experience, but we really appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention. That will never happen again.

place_name: BC FLOORS - Hardwood Floors, Carpet, Tile, Vinyl, Flooring Contractor
review_text: I had the worst of luck with this company. I don t blame them with any malice. I think they ve been professional, but that doesn t change the fact my experience was... bad. I was asking them to renovate a carpet on behalf of a client in Burnaby (this was for an apartment with 2 small bedrooms) and I had a good first impressions. The salesman was friendly, I liked their carpet selection and I do like the job their installer did and the final result. To be clear, this company does good work. The carpet itself is beautiful. So I don t think they are normally incompetent like this. However, the salesman I had ... well I think he was a fine guy and he had good carpet recommendations. The issue was he messed up. First of all, he forgot to account the long weekend messing up carpet deliveries which pushed the project back. That... was okay since he let me know ASAP and got the carpet to the installer. So I ve forgiven him for that. The main reason for my poor review is the fact he grossly miscalculated the amount of carpet needed. He gave us a quote for 2000 cad which was around what the other companies in the area offered. However, we needed 54 yards, he estimated 34. This meant that the project needed an additional 1170 Canadian, bringing up the project to 3170 cad. The company did give me a discount of 170 dollars, which was appreciated, but this sudden extra 1000 dollar cost is not welcome. I understand the company s position, but this was a hell of a mistake. We honestly would not have chosen this company if the actual quote was presented upfront. Furthermore, we chose them with the understanding that two bedrooms would be completed... not one. Edit: After re-measuring and re-reading the original contract I realized that while there was an opportunity for me to actually catch the mistake. However, the fact that a professional and who came and measured the apartment and yet messed the estimate up that badly is still outrageous, and it doesn t change the fact that the initial quote was completely off by more than 50% of the cost. ADDITIONALLY, the contract says 2 bedrooms. The fact that they messed up how much carpet to order should not be up to me, but on the company representative who ordered the carpet and made the contract with the understanding that that amount of carpet was enough. However, I also realized that he contract itself had one huge issue in which it isnt actually clear about how much carpet was supposed to be installed. It listed a number of yards of carpet, which I originally thought referred to length of the roll. The issue is... yards to this company means yards squared.... which... is... just not clear.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear you had a frustrating experience, but we really appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention. That will never happen again.

place_name: Syndicate Lending Corporation - Mortgage Broker in Vancouver
review_text: Inam was an amazing help and worked very fast. Hes got a lot of experience, hes friendly, and hes professional. Were really happy we found him when it was tough to get a loan. His services were top-notch. We had used a different broker before, so we really see the difference. We dont usually look around for other options, but our last broker disappointed us. place_name: Syndicate Lending Corporation - Mortgage Broker in Vancouver
review_text: My wife and I recently had the pleasure of working with Inam from Syndicate Lending to secure a mortgage, and we couldnt be happier with the exceptional service we received. From start to finish, the entire process was smooth, efficient, and stress-free. First and foremost, we want to commend Inam (and his team) for his expertise and knowledge in the mortgage industry. He displayed a deep understanding of the market and provided valuable insights and guidance tailored to our unique needs as a couple and being self employed. His professionalism and attention to detail were truly impressive. Communication played a vital role in making this experience outstanding, and Inam, Vanessa and his amazing team excelled in this aspect. They were highly responsive, promptly addressing all our questions and concerns. Imans ability to explain complex mortgage terms in a clear and concise manner was greatly appreciated, ensuring that both my wife and I fully understood every step of the process. One aspect that truly stood out was Inams dedication to finding the best mortgage option for us. He took the time to understand our joint financial situation, carefully considering our goals and preferences as a couple. His commitment to securing the most favorable terms and rates was evident, resulting in a mortgage package that exceeded our expectations. Furthermore, the level of personal attention we received was exceptional. Inam took the time to listen to both of our goals and priorities, tailoring his services accordingly. His commitment to customer satisfaction was palpable, and we both felt valued as clients throughout the entire journey. Lastly, we want to express our gratitude for Inams efficiency and timeliness. Deadlines were met promptly, and the paperwork and documentation were handled with utmost care and precision. This attention to detail ensured a smooth closing process, making the overall experience hassle-free for both of us. In conclusion, we highly recommend Inam and Syndicate Lending to any couples seeking a mortgage. He and the team exceeded our expectations in every aspect, from his expertise and communication to his dedication and efficiency. We are extremely grateful for his exceptional service and professionalism. Without a doubt, he deserves a well-earned 5-star rating! Thank you once again, Inam, Vanessa and the whole Syndicate lending team for making our mortgage journey as a couple an outstanding one!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: If you are looking for a CHANGE or NEED someone to give you motivation to work out, BLK Box gym is where you should head to right now. Friendly staff, clean and well organized gym with lots of equipments I have been trained by many personal trainers in my life but after meeting Ken, my new personal trainer, I have realized not all the trainers are the same. He really puts in effort and care towards his clients, very well organized, uses his experience and knowledge to help his clients reach their goals. Any trainers can push you to work out and do cardios, but Ken actually makes perfect work out/diet plans for each individual Highly recommended 10/10

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I joined BLK box gym because I wanted to lose some weight for my graduation ceremony. My experience has been nothing but great. Everyone at the gym was kind and helpful especially my lovely trainer, Rachel. Rachel was tough at times, I used to call her evil, and very caring and attentive on the days I was feeling down. I enjoyed training with Rachel, I enjoyed the music she used to play for my sessions and I was very happy with the transformation I saw on my body after only 2 months of training. Also, I appreciate how Rachel was very understanding of my busy schedule and how she used to push me to keep coming to the sessions regularly. I am very happy with the results I achieved in the 6 months of training with Rachel and I would ve continued working with her if I didn t have to move out of town. All the best Rachel :)
response_from_owner_text: Hi Fatima, Thank you for your kind review! Were really happy to hear how Rachel made an impact in your fitness lifestyle :)

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Ive been training with David for a few months and he changed my body in just 1 month. I was stunned to see how far I had come in such little time. I have known David for several years and his energy is infectious. I dealt with bloating, hypothyroidism and iron deficiency while doing shift work which all lead to a decline in my health. I went from almost 130lbs of skinny fat to 114lbs of muscle. He has helped me obtain the physique Ive always wanted and the strength I never knew that I had. He s incredibly attentive, knowledgeable, and an overall genuine trainer and boxing coach.  His positive attitude and approachable nature makes me feel completely at ease. I cannot recommend David enough as he truly knows what he is doing and you will see how he genuinely cares about your goals. He radiates passion and dedication for his clients and I absolutely love training with him. He will make you succeed with your fitness goals. If youre seeking a trainer who will produce results and make you enjoy it at the same time - you have found the right place. My only regret is not starting with him sooner. I am so incredibly happy - Thank you David and the amazing Blk Box Team

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I ve been working with Dave Rojo for personal training sessions since March and can t say enough positive things about the experience. He s always motivating and brings a super fun energy to each session (along with a furry friend, Obie, who is a ray of sunshine). I feel stronger than ever and it s great to be able to just show up and have an entire workout planned for you, along with the encouragement to push yourself.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I ve been training at BLK BOX for 5 months now. Initially I came because I was experiencing back pain and in general was not happy with my body and mindset (COVID greatly affected me). I was reeeally nervous because I had never trained in the gym before and avoided physical exertion in every possible way It s been five months - I ve never felt like skipping a workout. My PT Preston is incredibly professional, knowledgeable and supportive. Going to train with him and seeing the rest of the team is always the highlight of my day. I feel so much better both physically and mentally. Can t recommend this place enough!
response_from_owner_text: Ecstatic to hear you enjoy training with Preston, Sofia! Really proud of your hard work and discipline in the last 5 months   keep killing it!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Just completed 36 personal training sessions with Ken, he is very kind, patient, and professional! I m happy that Ken helped me develop a healthier life style! Every staff is friendly! If you are looking for personalized training plan, BLK is definitely a great choice.
response_from_owner_text: Were happy you had a blast training with Ken, Mavis! Thank you for your kind words, were glad that youre satisfied with your time at BLK BOX GYM.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: The slogan  weight lost  is exaggerated in most places but if you re looking for real results then you need to go to Blk Box. I trained for two years prior to Blk Box at commercial gyms and I noticed little chances to my body. The tailored program at Blk Box actually made a difference and I could see how my body changed every single week; not to mention what a pleasure it was to work with Ken. He s extremely knowledgeable you can ask him anything training related and he would be able to answer you. He even helped me recovered from an old injury that prevented me from doing many of the movements. Every single trainer at the gym is friendly and has his/her own personality that you can fell in love with. His rate is also very reasonable comparing to other personal trainers. I m excited to see how Blk Box continues to grow!
response_from_owner_text: Hey Allen! Thank you for leaving your kind review for us. Were really happy that you had a great time working with Ken.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Rachel is my personal trainer and is fantastic. Very easy to talk to, pushing me even when I want to give up and flexible with my crazy schedule. So happy with my results so far and will definitely be continuing with her in the future!
response_from_owner_text: Hi Kyo, Thank you for sharing your kind words! Were happy that Rachel helped you with the results that you wanted!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I originally reached out to BLKBOX in Richmond because I had fitness aspirations but didnt know where to begin. Harris (my trainer) was incredibly knowledgable and friendly, and we got to know each other quite well over the several months that I trained there. Harris helped me understand that lifting wasnt just about heavy weights, and he was great at explaining how mobility, rest and nutrition played such a significant part in it as well. Though my time at BLKBOX has wrapped, Im really fortunate to be able to call Harris a good friend of mine now. One of my favourite things about BLKBOX is how I got to know all the other trainers as well. Its a really tight-knit team that are all super fun to be around and they dont make you feel intimidated or self-conscious to be there. Its a great community and I definitely miss being around that team on a weekly basis, and I would definitely reach out again if I were to need personal training once again!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Caleb! Your radiant energy has been a great addition to our family. We appreciate you!

And at the most of time his motivation encourage me to work harder and helped me to reach the goal. The space is clean and every single trainer is friendly. I feel so welcomed every time when I go there. I highly recommend this gym if you are looking for a personal training program.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Personal training with Ken at BLK Box Gym surpassed all of my previous training experiences at any other corporate gym. place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I have had the pleasure of training with Jodie for the past several months; she has been an outstanding trainer. Jodie is highly knowledgeable and well-versed in human anatomy. She integrates her knowledge of anatomy and physiology into our sessions, making them educational and insightful. Jodie created various workout split programs for me and she kept me accountable and on track with my fitness goals. She is a kind, sweet and attentive trainer that tailors your workout to your needs while keeping up the intensity of the sessions. I strongly recommend BLK BOX gym for personal training in Richmond!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much, Lily! Youve been such a great addition to our family here at BLK BOX - come visit soon.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: After training at BLK Box for 5 months I have come away with so much love and respect for the culture of this gym. Matt and Ken have created a business that offers not only high calibre of coaching and training in many different fitness-related areas but a friendly atmosphere to train and learn. Shortly after I started all the trainers at the gym greeted me by name when I walked in to my sessions and I soon felt a connection to this community. My trainer, Matt, listened to my goals and created a program that set me up for success and I so enjoyed learning from him and his infectious passion and expertise for bodybuilding and nutrition. I look forward to working with him again in the future! Similarly, in hearing conversations between other clients and trainers it was clear that everyone had each others best interests in mind and were there to be kind and helpful. This is a fantastic premium fitness studio that truly has coaches and trainers for all levels and areas of fitness interest. I cant wait to go back and see the newly renovated facilities and continue to support this business!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind words, Jake! Its been such a thrill to have you around and apart of our family. Were looking forward to your return!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: after 2 sessions of personal training with ken, i got great tips on my form and an extensive plan for my nutrition and split, everyone was very friendly as well.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: My personal training experience has been by far one of the best experiences I have experienced at BLK BOX GYM in Richmond. I have had several personal trainers in the past from large corporate gyms and in comparison the level of detail and precision that goes into crafting these programs for clients are unmatched. I received a comprehensive spreadsheet of my workout split, a detailed training and nutrition guide alongside with progress photos. Harris utilizes a technical approach and can accurately pin point root causes of certain limited ranges of motions in various movements and exercises which has helped me immensely in reaching my fitness goals. I came into the beginning of my sessions with shoulder pain and Harris incorporated rehab exercises to alleviate the pain and and now it is completely gone. He also taught me how to effectively and properly breathe during my exercises and that has been an absolute game changer in my workout sessions. The value I have gained from my sessions with Harris has been incredible and I am now equipped with the knowledge and skills to maintain the physique I have built. I appreciate the professionalism from Harris and would highly recommend this personal training gym in Richmond.
response_from_owner_text: Were so happy to be apart of your fitness journey, Lily! Thank you and keep killing it.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: BLK BOX is a small gym with big enthusiasm. Everyone I have met so far is friendly and professional. I have been training here for over two months and am so impressed with my PT, Preston. Having been a member of larger, corporate gyms before, I was a bit hesitant on joining a boutique gym but due to the covid situation, I thought I would try a session. As a busy mom, I really dont have too much time to train on my own.  After meeting my PT, I knew this gym would be a good fit for me.  Preston made sure I maximized my training time doing workouts that he tailored to my training goals and lifestyle.  He is very knowledgeable and encourages me to work harder and better. In addition to our workouts, he would give me advice on nutrition and daily exercise habits. I wouldnt have been able to achieve the progress that I have made so far without my PT. I was so surprised to see myself in the mirror with a barbell and weights in such short time! Instead of dreading to go to the gym, I am now looking forward to it. If you are looking to see results with friendly, professional and knowledgeable PTs, I would highly recommend BLK BOX.  My only complaint is that I havent seen Obi, the fur trainer lately. I always look forward to seeing him too!
response_from_owner_text: Were thrilled you enjoyed your training with Preston, Eleanor! Youve made a considerable amount of progress upon the start of your training. Well make sure to bring our lovely fur trainer into the gym more often!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Strength trained with Rogan for 6 months in 2022. He has been an excellent trainer: always friendly, attentive, encouraging, and a wealth of knowledge. The gym is well kept and has a diverse set of clientele across all ages and genders. Would recommend.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Derek! Thank you for the kind review. We are super happy to hear your journey with Rogan has been excellent :)

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Have been going to BLK for the past half year and getting training from Ken (45+ sessions). From my limited personal training history in Toronto and Vancouver, I would say this is my best experience so far. The gym is never crowded, which is great these days. Ken is super professional and very passionate about building a sustainable workout routine for me. I really enjoy many personalized stretch procedures that he carries out on me every session, to avoid injury and maximize performance. I had many great conversations with him too, although mostly on Tesla:)

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Prior to starting at BLK Box I had an absolutely terrible experience with personal training so I was hesitant to try again. However, from the very first consultation with my trainer Sarah, I knew this was going to be the right fit for me. Not only is she kind and funny but Sarah is EXTREMELY caring and knowledgeable. Going to train with her was always the highlight of my day and I think that speaks volumes of the atmosphere created by Sarah and the other trainers. You can tell theyre like a little family and they make you feel like youre a part of it also. In my time there, not once did I ever feel out of place or intimidated. In fact, my confidence in lifting weights and going to a gym on my own grew significantly all thanks to Sarah. She really pays attention to detail and making sure you understand what youre doing and how to complete the exercises properly. Her dedication to her clients truly shows and Im lucky to have found a friend in her. I seriously cannot recommend her enough! TLDR: BLK Box is comprised of the sweetest individuals and my trainer Sarah is quite literally the best trainer you could ask for. Do yourself a favour and book a consultation with her ASAP!!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind words, Denise. Were thrilled to hear that you enjoyed training at our facility just as much as we enjoyed having you. Keep chasing those gains!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Ive been training with Sarah for about 2 months now. I havent gymed for 3 years because of covid. Sarah did an amazing job to get me started on my fitness journey again and help me work toward my goal of weight loss. With her help, I see a huge difference of my physique and my energy level. Shes very knowledge and encouraging that makes building up a fitness routine fun. I would definitely recommend Sarah and BLK BOX gym.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Joyce, were happy to hear that Sarah has made a big impact in your fitness journey!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Sarah is a wonderful, knowledgeable trainer! She s very personable and does a great job meeting you where you re at in your fitness journey. She pushes you (in a good way) and made me feel so comfortable returning to working out after nearly 2 years away from the gym. The other trainers are very nice and the gym itself is always clean, has enough space, and has a good variety of equipment. It s pet friendly too!
response_from_owner_text: Were so happy to hear that you enjoyed training with Sarah! We loved having you and Cici in our facility. Please come back soon!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I ve was training with Sarah for a few months and honestly I have nothing but positive things to say about her. As an individual, Sarah is one of the kindest people I have ever met. She s such a genuine person who really cares about people, which made it so easy for me to connect with her instantly. As a trainer, she listens to what your fitness goals are and really caters to that. She pays attention to your pains/limitations and works towards healing those (I work at a desk all day and she really worked on trying to reverse that damage). She takes time to make sure you re all warmed up, massages out any tight muscles from prior workouts, and switches workouts up often to make sure you re avoiding that plateau. What I love about her is how much importance she gives the mental aspect of working out along with the physical. The progress that I saw within even 3 weeks was incredibly rewarding. She puts you through a very comfortable level of discomfort and isn t one of those trainers who you dread going to because of how intense it is. She greets you with a smile and makes it an incredibly positive experience overall. All-in-all, she s amazing. Life has gotten in the way and I haven t been able to reconnect with her but hoping to do so again in the near future.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your kind words, Simrit! We really enjoyed having your energy in our facility so we re happy to hear you enjoyed training with Sarah just as much. Hope to reconnect soon!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: These guys are the best personal trainers Ive met in Richmond. Ive known Ken since high school and he has never let anyone down. If youre on the fence, you wont regret signing up.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Lucien! Thank you for the review, Ken and the rest of the team appreciate your kind words!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I have been training at BLK for the past three months now. I first reached out to them in hope to find a relatively more private place to train due the pandemic. To my surprise, my trainer Mat introduced to me to a whole new perception about physical training. On top the sheer wills of working hard, he explains to me the necessity of working smart, and the progress is visible, and measurable. After sessions with Mat, I would feel much more comfortable working out by myself,  knowing that I am so much more knowledgable about fitness and my body in general. I would 100% recommend Mat to anyone from beginning level to advanced.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I have been training with Ken Lu for almost two months. He helped me a lot not only on lifting weights in accurate forms, but also on building self-discipline in following meal plans. He is an excellent personal trainer and he is very knowledgeable. I really enjoyed the classes with him and I definitely plan to stay and do more exercises with Ken for a longer period of time. I strongly recommend everyone take the first consulting class with Ken and Matt (its free), and I am sure you will like them.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Did personal training with Ken at Blk Box a year ago, learned a lot that I didnt know about from just going to a regular gym or any other PT trainers before Blk Box. Till today, I still practice the stuff he taught me and would recommend his training.
response_from_owner_text: Hi M, were happy that youve gained lots of knowledge from Ken! Lets hope to reconnect soon!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Hands down the best gym experience I ve ever had. Ken is patient, knowledgeable, and efficient. His simple approach to strength and body building training has assisted me in pursuing my fitness goals. You definitely leave happy and accomplished after just a single session. I would highly recommend BLK BOX GYM.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I ve joined BLK gym about two years ago when my weight was at my highest point. I met my trainer Harry and asked to help me gain the strength and energy and be fit enough to train Muay Thai. Harry was amazing from day one, he tailored the program to achieve my goals and has helped me every step of the way to reach them. From understanding nutrition plan, to weight training, to being there through tough days and best days. I started seeing results after few months. Not only had I the energy to train, run, be more active then I ever was, I was doing all of that pain free. Harry helped roll out and strengthen the muscles and made sure that every exercise was done in perfect form. I was able to maintain the weight loss for moths and started hitting weight lifting PRs that were more than my original weight. Harry helped me in so many ways, giving strength and energy to change my weight and in many ways my life.
response_from_owner_text: Were so thrilled to hear that Harry has made such an impact on your everyday life, Maria! Thankful to have you apart of our community.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I ve been training at BLK BOX just over 4 months. My trainer, Sarah, has been incredible at helping me accomplish my fitness and lifting goals! From the get-go, Sarah was results-driven and designed a custom workout program for me both at BLK BOX and at home (I own a home gym). On Day2 of training when she gave me an Excel spreadsheet of lifting homework to track progress, I knew she was my trainer!! I went from a pre-COVID deadlift PR of 135 to 185 comfortably in 4 weeks! And a squat PR of 85 to 155 in the same time! I can also finally do a non-assisted pull-up! Sarah is friendly, professional and very knowledgeable about lifting. She corrects my form to lift safely and pushes me to become stronger! Sarah lifts super heavy herself (ask her about her PRs)! I look forward to continue training with her :)
response_from_owner_text: Its awesome that you were able to achieve so much in a short span of training with Sarah! Keep crushing it, Michele!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: As part of my new year resolutions to become healthier, I signed up with one of personal trainers at Blk Box Gym, Matt. Its been close to 3 months and my experience has been overwhelmingly positive! Its hard work, but every session puts me one step closer to achieving my goals. So far, my walking posture has improved and my neck and back pains have lessened. Its a very rewarding experience seeing and feeling these improvements, and having Matts professional guidance aids in expediting my progress. He is very knowledgeable in the fitness field and helps someone like me, whos completely new to working out in correcting my form and understanding the reasoning behind each movement. The exercises vary in each session which keeps things fresh and interesting. I highly recommend Matt for personal training at Blk Box Gym especially if you dont know where to start on your journey to better health.
