place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I have been training with Matt, co-founder of this gym, for about 5 months and each training session is effective and better than expected. Backed by his more-than-a-decade experience as a bodybuilder and a trainer, Matt understands his clients  capability and limitations, providing personalized training routine and protection. He is super cool and easygoing. I sincerely recommend my trainer&friend Matt to whoever is interested in getting a better shape and lifestyle.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Amazing gym, clean and spacious! Has anything youd need for a good workout and the trainers there really know their stuff. They can explain and go over every movement with you, not only details on your form but also what muscle groups it works on. Did a group training session today with Ken. Intense but fun at the same time , will definitely be coming back! They also offer personal training. Highly recommend !!!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I worked with Matt for 3 months with the goal of getting back into shape. Within the set, my confidence returned, my strength went up and my knowledge of how to create my own workout program increased. Matt and Ken are incredibly inviting, knowledgeable and flexible. Their business model promotes local people with a strong work ethic. You cant go wrong with either of them for personal training.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I was suffering from mid / upper back pains since high school while performing any ab exercises and I came to see Harris for the issue. He was able to figure out what was causing the problem and help me fix issue in my very first visit. He started off with some tests with range of motion of my spine and discovered some asymmetries in rotation from left to right and also upper mid back tightness. Harris thoroughly explained to me the reasons why I was likely experiencing pains and gave me a couple mobility exercises to do before I start my workouts, stretches, and also taught me how to properly brace my core during my ab exercises to keep on being pain free while doing exercises. After the session I was able to perform exercises with absolutely no pain at all. I didnt expect my issue to be fixed this quickly considering its something Ive dealt with for years now and I regret not coming sooner. Highly recommend Harris for all your pains, injuries, and personal training needs in Richmond!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Jackie! We re happy to hear that we were able to help you move pain-free! Keep killing it.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I started my first personal training with Ken when I joined Steve Nash in 2015. He was professional, knowledgeable and nice. He would explain not only how to do an exercise correctly, but also which muscle group the exercise targets as well as the variation of it. Working with Ken gave me the confidence and resource to be self-sufficient so I was able to incorporate fitness in my daily life. Now, 3 years later, I am excited to join blk box gym, where I also get to meet Matt. Its a pleasure to work with the champions (both Ken and Matt are NPAA champions). They are passionate about training and dedicated to help their clients succeed.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Super friendly staff and very knowledgeable trainers! I started out with their group fitness classes then went ahead and signed up for a few personal training sessions. I thought I knew what I was doing before but Ken, my trainer, showed me all the little common mistakes and really helped refine my form in a lot of movements. Definitely planning to stay and do more here!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Ive been working with Ken from Blk Box Gym for a little over a month now and Im very glad I made the leap to commit to personal training. After thinking about personal training for a long time and doing a ton of research, I found Blk Box Gym. From the very start, Ken was supportive, approachable, and invested in helping me reach my goals. Ken is friendly but will make sure you work hard! What I appreciate about the program itself is that it is holistic and comprehensive; it is not just about the training nor just about dieting. Ken provides expertise and guidance for both exercise as well as nutrition and the program he has created for me is a great mix of aiming high when goal setting but also creating healthy habits that are sustainable and realistic based on my lifestyle. I look forward to the rest of the journey with Ken and Blk Box Gym.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I have been training here for a bit now and I have never had a better experience. I have trained and worked out in multiple gyms and none are quite like BLK box. Matt and Ken have really created a perfect experience with a perfect space, they have motivated me to create a better and more sustainable work out style!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: David Rojo has been my personal trainer for the past 8 years.  Because of David, my health, in general, has greatly improved. When I first started training with David, I was diagnosed with high blood pressure. Now normal.  Boxing for cardio, weight training and various other forms of exercise under the coaching of David, has helped keep my 77year old body in reasonable shape. David is the best coach and personal trainer anyone can ask for.  Hes caring and his clients remain his top priority.  I would recommend David to anyone looking for a top notch coach and personal trainer.  Over the past 8 years,David and I have become very good friends!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: The trainers are friendly, very knowledgeable and the gym is well equipped. Both personal trainers, Matt and Ken are bodybuilding champions. They look the part and walk the talk. If you are looking to get in shape I would definitely recommend BLK BOX GYM.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: David Rojo is a great personal trainer, I have been working with him with boxing and general fitness. He has really helped me with my chronic back, shoulder, and hip issues due to work habits. David is super positive, motivating and makes exercise fun. I cant recommend him enough!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I did PT with Jodie for two months. Shes brilliant - super knowledgeable and motivating. Thanks to her I was able to build my stamina, improve my strength and learn a variety of exercises tailored to my goals. Highly recommend :)
response_from_owner_text: Thrilled to hear that Jodie has helped you in your fitness journey! Keep killing it, Irena.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: First of all let me just say, over the years Ive trained at multiple gyms and have had different trainers over time. But nothing compares to BLK BOX GYM conveniently located in Richmond B.C. As the name states its black box gym, your literally working out and training in a box, thats of course painted black giving you a more overall better experience. With new equipment and very knowledgable Trainers your sure to accomplish your goal no matter what the obstacles may be. Im personally very proud to be part of Blk box gym and being able to have personal training and soon enough accomplish my goals thanks to my very good friends Matt Law and Ken Lu who are the trainers here. I believe the only way one can accomplish their goals is to put in the work so what are yall waiting for, check em out today!! And change your life forever

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Just did an intense group training session with Ken. He s really great, he knows how to communicate and explain the exercises well. He also gives excellent advice on if you re having any muscle pains. The environment itself is nice, spacious and all the trainers are very friendly. Overall great experience and would definitely recommend!!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Really enjoyed my time at blk box. Ken was very insightful and knowledgeable. Training at blk box I have gotten the results I have been looking for and it definitely couldn t have been possible without the help of Ken. The gym is never crowded and it is always clean the other trainers are incredibly friendly and it is a great environment to train in. Would definitely recommend.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Blk box gym Personal Training is really great. I was skinny but too unmotivated and shy to go to the gym. Ken is an amazing personal trainer and I am happy and now more confident with myself. Highly recommend

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Staff is extremely knowledgeable. The personal training I received from Ken is nothing short of professional. Theyve shown their knowledge and expertise in many aspects of weight lifting. Regardless, if youre going through a rehab or just working on strength training, the staff know what theyre doing and you cant find a better place to train elsewhere.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I ve had a lot of fun training with Jodie at BLK BOX. She s very knowledgeable and also incredibly patient and encouraging. I enjoy all my sessions so far and will definitely recommend this place (and Jodie!) to anyone who s looking for somewhere to train!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind words, Rachel! We appreciate it.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I had the pleasure of training with Harris, and I have nothing but the best to say about my personal training experience with him. I came into the session feeling generally good about my form, but there were certain lifts that were starting to become uncomfortable as I increased the weight. My bench press was such an example. Almost immediately Harris gave me some pointers and my bench press felt a lot better. It felt less strenuous in a good way, and I felt that my chest muscles were being activated more than before.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I m a regular at BLK BOx Gym. I very much enjoy the first-class attention to detail that Ken (my trainer) provides me when it comes to personal training. I started my fitness journey by myself a few years ago. I mostly did cardio and then a few compounded exercises that s suppose to give me a full body workout. In 2017 my friend referred me to Ken and said to give personal training a try. I was skeptical at first because I believed my training was sufficient. Boy was I wrong. Sure I was keeping my shape and losing weight, but I had no idea how to train effectly to target muscle growth. Ken s expertise have brought my own fitness goals to another level. If you are looking for personal training, attention to detail, first-class trainers, then do yourself a favour and sign up at BLK BOX. This gym is not your social hangout. It does not offer you lemonades, fresh towels or spas with fingerprint lockers - It s designed for one purpose and one purpose only: to give you a proper, scitentfically-proven, fastest way to attain your own fitness goals workout. I like it for its gritty, no B.S, no judgement type of environment. If you are serious about training, do yourself a favour and give them a try.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Before meeting Harris, I thought I understood the limitations of my body. Only after coming to BLK BOX I realized techniques and forms that elevated my lift potential. Having previous injuries limiting my mobility, Harris immediately knew what was wrong and educated me on stretches that allowed for deeper range of motion and full activation of my muscles. I definitely recommend going to BLK BOX and asking Harris for a consultation.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: During my time there, I had Ken as my trainer. He was very knowledgeable and professional and I learned a lot in terms of how my muscles developed, how to optimize my routine and the techniques involved in each exercise. Highly recommended!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Blk Box Gym is a really awesome gym! Very knowledgeable trainers Ken and Matt teach me how to live in a healthy lifestyle. Training with Ken for about a year makes me change a lot! I really enjoy training in Blk Box Gym!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: BLK Box gym is a great location for people of all fitness levels.Trainers are encouraging and dedicated.Staffs are very professional and informative. They offer personal training fitness sessions to build up muscle and help with posture.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: The gang at blk box are an amazing! They re fun to be around and are so supportive. I ve been training with Harry Patel for about 2.5 years and couldn t be happier. He s a great guy with a lot of knowledge! I alway have a good workout with him. Love my time at blk box

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: OKAY SO, I was recommended to Ken and so glad I decided to work with him. I m 25 but felt like I was 85 since I had back problems. Thankfully working Ken has allowed me to pinpoint my back issues, but that s not the point. THE POINT IS, the most rewarding experience I ve had is learning to maintain my lifestyle while still being in track and getting in shape.I thought I was smart about these things but turns out I m not. ALSO, KEN WENT ABOVE AND BEYOND trying to fit everything into my schedule, the number of workouts per week as well finding food that I liked but fit within my macros. I m not kidding I m legit busy all the time and not going to lie, I wasn t holding my end of the bargain. Ken was so nice and understanding but made sure I knew why training and being healthy was important. Honestly, everyone should invest in one of the personal trainers because really, it s an investment in yourself. You can tell they put a lot of work in the company. SO MORAL OF THE STORY, IF YOU DONT WANT A GENERIC PT AND SOMEONE WHO MAKES YOU FEEL YOUNG AND NOT 85 YEARS OLD GO TO BLACK BOX GYM. Not only will you be more healthy but you learn proper techniques (which your back will thank you later) and have fun. I MEAN IM A WOMAN AND I FEEL BADASS THAT I CAN LIFT MORE WEIGHTS THANKS TO KEN. I m not yelling, I m just mega excited.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: Everything you need for a personal training environment.  David Roxas is my boxing and Muay Thai coach with great results.  Focused training and designed for the fitness minded individual at any level or age

review_text: I ve been getting personal training with Ken. He s been excellent and very informative. He s been able to help with proper form, injury prevention, and meal planning. I highly recommend blk box gym. Looking forward to see how far I can go with Kens help in the next few months.

review_text: I ve been going to their boot camp class for two months now. Matt and Ken are awesome. They will guide you and make sure you are doing the exercise correctly. Definitely recommend all mommies that have very little time to work out.

review_text: I started to find Ken as my fitness coach at BLK gym in April. He provides very professional personal training and the class time is not long at all. review_text: Blk box gym is the most professional and carefully run store among all the personal training gyms I have visited so far. Not only do each of their coaches have great bodies, but their professional knowledge is also needless to say  . He really knows how to practice and teach, and the price is very affordable. place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: After being introduced by a friend, I signed up for personal training. Under the guidance of coach Ken Lu, I slowly started from the basics three times a week. Squats are now easy. The waist and legs also become stronger and stronger. The best thing is that if I have any muscle tightness or soreness during training, the coach can immediately help me relieve it with professional techniques. I like Kens professionalism very much and will always follow him in fitness.

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: I usually have the habit of exercising, and I started to exercise in this gym after being introduced by a friend. The fitness coach Ken helped me design an exclusive nutritional recipe, and carefully taught me how to calculate the nutrients I should take in a day, and how to increase healthily and effectively. muscle. Among them, the reason why I will continue to exercise here is that Ken will make many corrections and trainings for my movement standard accuracy and small details. There is a systematic and planned training, and he will pay attention to my weaknesses and past old injuries. There have been different changes in just 2 months. If you want more than a fixed exercise frequency, but more healthy and effective personal training, this gym is my first choice in Vancouver!

place_name: BLK BOX GYM - Personal Trainer in Richmond BC
review_text: At the beginning, I wanted to work out, but I didn t want to go to the crowded gym in Richmond because every time I went to the gym, I looked very embarrassed. But if I go to this gym because it is far away, I will never meet anyone I know, so I will never do it. Embarrassingly, I also learned a lot about fitness here and lost 20 pounds. The fitness instructors here can speak Chinese, Cantonese and English. I highly recommend this place.

review_text: This is located inside Tisol (right beside Staples) on Grandview highway. Friendly staff and especially the Veterinarians. Most appointments can be done here. Our dog had surgery at their Arbutus/ 16th location.  Pricing was fair when we compared initially. Dont oversell you.

The vet and all the staff here are so kind and super helpful and their pricing is very reasonable. We had a bad experience previously at hemlock animal hospital and were left very much in the dark about my senior cats kidney disease diagnosis. The vet here at Vancouver east took the extra time to sit with me and explain everything in detail and come up with a treatment plan, and explain what our options will be in the future when her condition worsens. Im so thankful we brought her here and got a second opinion. They will be our regular vet going forward with all pets, present and future.

Excellent clinic. The entire staff if friendly and professional. We go to Dr. Shura and could not recommend him enough. He is super calming and friendly to our dog and is very approachable to us. Always making sure we have time for questions. They give us the feeling that they are always covering all bases and check ups are thorough. We got our dog neutered there and all went great.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Yael! Were so glad youre enjoying your experiences with us.

review_text: We had the pleasure of dealing with Dr. Kevin Shura at the clinic. He was a real treat in what was a stressful situation. He treated the symptoms as presented and was honest and upfront about associated costs and his recommendations. All the office staff were pleasant and friendly - having a sick pet can be a bit stressful and they made us feel comfortable. Their rates are fair and the service is extraordinary - while the limited hours might be a bit inconvenient  if it isnt an emergency situation it is worth the wait to take your furry friends there!

Located inside the pet store, friendly animal loving staff and thorough pet doctors. Introduction of my pup to the vet was loaded with treats to ensure a good experience for the pup. The vet I spoke with was very informative and listened to my every concern, also gave me a earful of recommendations for a healthy pup. Very satisfied.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Justine! Were so glad to hear you and your pup enjoyed your experience with us. We look forward to seeing you again!

review_text: Great honest VET who showed they really cared for my pup. Dr Shura was amazing, very calming and even had my dog licking his face - which is very unusual in a vet visit as hes normally petrified but Dr Shura made us both feel in good hands. Could not recommend them enough!

I have nothing but good experiences here. The staffs are friendly and helpful. You should see how happy my dog saw Dr. Shura. It was a reunion after almost 7 years. That says a lot how much fond memories my dog was with Dr. Shura previously. Unlike some vets that I have experienced in the past that blown up a small matter out of proportion and requested never ending and expensive examinations, I like Dr. Shuras much sensible approach towards curing our hairy baby.

HIGHLY RECOMMEND. After going to a highly rated but VERY questionable veterinary practice in Vancouver, we finally brought our cat and dog to the clinic. I must admit, at first I thought, Huh, its in a pet store. It might not be the first place I would have thought to take our pets, but we love our neighborhood Tisol, and its close by in case of emergency. We have had great experiences here. Totally exceeded expectations. Dr. Uri and Dr. Hannah  are both very knowledgeable.  Together, they have now correctly diagnosed and treated: our Boston Terriers knee problem, my cats weird extra rib thing, an ear infection my cat has probably had for years, allergies, etc. Just when we were thinking Vancouver was some weird unregulated veterinary wasteland,  were so happy we found competent, professional, caring vets right down the street at the pet store. They dont try to sell you stuff you dont need or extract all your cats teeth to finance their vacation to Thailand. They do urge gold standard veterinary medicine, and while some people might not want to pay for diagnostic tests, etc., I believe they would only order a test  if they felt it was truly in the pets best interest.

We ve had our cat for 19 years and this is one of the best vet experiences we ve ever had. The doctor was experienced and knowledgeable and very compassionate. A thoroughly great experience even though our cat is sick.

The people working at Vancouver East clinic are professional, and knowledgeable.  My cats issues were resolved by changing in diet without any medication!  This new clinic location is great, plenty of parking and we are shopping at Tisol regularly.

I read many of the reviews and am not surprise by their outstanding comments. I had the great fortune  to find Dr. Uri a couple of years ago. My beloved 4 yr old, QQ had a growth under his tongue. I took my little guy in for a checkup and Uri found it. Was not easy to see but he did it!! Then he repeated the miracle last month. QQs growth is again, not malignant and I dont have the words to to express how grateful I am and how much I want other patients to know what an outstanding person and vet Uri is. I have had the opportunity to recently have worked on a project with him, outside of the office. He shines, not only as a vet, but as warm, sincere, and fun person. Theres a bed commercial in which one of the speakers says, I wish I could give the ____ bed more than 5 stars. I feel the same about Uri.   Andy Krieger, QQs dad  Vancouver  Aug 4, 2019

I came here after being unsatisfied with other vets in the area. Im glad I did. Within 5 minutes of talking to Melanie, I got more advice than I did with multiple visits to my other vet. She knew her stuff and gave me plenty of dietary advice. Safe to say this will be where I come from now on.

Weve been here many times already. The staff here is very friendly and super helpful. The doctor is very experienced and patient too. They are the professionals that you can definitely rely on for your furry kids!
I had to see a doctor for my dogs urgently and I was looking for walking clinic. I called this vet and they were able to accommodate us within an hour. The doctor was super nice and knowledgeable.
It was great experience to combine visit to Tisol with veterinarian s examination.  My dog had skin problems for a long time.  With treatment recommended, we saw improvement right away.
Really friendly staff. Very upfront and honest vet. Easy to understand. Great location as well! Tons of parking A++
It is a great idea to have the clinic, groomer, and pet supply at the same location. The staff was friendly and helpful. i got advice on my cats dietary problem right away.
The staff are so helpful, communicative and most importantly gentle with pets. My slightly jumpy pup got 3 vaccine updates in just a minute with out even flinching.
Staff very friendly and helpful
Very friendly and helpful staff/ Veterinarians with the convenience of being in a pet store. Such a great atmosphere to take my pets. I love it!
I brought my dog in because he was vomiting. The staff was amazing. I had a couple of follow up phone calls . Thank you very much!
Super friendly and helpful.  Same prices as the SPCA but provide an amazing level of service.    Will be coming back again.
Every time I come here the vet is so welcomintg and give great service! I will continue to bring my dog here.
Veterinarians are extremely helpful and spend time to explain everything. Best vet clinic in Vancouver!
Everyone was a great help with my cat,who has developed allergies. Will always go back.
Thank you Dr Burstyn for your helpful recommendations that improved our cats experience.
Polite, friendly, compassionate and quick, reasonably priced
Great vet
So kind and up front. We are very glad we came here.
You can tell these vets truly care about the animals
We love you guys!   :-)

Staff are attentive and helpful, grooming service is on point, and very helpful for pets with longer fur and mats.  Only point of contention is that sometimes the veterinary clinic is open for business, but the staff are not present, and only the groomer is on site.  So it makes it difficult to pickup meds and prescriptions for your animal.  Not a consistent  thing to happen, but something to be aware of in case.

4 stars because I only dealt with one of the lady s one time so I can t say they are all as great as her. She calmly and understandingly took my mean little chihuahua in (with no muzzle) to clip his nails

Although have a very good vet (Dr Shura) who we ve been happy with the past 2 years, the limited & confused operating hours at this place keeps getting worse, while prices keep going up. Their Google maps opening hours here clearly show open on Saturdays, yet we came today from the other side of town to pick up medication, and the clinic has a sign inexplicably saying  CLOSED . We received a phone message from them last week saying our medication was ready to be picked up, but now when we phoned to check where it is, they told us there is no record of it in their system. Very disappointing. Would no longer recommend this place.
Dont expect much help from the cat though, if it is working the front desk!

Ive been to this vet a handful of times, but have not had a positive experience.  Theyre supposed to be a walk-in clinic, but whenever I walk in, they dont have any vets available.  Either theyre not there or busy for the next 1-2 hours.  Fine, so I tried calling in for an appointment before going.  Appointment confirmed by the front desk, then I must have gotten 2-3 calls asking me to reschedule for various reasons. Finally settled on an appointment, then I go in and I still have to wait a long time to be seen.  Every other time I had to make an appointment and every time I had to wait 15-30 mins. Then there were the issues with the food.  I was sold a bag of prescription food that expired within a month of the purchase date, but I didnt know until I got home.  I asked to return it, but I was told they had a no return policy.  They said I was told that I was buying almost expiring food and was given a discount.  I was not told this, and the invoice didnt note this either.  Finally spoke to a manager and had to settle for a credit for half the amount. Another issue with food, I was quoted one price over the phone and when I went in to pay for it, they raised the price.  My dog needed it, so I couldnt say no...  Not happy. The vets there are good though, and attentive...  So it seems the issues really are from the front desk staff only.  Its a bit of a shame, as this is a convenient location.

We recently moved homes so we had to find a new vet in our area. I saw the reviews for Vancouver East Veterinary Walk-In Clinic so we booked our cat in here. Sadly, this was a huge mistake on our part. We took our cat in for her annual checkup. All of the documents were transferred from our previous vet to this one, so it should have her up to date vaccine information and other health background. Unfortunately, Dr. Shura didnt even pay attention to her vaccination history anyways, and despite our cat having gotten her 3-year vaccines in 2018, he said it was done in 2017 and then vaccinated her anyways. I didnt notice this until I got home and saw my previous invoices from the previous vet that said she last got the vaccination in 2018. A few days after we got home from the vet, my cats hair started falling out in the area where the vaccination was injected. We tried calling Vancouver East Veterinary Walk-In Clinic on Wednesday at around 10AM and there was no pick-up (they are closed most of the week, open only for limited hours in the afternoon), no voice mail, and no emergency line you can call. We ended up having to drive back to our old vet to get her looked at because that was our only option. I understand that adverse side effect may happen after a vaccination, but I am very disappointed that the vet misread her vaccination history and gave her something she didnt need, and also we werent able to reach them or an alternate number. When we were getting our cat looked at, Mr. Shura said to us that he doesnt like to overvaccinate animals because hell get our money through teeth cleanings anyways (he had recommended a teeth cleaning for our cat). I couldnt tell if he was a vet or a used car salesman.

DO NOT TAKE YOUR ANIMALS HERE!!! After reading the reviews for this place I took my puppy here for his shots, they kept telling me that he had access ear wax and hairy ears that needed to be plucked at 30 bucks a pop. After 2 months of trusting this doctor I went to an animal hospital to get a second opinion. Turns out he had a SEVERE ear infection and had to be SEDATED so they could clean them out. HE COULD HAVE LOST HIS HEARING! HE COULD HAVE LOST HIS EYESIGHT, HE COULD HAVE DIED!!! This vet is incompetent. DO NOT TAKE YOUR PETS HERE!!!

I felt frustrated and left alone because it seemed that rules and regulations where more important than the well-being of my cat. I didnt have a sense that the needs of my cat were considered or that I was listened to and heard.as her owner. I would have wished for more flexibility, understanding and help.

Talked to this woman on the phone, heavy Irish accent very difficult to understand. Ask her to talk clear and slower. She will only tell me any fee s visit price nothing else. Some vets are charging $100.00 a visit !!!
This place is advertised as a walk-in, so we go in as walk-ins and are told they are completely booked. So they dont know what walk-in means so dont chance it and make an appointment.
Stay away from this clinic and ARBUTUS WEST ANIMAL do not trust Dr Uri Burstyn

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Staff are always attentive and willing to help. Jason, one of the Dr. Lams office assistants has helped me immensely. All the family physicians are very qualified at this clinic. There are a lot of admin support at this clinic for all the physicians working here so they can focus on their clinical work with patients. I highly recommend this clinic if you are in need of a family physician.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: When my amazing GP decided to end her practice, I was thinking that it would be a very difficult transition in finding a doctor that would accept new patients but she recommended Forward Care Medical Clinic to me and I was accepted quickly and easily. The receptionist service level is very professional in my opinion. They have a lot of patients calling in and patients walking in and they handle themselves very well. No abrupt attitude given to anyone everytime I was there. The doctor who sees me is named Andrew Chiu, hes very professional, gives great advice, tells it how it is, no sugar coating. The great thing about FCM is if your regular doctor is not available to treat you, any one doctor on site is capable of treating you as they have your records immediately available to see your history. I needed to see my doctor one day during this Covid time and my usual location in Oakridge Mall was booked all day, they said if its really of great importance and I couldnt wait a day I could go to their other location on 41st Avenue and they could see me within the hour. Thats just super convenient. Totally prefer this than going to a walk in clinic. I definitely would recommend Forward Care Medical Clinic to anyone looking for a new GP. 5 stars!!!

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: While I was reading reviews from others, I disagree with their experience. I found the front desk staff professional and friendly in their dealings with me. They are of course very busy, 3 front desk staff handling appointments for 8 doctors. My doctor is Dr. Lam and she is the most friendly doctor I met in the my past 70+ years. She does not chit chat much but she is caring and professional.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Great location. Definitely a busy medical office but super glad the family and I have a family doctor here. Front desk staff are organized. Sometimes the doctor does run late but its very reasonable given the amount of patients. Since COVID, theyve done a great job of not having too many people in the waiting area the times weve been. Overall very happy.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Great doctors.  Our family has been well taken care of by the doctors from cancer to migraine to childbirth.  I have seen a lot of complaints with the receptionists here.  I think most of them are pretty nice.  Some sounded a bit more blunt when they are speaking in English because of some cultural differences in my opinion. For those of you who couldn t sign up along with your family members, talk to your family doctors regarding the situation, they have the authority to override the administrative staff and put you into their system.  (The administrative staff sometimes just follows the procedure mechanically)

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Dr. Cindy Huang is my GP at this location and shes awesome. Very proactive in terms of annual testing and always on top of follow ups. The reception area always seems stressed but never misses anything.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: My family doctor, Dr. Janice Wong, she is so professional, caring and knowledgeable.  She treats her patients like a good friend and really cares about her patients.  Im glad that I can have Dr. Wong as my family doctor.  I feel Im well taken care of.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Dr. Chang  is as fine a person as one could want for a family doctor. She is kind, caring, and courteous.  She has always given her time graciously, and has been helpful to our family for many years. The receptionists are always helpful, polite and nice to us.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Ive always had prompt service unlike other medical clinics. I never had to wait for more than 5-10 min past my appointment time. The doctors weve seen so far are all friendly and addressed our concerns beyond our expectations. I highly recommend this clinic!!

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Dr Andrew Chiu and Dr Evelyn Wu are excellent, professional, helpful and caring.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Dr Andrew Chiu is an excellent doctor. He is professional, patient, a good listener and friendly. Grateful to have Dr Chiu as my doctor and Forward Medical Care as my clinic. Other positives is the location (Oakridge skytrain) and ability to book appointments online. Thanks

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: I am happy with the knowledge and professionalism this office possesses in their overall operation. The doctors are on top of their work and actually care about your wellbeing. It has been five years since I started with the clinic and I am not looking to change any time in the future.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: I have been the patient of the clinic for few years after my last family doctor retired.  Forward Care Medical Clinic really care about their patients and doing good follow up and recommendation.  I would highly recommend who ever doesnt have a family doctor to visit this clinic to apply a family doctor for their health care.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Our family doctor is Dr. Andrew and he is very considerate, humble and accommodating. I bombard him with questions/ information but he always listens intently and he is definitely not rude unlike my previous    .

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: I have found Dr Sung Mi Song to be both caring and thorough. Also my experience with support staff and receptionist have always been positive.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: I have been a patient of Dr. Amanda Laus at Forward Care Medical Clinic Oakridge since 2013. The care Ive received from Dr. Lau, other doctors at FCM, and their support staff has been wonderful. They are attentive and really take the word care to heart.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Dr Wu is great. The end.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: My doctor, Marco Lau, was a referral from my retired doctor, and I could not be happier!  He is knowledgeable, quick to respond, and never makes me feel like I should rush out of his office.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Dr. Sarah Bromilow and Olia really care for their clients.  Unfortunately I needed an emergency appointment and they took time out of their busy day to fit me in.  I cant express how grateful I am for their care.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Theyre always so quick and so kind. Dr. Chiu is incredibly thoughtful and thorough, Ive had countless appointments here and always been very happy with them.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Both Dr. Chiu & the doctor who is temporarily filling in for him (cant remember her name) are great!

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: I highly recommend Forward Care Medical Clinic specially Dr Sarah Bromilow, she is a great doctor who cares about her patient

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Its very professional and the doctors/ staff are attentive and kind

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: I ve been going to this busy clinic for several years. The doctors are pleasant and have good bedside manner. For urgent appointments, I ve been fit in to an appointment same day or next day with my primary physician or another on duty physician that day. The front staff team is efficient. The clinic is quite busy most days, even during the pandemic, so expect a short wait before seeing your doctor.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Doctors are excellent. Very efficient on both regular and virtual appointments. Front desk staff are alright, their manners could be more professional and more pleasant. Some of them still need additional training on telephone etiquettes and organisational skills such as informing patients about information of the referral Dr., location, time and date in a sequence instead of jumping back and forth with the info.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: I follow my GP wherever she goes, thats how I started coming to FCM, so as my family members. I dont find the front desk staff extremely friendly, but it seems to be busy at the front all the time and I dont have any high expectation for front desk, to be honest. All I care is our GP - shes wonderful, compassionate, caring and very knowledgeable.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: This is a busy practice, but Ive never had too much trouble getting an appointment with my family doctor. Itd be nice if they had online booking or did prescription refills over the phone, but I understand as someone who manages systems for businesses that its no small task to get such a thing setup. I always have a good experience.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: FCM team at both locations are great. I like how Doctors take the time to listen to your issues. The front of house is always super busy but they always manage to get things done. They have been awesome at quickly adapting to ensure the safety of the patients during the COVID pandemic.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: I like there is an option to book online. However I wish there are more flexible appointment times especially for people who does not have many sick days and can only visit the doctor outside work time.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: My doctor is pretty good. And hes helped me out within my expectations.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Nice doctors!

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Long time patient of this clinic and the doctors here, but this one incident involving their reception staff was just appalling. Your reception staff must disclose to all patients that there is a $50 no show fee even for phone call appointments. To force someone to pay this fee after a phone call was missed for legitimate reasons ESPECIALLY when it was not disclosed upon booking is borderline robbing. Please reconsider your policy surrounding phone vs. in-person appointments and/or re-train reception staff to be more considerate of patients circumstances. It seems they can greatly benefit from a lesson in using discretion. Not every patient visits the clinic frequently enough to see the notices for themselves. It is the job of the front desk receptionists to make policies transparent. Such a shame to have encountered hostility from your staff after so so many years of being a patient (my entire life so far to be exact...). To expect us to constantly bend our equally busy schedules to fit into the odd schedules of all the doctors here is impractical and a quick way to lose patients. I am starting to think I am better off finding a different practice to seek health care. The current front desk team is truly mediocre at their job at best. Edit: reply received and read. Unfortunately it missed to address the point about reception staff failing to disclose such an apparently important policy. Still not willing to admit wrongdoing?
response_from_owner_text: Hello Kimberly, We are very sorry for your experience. When our patients book appointments, we expect them to be committed to the time they booked. If our patients are unable to make it to the time they booked, they are welcome to call in and adjust their appointment 24 hours before their booked time. If our patients have an emergency or a legitimate reason, we usually waive the no show fee and end with a warning. Phone appointments are just as important as in-person appointments, which is why there is a no show fee for phone calls as well. If you still have any questions or concerns, please email us at info@forwardcaremedical.com and we will assist you the best of our abilities. Thank you, FCM

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: 5 stars for my GP. None for the front staff. Just like the other reviews, front desk is dismissive but friendly at best. Most of the time just dismissive though. Fees are also ridiculously high. However, my GP is one of the most friendly/skilled people on the planet and its a shame I cant give him 5 stars out of pocket. Waiting area is cramped and sometimes you wait outside if its really full.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Have been a customer for a few years but a little frustrated: This practice is extremely busy and has probably taken on too many doctors and patients , with an administrative pool now unable to cope and provide adequate service: - Phone lines are constantly busy . - Phone mailboxes often full and caller can not leave message. - Nil response and coverage or help on weekends. - Poor English language skills of several receptionist / secretary. Some are hard to understand. - Slow and unnecessarily complicated referral system to get specialists. - can never speak or communicate to doctor , only to the overloaded and slow response office. People , doctors and staff are nice , but none seems able to change or improve the system and seem disempowered. Anders Nordin

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Dr Sung mi Song is very rude and unprepared doctor.  Most time  I visited her she had wrong information about my medical records and it made me feel she was not prepared before meeting her patient. It seemed it didn t bother her at all. During the meeting, she used to talk to me in an unpleasant way that she seemed she was very annoyed by me not understanding what she said. She probably thought I was a stupid. As a patient I was very discouraged to ask questions and I didn t feel like to keep conversation with her. There WERE times She didn t called me on time, or met me when in-person meeting(which I understood since she could be busy). But she was very impatient and even aggressive when I couldn t received her call on time when I was really sick. She called  7 times in a row  in total to me and my husband which I think is not necessary (she probably want us to receive the call so that she can yell) and said, we d better find another dr if we keep doing this. It sounded almost like a threat. I wish I could recorded the phone call I had with her. If you have a baby, don t take them to her since she seems she doesn t know how to treat with a little one. My baby was literally freaked out whenever getting a shot from her. It was horrible experiences as a parent, but since it s hard to find a dr so I kinda made compromise to keep her as my dr. Now I regret myself being too patient with her and didn t find another dr more earlier. Hopefully nobody had or will have experiences like me. Not sure if anyone from the clinic is willing to talk to me but I want to let dr. Song to know that patients are not stupid, and not her emotional trashcan.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: I love Dr Li, endocrinologist. She is young, kind and very thorough when it comes to patient care. However, her receptionist is very not thoughtful about patient care. Since my mom doesnt speak English, I volunteered to translate and do phone appointment.  She refused to make an conference call appointment at first without asking Dr.Li since she is not familiar with it. I had to ask her to ask Dr Li and convince her for 10min before she asked the Dr. Dr. Li also forgot to order some blood work before CT scan and I called the receptionist to get requisition  And she suggested to call our family doctor instead. Very unkind. Very disrespectful.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Doesnt accept new patients completely pointless clinic its supposed to be for walk-ins for the public not for five people you chose.......... Absolutely ridiculous.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Started to see Dr Amanda Lau before they expanded from a 2 doctors office. Too business type of services instead of a caring practice. No more than  2 questions allowed to ask  even if you have not seen them for so long! The office is so crowded like a zoo!  I was put on hold with that terrible ding ding music every single call & you will be told that the next appointment will be a week later! I feel sorry for those sick elderly patients if they need quick assistance! Even worst is when the elderly dont even know how to book the appointment online! Terrible office management with too many doctors working for Dr Amanda Lau, the boss, who only works 2 days a week, few hours a day. Expecting the patients to accommodate her schedules so I requested to switch to one of her staff doctors but no spaces were reserved for us, the loyal patients! I will never come back to this office again!
response_from_owner_text: Hello, we are very sorry about your experience. Unfortunately, we can only limit our patients to one or two concerns per appointment as there is a time restraint. If we allow our patients to go over the 10 minute limit, other patients would not be able to have their appointment on time. We do however encourage our patients to book multiple appointments if they have more concerns to discuss with our doctors. If our patients require quick assistance, we do sometimes allow urgent same-day bookings. If you have any questions or concerns, please email us at info@forwardcaremedical.com and we will help you in the best way we can. Thank you, FCM

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: My Doctor Evelyn Wu, Shes wonderful and really cares about her patients. But I will going back to walk in clinics again and hopefully find a new location will the front has manners. A reception here will argue only to prove youre wrong probably just to feel good instead of trying to find a solution.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Who is the horrible woman who called me from the waiting room and took me into the  examination room at 2.30 pm on October 16, 2020? She was rude, aggressive, snapped at me, ordered me uncross my legs, screamed at me to take my shoes off and was generally unbelievably unpleasant. She was dressed in blue and I had a very difficult time understanding her. as her English is terrible. Whoever this person is, would someone in the office tell her that she needs to improve her manners. Patients are not cattle to be ordered around by this very unpleasant person. On the plus side, the receptionist was very nice and Dr. Song is great.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: I ve been coming to this clinic when Dr Chan was the only doctor here. She then opened forward care medical with only 3 doctors in the office including herself. When she retired she passed her client list over to another Dr who is still in the office to this day. She was my family doctor until I decided I wanted to switch to a new doctor within the same office. I found out recently that she has left forward care medical. And as a clinic that prides themselves of taking care of their patients. They did not pass her clients on to any other doctor. I called today to talk to reception to ask if I can see any other doctor in the office or even go back to the old doctor. This man said and I quote  you can not cause tech you re no longer our patient or part of our clinic anymore since you were dr - patient I understand there s a shortage of family doctors in bc and everyone wants and needs a family doctor. But this is truely heartbreaking to be with forwardcare medical from the ground up and for them to leave you with no doctor and no care. To give you an idea I ve been with them for 25 years. I want people to know that this is not a clinic worth coming to.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: I walked in to Forward Care Medical Clinic and asked if they were accepting new applications. The receptionist said yes and gave me the application form. I filled and gave to them. They said they would call for the first appointment WHICH they never did. I call to followed up and I was told by the rudest receptionist that Dr. Sung is not accepting new patients. I request to talk to another person as she was extremely rude to me. The next person was the same, told me I was in the waiting list and hang up. I cannot believe a medical office treat people like that. What a shame!

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: If you have an option, I want to warn you about Dr. Sung-Mi Song. I had an appointment with her since she was taking new patients. Unfortunately I missed that appointment and the receptionist called me leaving a message telling me that because Ive missed that first appointment, I need to pay $30 for missing it but I can reschedule the appointment. I said, thats fine, Ill pay the $30 and rescheduled the new appointment. On the day of the appointment, the receptionist called me and told me that Dr.Song now rejects me as a patient because I had missed my first appointment. I asked the receptionist, is this regular protocol? If so, why did you initially tell me that I had to pay a $30 fee and offered to reschedule? And what about the fact that I took time off work so that I could get to this appointment? Are you going to compensate me for work that I had to rearrange for this appointment? The receptionist sounded scared and just said I just do what the doctor tells me and wanted to hang up. And that was it. I havent seen Dr. Song as a patient, but I wanted to let the next patient know that if you do see Dr. Song, consider that she might change her mind last minute, remorselessly.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: I give review based on only receptionist that was very rude. I called to get result of my mammogram. I was on hold for about an hour then she picks up the phone and tells me doctor notes says he needs to see me to discuss the result of my mammogram, so I need referral to see this doctor. It was a new doctor, the one referred me was on maternity  leave so I asked the right spelling of his name so I could ask my family doctor for referral and first she refused to give me saying doctor only gave me this instruction to tel you this! Then I repeated could you please spell the name! And she was so fast and inpatient and not clear so I ask again and she didn t want to help! Very sad for people who are in needs of urgent medical procedure and has to deal with such people!

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Receptionists are rude and unprofessional most of the time. They might provide inconsistent information which cause confusion to patients. its a business rather than a medical clinic which provide help and advise to patient. I would not recommend this clinic at all.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: I love my GP but this office have the worse receptionists working at the front desk!  They are not friendly on the phone and there is never a time when I phone to make an appointment that I wasnt put on hold for a good 5mins.  The receptionists are also not friendly in person.  I never get in on time as there is always a minimum of 30 minutes of wait time but they penalize the patient for being late.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: I called to try to make an appointment and they told me they do not attend people who are not patients. I have been with a dry cough and sore throat for a week now and every walk-in clinic says the same. Whats the point of being a doctor if you are not going to help people?! Whats the point of being a clinic if you will not receive people?!

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Completely abandoned after one of their doctors (Chan) retired. No succession planning or referrals for any of her patients, just completely left out in the cold. Many loyal patients of decades have to scramble to find new doctors, and to add insult to injury for the added privilege of abandoning their patients they charge $50 to have your files transferred over to a new doctor. I hope this racketeering nonsense of a medical clinic gets shut down for malpractice - its the very least they deserve.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: worse admin staff ever.  calling 30 mins before appt to cancel isnt acceptable. the receptionist  said she tried calling a few days ago but no one picked up - I said she should have left a voicemail. thats how messages work!  what about work number? what about email? right. no email. because  they are still in the dark ages. grr.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Dr. Forson Chan is a doctor without compassion and morality. He turned me away from the walk in clinic and refused to treat me for my health issue. I guess he has forgotten his Hippocratic Oath. He suggested I get on a bus, in a pandemic, and travel to another city to see a doctor where I used to live.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Very rude and unhelpful receptionist. Kept telling me that I had not seen my doctor before even though this was a follow up appointment 3 months after my original appointment. She ended up slamming the phone on me because she could not understand what I was saying nor could I understand her.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Terrible assistance, doctors not that qualified. Thought that tamiflu was only used to relieve symptoms and I had to go to another doctor to find out that tamiflu is an antiviral.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: The doctors are all polite, efficient, and caring; however, the receptionists at the front are quite rude and disrespectful which ruined the whole experience for me.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Receptionists are horrible. Particularly one, is Rude and abrasive.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Very poor etiquette.  Not helpful at all, when my mom called in to book an appointment, they yelled at her.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Poor customer service. They do not respond to your questions. The doctors and staff are quite snobby in my opinion. Even the receptionist could not provide any assistance.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Bad attitude, dont take any walkin or appointment. And dont provide any alternative options.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Receptionist was very unkind and low English speaking only talk with words.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Incompetent doctor.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: The attitude of the front desk is so bad that it explodes. I am not a doctor, what do you expect. The receptionist is very unprofessional and bad attitude.
review_translated_text: the receptionist is very unprofessional and bad attitude.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
(Not a Walk-in Clinic) Marine Gateway Medical Clinic - Family Practice
review_text: Utterly confused why this clinic would receive anything less than five stars. Convenient location on the upper floor of Marine Gateway Hub. Operates Monday to Friday. Lovely and professional staff who remain patient, helpful and composed during this unusually difficult time. Our family is seen and treated by Dr Vasquez who has brilliant reviews on Rate My MD (not at all surprising). We have also seen Dr Cubra on occasion when Dr Vasquez has been away. Both doctors are incredibly patient, empathetic, and knowledgeable with relationships to other fantastic specialists in the community. Dr Vasquez is hardly ever late for an appointment - sometimes he is a few minutes early. On the rare occasion I have waited an additional 5-10 minutes but this is a far departure from our previous GP. I can t believe had become accustomed to waiting 1 hour + elsewhere. When this clinic moved into our neighbourhood a few years ago, I happened to ask the receptionist which doctor I should see and they told me that ALL of them were amazing. We have happily found this to be true!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your feedback on your experience with our clinic.  We have been working very hard to continue to navigate this ever changing situation and appreciate your kindness and patience.   We look forward to providing you with continued care. Stay safe!

place_name: (Not a Walk-in Clinic) Marine Gateway Medical Clinic - Family Practice
review_text: I cannot say enough good things about this clinic and I have recommended it to so many of my coworkers and friends! Here s what I love the most: - The interior design of the clinic is just beautiful. It feels very welcoming and is always super clean! - All the ladies at the reception are so lovely, patient and helpful. I find their service always friendly and I never feel rushed when booking an appointment or asking a question, even though they are very busy! - I use the walk-in clinic here and Dr. Cubra is absolutely amazing. He is the kindest doctor,  very patient, understanding, trustworthy and extremely knowledgeable. I never feel rushed and he always takes the time to listen to my symptoms and explain his recommendations. I truly believe he goes above and beyond for all the patients he sees. He has been an extremely huge help (especially this year) for me and I am so thankful for him and this clinic. The team at this clinic...they are the best! - I have never felt I had to wait an unreasonable amount of time, which is amazing for a walk-in clinic. And if they feel I have, they always apologize which just shows how thoughtful they are. Thank you so much, Marine Gateway MC. I so appreciate all you do for me and the other patients you see.

place_name: (Not a Walk-in Clinic) Marine Gateway Medical Clinic - Family Practice
review_text: I have had tightness and pain in my left arm after my second vaccination for 4 months now. I ve gone to the chiropractor, acupuncture, massage therapists with no avail and after enduring this pain for 4 months, I already lost hope and figured life would be like this since I m getting into my late 60 s. However after seeing Lester for Physio, in just 2 sessions I already feel 40% better! I went from having limited mobility and no strength in my left arm to being able to go about my day normally now I highly recommend people to see Lester as he is very caring and skillful!

place_name: (Not a Walk-in Clinic) Marine Gateway Medical Clinic - Family Practice
review_text: Dr. Khubra is my doctor there and he is a very knowledgeable and caring physician. He always makes sure I leave the office fully informed and I never feel like the appointments are rushed. He seems to be working a lot to stay up to date with the latest research and comes across as a true professional who is passionate about what he does. Great clinic, great staff.

place_name: (Not a Walk-in Clinic) Marine Gateway Medical Clinic - Family Practice
review_text: Dr Vasquez is definitely the very best dr Ive ever had in my entire life and i honesty can not say enough good things about him. Hes kind, compassionate and always extremely professional. I like dr Vasquez so much that when i was thinking about moving away, i considered the fact that Id be losing him as my dr. Spoiler alert, im still here. The front staff are also very lovely, always polite, compassionate and Very professional. I honestly cant understand anyone having an issue with this clinic. Lynne LeBlanc Update: I moved to the sunshine Coast and take the ferry over anytime I need to see Dr. Vasquez. Good doctors are really hard to come by, So when you find a Dr like him, trust me you dont give him up easily.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind words Lynne!

place_name: (Not a Walk-in Clinic) Marine Gateway Medical Clinic - Family Practice
review_text: Dr. Cubra is the best doctor I ve seen so far. He listens very well, and answers all your questions before your mind even thinks of asking them. I never feel rushed with him. The staff is nice and I never have to wait for my appointment.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Sasha!

place_name: (Not a Walk-in Clinic) Marine Gateway Medical Clinic - Family Practice
review_text: It was a week before Christmas, and I had a horrible throat infection/flu. EVery single clinic in Richmond was full till AFTER boxing day. I was loosing hope. Then my brother in-law called this clinic. They told him the wait was 45 mins. When I got to the clinic I indeed waiting 45 mins, then quickly got brought back to the exam room. This sweet lady doctor walked in and she was so nice, listened to me then checked me out I was in and out within 10-15mins.eill deffinatly be coming back

review_text: Great.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Alexander, Perhaps there was some confusion on your part about how our earlier exchanges transpired, so please allow me to provide some clarity. You initially requested a weekend appointment a few months ago, and we were, unfortunately, unable to accommodate your ask as it fell outside our hours of operation. I did, however, still help you the best I could by locating another clinic near you as an alternative. Your request and my subsequent email correspondences occurred during a brief period when we experienced difficulties with our email server, something for which I apologized for at the time. As I am sure you know, it is an unfortunate reality that technology does not always work the way we expect it should despite our best efforts. When you spoke with my colleague last week requesting an appointment, she informed you of our clinic policy which requires new patients to present to the clinic by walk-in for their first visit. I am afraid you may have confused these two different exchanges, which occurred nearly eight months apart, as one occurrence, one of which was not your own. Nevertheless, I feel it is important to offer insight into any misconceptions you may still have about how a medical clinic, specifically our clinic, operates so that you are better informed in the future when trying to access care. The foundation of a walk-in clinic operates on the principle that a patient may present to a clinic without an appointment to access urgent or time-sensitive medical care on the same day. This concept will cease to exist in its practical sense if there is an expectation that clinics should schedule appointments in advance. Moreover, scheduling appointments ahead of time in a walk-in setting will make it extremely difficult for patients in need of urgent care to receive timely care. With that said, we also recognize that,  for a number of people, an appointment system is more ideal due to personal or professional commitments. For this reason, we operate as a hybrid by offering both walk-in and appointment services so that we may better accommodate everyone. To ensure we can accomplish this successfully, a number of different policies have had to be implemented to organize how and when each service can be rendered. One such policy is that new patients are required to present to the clinic by walk-in for their first appointment. This allows us to validate a new patients information, and ensure they are adequately informed of our clinic policies. While we acknowledge that not everyone will be agreeable to this caveat, it has ultimately allowed us to increase access to care for patients by drastically reducing our no-show rate so we may use resources, such as physician time, more efficiently. Therefore, although we are a business and some of our policies may not always equate to good business acumen, we feel it would be unethical to compromise the quality of care and access to medical services by operating as though healthcare is about commerce rather than the health and well-being of people. I hope the information above can help you understand the events that lead up to your experience, but should you need further clarification for our clinic procedures, I would be happy to address your concerns, so please do not hesitate to contact me. Kind regards, Marjan Amiri, Management for Marine Gateway Medical Clinic

review_text: So they asked for a review and I asked the lady who runs the team pretty flatly You do a good job every time and Ill write you a review but, I gotta know if your boss is good to you, lets you all take time off when youre sick, that kinda thing. and she was so confused for a sec and then said that of course he does and shes very happy to work there and never had any trouble about things like that. Frankly, theres nothing more important to me than knowing these folks arent treated poorly. Weve had these cleaners coming by since the fall and theyve been great. They show up almost universally on-time or early, clean the place thoroughly (I can see myself in the tile), and theyre all very friendly. The price is good too my partner and I due to the pandemic didnt have to pay for 2 zone bus passes anymore and that was more than enough to pay for 1 visit a month for our 850~ sq foot low-junk apartment in the burbs. We were happy enough with the service that we upped it to 2 visits and thats enough to keep this place in great shape. Theyve been great about the restrictions and so have we, they work in the bedrooms and we go to the living room, they finish in there and we swap so they can do the rest of the place, windows open, air circulating! We can do 2m in the apt no problem. Thank you so much Areli and your team for making our time during the pandemic so much more enjoyable and our space so much more livable! This might be my favourite bill to pay! Service: Standard cleaning

review_text: I called Bruce on Wednesday to come into my family home for a deep clean. He was able to get us in the next day! review_text: Had some unclear communication, and was charged more than I had expected/what was quoted for me. response_from_owner_text: Thank you for using The Maids and we re sorry there was confusion on the pricing, Elle.  When setting up service over the phone, we try to collect as much information about the home to provide an estimate for how long our team of four will need to be in the home.  It is just an estimate until we get to the home to clean.  At that time the manager or team supervisor communicates more specific information on how long it will take to provide a professional, quality clean and can always customize the service to best meet your cleaning and budget needs.   We apologize that there was a miscommunication on your estimate. We do appreciate your feedback as all comments help us improve our communications with customers.

place_name: Army Navy & Air Force Veterans in Canada Unit 100
review_text: Support Our Troops both past and present. When one considers with gratitude the freedoms which are enjoyed today in the culture that we have -  with the democracy that we hold dear to heart - its important to remember that we are living the legacy of giants who came before us. This is the world that I wanted to leave for my children, one that is imperfect, yet strives to move towards an unilateral improvement for the good of this world, our species and our god. Some may see our modern day Legions or other gathering spots for veterans of war as bygone institutions. Places where you go to get a beer and a 50/50 ticket for a meat draw and thats it, but no. Look beneath what is visible on the surface and what you see are old friends stitched together from the bonds of war, men and women who have seen inordinate levels of loss, yet are bound by their camaraderie and companionship to meet and greet each other despite the ongoing battles this world invariably succumbs to. This is what people miss. So make your way down to the local arena of friendship. I highly recommend it.

Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Dr. Michelle Lin is my moms and my family doctor. She is patient, genuine, punctual, efficient, and goes the extra mile to ensure we clearly understand the issues and applicable next steps. We sincerely feel privileged to have her as our family doctor as she always makes sure we are comfortable and well-cared for. For example, Dr. Lin is mindful of slowing down her speech so my mom (English is not her first language) can carefully understand her. She is kind to always ask if we have any further questions before wrapping up our appointment as well. I also had a blood test yesterday and I did not schedule a follow-up appointment. I was pleasantly surprised that Dr. Lin called me today to go through my results together with me! We are both very thankful and appreciative of her wonderful care :)

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Dr Currie is great. I recently experienced a loss and was treated in the hospital. Upon getting the records in her office, she went out of her way to personally call me and make sure that I was doing okay mentally. Compared to my previous doctor, wait times arent that bad. The front desk team are friendly and helpful.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Had such a great experience with this office. We havent even met the doctor yet but the receptionists were such a pleasure to interact with.  Went out of their way to try and find our forms and information, which may seem silly but with my previous negative experiences with front desk people, this was a nice change. Office space is nice and the people are warm and friendly. So happy we found this office.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: The family doctors at this clinic are exceptional! Hardworking, genuine and go the extra mile. Contrary to some of the other comments, Ive had really positive experiences with the receptionists and MOAs. Theyve been really helpful at coordinating appointments and speedy at letting me know as soon as results come in.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: The staff at forward care treat you like family. The doctors pay attention to you and your concerns. Online booking is easy and gets approved quickly. More clinics should strive to be like forward care.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: My family Doctor is Venetia Mah.  I trust her and other doctors filling in.  There is free street parking from 930am to 3pm.  Staff here also speak Chinese.  Washroom is clean.  Location is convenient for me.  I can call in the morning to get on the waiting list.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Doctor Yuen is a gem. Shes a real human being with the best of care for all her patients. You wont find a better doctor.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Dr Lam and all her staff are very friendly. I highly recommend a consult with Dr  Lam. They do great work and end up feeling good.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Dr J Wong and the staff at this location are wonderful and treat their patients with great care and attention. Great experience, thank you!
