review_text: I chose the Forward Care East Clinic for my mother in law as its close to where she lives, the doctor is caring (Dr Jeffrey Lau) and the reception staff is very efficient. Pre-Covid, when my mother in law had some dizzy episodes on a Saturday, we call the office, they fit her in with another doctor in the office and follow up with a letter to Emergency. Currently, they do either phone appointments or in office appointments and most times when we are in the phone appointment, if the doctor needs to see what is concerning (a rash, take blood pressure, etc.), they do their best to find time to let you come in, luckily for us it was within the same day. They referred my mother in law for a geriatrician, and Dr Zhang is also located in the same office. Very efficient in communication and coordination. Before the Geriatrician appointment, the staff called us twice with reminders. I appreciate the calls and reminders. The online booking is the only negative. We get email notification to book for flu shots, etc but our doctor was not set up, or wont allow on the booking site.  Most times it doesnt work, so best to call the office.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Came in today to get a nasal spray to fight off the seasonal flu. I was surprised that there was no long waiting times and I got my appointment right on time. When I used to see Dr. Chan wait times at the clinic were quite long. Dr. Lau is also a younger asian male doctor around my age so I find it easier to talk to him compared to an old lady or man.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Not a walk in clinic: I typed walk in clinics near me and it pointed me here. I asked the front counter person if I could book an appointment. She said they werent a walk in clinic; that none of the doctors were taking any clients in; I thanked her and left immediately.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: To echo a lot of the other reviews, my doctor, Dr. Michelle Lin is fantastic. She is personable, relaxed and is dedicated to finding more than 1 solution to a problem. The issue is with the front desk staff. They exude no compassion or desire to be serving patients. They never make eye contact and speak among themselves (which is totally fine), but on several occasions, they have would cut me off or taken a phone call while I was speaking mid-sentence. Im not sure whether they feel like theyre not valued enough to provide a basic level of customer service, but the level of care between the doctors and receptionists are not comparable.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: My family doctor,  Dr. Wu is fantastic, but thats the only reason I go to this clinic. I called to cancel MY appointment, because my daughter stays home with high fever, the receptionist said oh, cancelling the same day appointment will be $30. That was it. No sorry to hear, or any kind words!! Now I have to force myself to go to the clinic, which is full of sick people, with my sick child!  I guess I might as well tell doctor to take a look at her!

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: The doctors here are all great in my experience, and have a lot of compassion and knowledge.  Dont come if you are shy to work with interns though, as it is a teaching clinic. The front area is not super discreet, or comfortable, and unfortunately I have no relationship with any of the staff: they are not very friendly  or authentic, and never know my name....which makes the overall experience a little impersonal and unpleasant despite the great doctor care.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Both of the doctors Ive seen at this place are fantastic however the staff is TERRIBLE. I lost count of how many referrals have been forgotten, test results that have sat at the front desk without the doctor seeing them before I had to call and make an appointment, them not communicating to the doctor what the appointment was for leading to rescheduling if it required more time than was scheduled for, put on hold for 10+ mins, rude service, etc. Recently I moved to a different city and paid for my childrens medical records to be transferred to our new doctors office. Two weeks later as I was trying to schedule an appt our new doctor said she still hadnt received the records.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: The doctors are good but unfortunately I had so many miscommunications with the receptionist on phone. When I got to the clinic the receptionists were dressed up like PJs. Horrible experience but again doctors are nice.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: this review is very specific to the older Chinese lady with the frizzy hair girl named Lily, She is very rude and unwilling to help all the time. She seems very unhappy with her role at this clinic. Her behaviour makes unwell people feel worse. Other staff members and Doctors are all exceptional and always willing to go extra mile to help their patients.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: I started going to this clinic because my family doctor moved practices. Besides being closer to my home, it is inferior in every way to the old clinic I would go to. The staff, while friendly, are mostly unhelpful and refuse basic things (like calling a taxi for patients). The clinic itself is small and youre forced to make appointments and referrals with 10~ people a couple steps away. Anything you ask the staff or talk to the staff about, everyone will hear. This clinic also doesnt allow you to leave messages outside of clinic hours and doesnt have a voicemail system set up at all, making it impossible to cancel or reschedule appointments if youre sick or outside a normal business hours routine. With the state of healthcare in Vancouver you dont really get much of a choice in where you see a family doctor, but if you do have a choice I would recommend against going to a doctor that works at this clinic.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: First I wanna say that I love dr curry. She s amazing and very thorough. This 1 star is for the front staff. THE WORST. When u walk in nobody will greet u when u walk to the counter. It s always a  yes  or something short and rude. Secondly I ve found myself waiting at the front desk waiting to be checked in while the group of girls finish a conversation about what they did on the weekend. Then I had an appointment today in the pm and they ve known since at least 8am they will be closed due to snow but choose to call me from a blocked number an hour before to short cancel my appointment. This appointment has already been moved two times. Lastly, when I called to ask a question about blood work one of the front end girls gave me the wrong information and again two weeks of my time has been wasted. If I wasn t pregnant and in need of a dr I would leave this clinic in a second ONLY based on the worst customer service I ve ever received. That being said I love dr curry. I give her 10/5 stars and will ONLY continue at forward care medical because of her!

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: doctor is great but the receptionist is horrible! The older asian lady with the short bob hair is always so rude and disrespectful! She shouldnt work there as she looks like she miserable all the time and takes it out on the patients ..both on phone and in person.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: The doctor makes you wait an hour or more sometimes but expects you to pay a $50 no show fee for a phone call! A PHONE CALL! (Her hourly wage as a doctor must be $50 x 60 minutes = $3000 per hour). The front desk is useless for the patients.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: What is the deal with this clinic? They charge 20 dollars to apply for a doctor and then never call you back? What kind of new scam is this? We have a critical supply of doctors in British Columbia and this clinic is charging for applications in the middle on a pandemic? How is this even legal? TO ANYONE THAT HAS PAID THIS CLINIC MONEY AND HAS NOT BEEN ASSIGNED A DOCTOR, CALL YOUR CREDIT CARD PROVIDER AND CREATE A BACK CHARGE. DO NOT GIVE THESE SCUM BAGS MONEY FOR NOTHING.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: Dont ever sign up for any so called Free clinic they offered. If you cancel less than 24 hrs, they will charge you but they dont tell you when you call to sign up. When I called to cancel, the receptionist was very rude and hung up on me. Will never go there again. All the receptionists there should be fired.

place_name: Forward Care Medical Clinic (NOT Walk-in Clinic)
review_text: 0 stars 1. did not obtain consent for a paid procedure 2. also claimed they did not receive my lab results 4 months later just because i went to a location thats different than whats on the requisition form disorganized front desk with the potential to be negligent, avoid if possible
response_from_owner_text: Hello Lawrence, we are very sorry about your experiences. If you could email us: info@forwardcaremedical.com with details about your difficulties, we will try our best to help. When patients do not receive their lab results in time, it is usually because of the senders side. With the pandemic, lab results are often delayed due to a high volume in lab report requests. As for the consent for your paid procedure, if you could email or message us with details, we will look into what happened.

review_text: i jget in  today for at Vancity to ask help for cashing out a cheque.... But before coming to Vancity I went  to RBC. next block. RBC said they will hold it for 4 days. i been with them for almost 10 years. went to TD to try. also but same thing. Jade Doolan is an Angel without wings to me today. He help me a lot patiently explaining. and low and behold got somw cash enough time to pay bills... Thank you so much Jade Doolan and to the branch itself. Right away open my checking account with them. As i am planning to ditch out the bank that I faithfully used for several years and cannot help me a cash out on a cheque.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for reaching out and sharing your positive experience. I will be sure to pass on your kudos to Jade and the staff at the Victoria Drive branch. At Vancity we are committed to providing the best experience possible, and supporting local communities in any way we can. Wed love it if you could spread the word! -JB

review_text: Andrea (teller) was very helpful and compassionate about my banking needs. She went out of her way to ensure that I had options to work with and was very friendly.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Alex, Im glad to hear that you had such a great experience. At Vancity we do what we can to provide the best service possible, and I will be sure to pass your kind words onto Andreas manager. Please spread the word! -JB

review_text: Went there for Vancity 101. Super friendly staff, answered all of the questions I had.
Helpful, friendly staff.  Easy parking at the back.
First class staff. My first choice for my banking needs.
The best banking experience ever!
The staff is friendly and know what they are doing

response_from_owner_text: Hi Larry! We appreciate the stellar 5-star review! As a values-based co-operative we use our assets to improve the financial well-being of our members as well as their local communities.  - AN

review_text: My vancity preferance was always new Westminsters vancity branch at 5th Avenue! But since I moved to Vancouver closer to this location on Victoria Drive i do find this branch overall still really good and helpful! I felt bad for staff when all of vancitys systems were shut down! Few days or week?  The staff were still happy helpful and ready to help even with coffee, Halloween candy, smiles, and quick service to all of us cranky customers with the same repeated questions! Thanks you guys! I have been using vancity since before 10 years old! Still my number one banking choice and my only choice! :)
Good.

Vancity recently moved half a block south of its old location on Victoria Drive.  New location is modern and ATM machines are now indoors.  Anyway, I would have given the review couple more stars if it wasn t for the inconvenience. It was Sunday morning and I was going to use the ATM but before I open the door I notice a homeless person sleeping on the ground near the ATM machines. This is a young guy in his 20s or 30s. As you can see in my picture attached you can see some sleeping on the ground. As a result I didn t even bother going in as I had a separate similar experience at another location. I am not discriminating homeless people but they shouldn t sleep inside the financial institution. It just make some people feel uncomfortable doing banking. I wish Vancity would do something about it.

Worst login experience. I had to reset my phone so I lost access to Authenticator app. I tried to login but it keeps me asking for code that I dont have access without giving me any options to use my phone code or whatever. I call, but they were all busy, I chose the option to call back. After 2h without getting the call back, I decide to drive to the closest branch (Victoria & 41). I explain my situation to the guy there, telling that I lost access to my MFA, they give me a receipt with a new password. I go home, resetted my password and then what?? MFA still there!!! Useless!!! I have lost all morning just to login to my account! and still dont have access!
response_from_owner_text: Hi Laura, thank you for taking the time to share your experience and feedback. I am so sorry to hear the branch did not resolve your issue and I have forwarded your feedback to branch management for staff coaching purposes. If you do not have any alternative methods of authentication set up other than the Authenticator app on your device that was reset, then you will need to reset your MFA. You will need to reach out to our Member Service Centre for assistance by dialing 604-877-7000. I do apologize in advance as our Member Service Centre is experiencing higher than normal call volumes today. - MC

review_text: This new location is very nice inside but they are extremely slow. The staff were calmly wandering around like they were in their own worlds while there was a long line with some patrons sitting in the floor because they had been waiting so long. Also although it is nice to offer parking under the location (accessible thru the alley) it is not possible to access the elevator to return to your car when you are leaving again as it is in a locked residential building. You will have to walk all the way around the building and down the car ramp to return to your car.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Malika, thank you for your review. Im sorry to hear your experience was less than adequate. As a member owned co operative, it really helps to hear from the folks who bank with us to see how we can improve. Take care and enjoy the rest of your week! -TO

review_text: Why is Vancity Victoria Dr branch closed every Monday?  Back in the 70 s it was to make up for working on Saturdays.  Nowadays even the big bank local branches are now open Monday to Saturday! Also want to add that I ve been a member over 40 years and that I do most banking online.  Having to walk over to find a closed branch on Monday when I definitely needed to do a face to face meeting is very frustrating.  Sure there are other Vancity branches open, but now I need to drive my gasoline powered car to another branch further away is definitely not good to the environment! Please don t make lame excuses and respond directly to why the Victoria Drive branch cannot open Monday to Saturday just like other financial institutions nearby?
response_from_owner_text: Hi JJ, I can understand how inconvenient and challenging this can be for our members that need to visit a branch on Monday. We do have other branches that are open on Monday as well as Saturday, and most banking can be done online. If you require assistance, please call our Member Services Centre at 604-877-7000 Monday to Saturday 8am - 8pm and Sunday 10am - 5:30pm PT. Thank you taking the time to share your feedback with us. -AN

review_text: I used to really like the staff at this branch. However, while there has always been a lot of turnover, there are now many young men working here who couldn t care less that customers may have other things to do besides wait in line for 10+ minutes while they work as though they are asleep. Of course, they constantly wear their masks under their nose or take it off entirely to speak. Very disappointed.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Rem, thank you for your review. Im sorry to hear about your experiences at the branch, and I will be sure to forward your concerns to management. If youd like to share more feedback, please feel free to call our Member Services Centre at 604-877-7000. -JB

review_text: ATM is now locked indoors during closing hours. Used to be accessible 24/7.
response_from_owner_text: Hello Chumba Wumba, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I am sorry to hear you had a negative experience and I understand that ATMs closed after hours is an inconvenience. Feel free to give us a call at 604-877-7000 if you would like to discuss your recent experience in greater detail. -AN

review_text: Was my first time to go there but it will be my last time. I had a bad customer service experience. Because of that I m going to close my account.

Please call us at 604-877-7000 if you would like to discuss this further on how we can improve. As a member owned cooperative, we take feedback seriously to help improve how we assist our fellow members. Thank you. -BS

review_text: Looooooooooooooong line ups... uneducated staff. And they don t have any clean  new  envelopes. Because they are environmentally friendly which I m completely a fan of. However even if I wanted to pay for a new one she insist they don t carry any!!! Wth

Worst business line ever... stood in business line while someone paid bills at the business counter while 6 other people were helped and I was there before them unbelievable! I pay extra for business you d think we d get our own line up and not be the last one helped!!!!!  Never coming back to this branch!
I live in a condo directly above the bank and always smell cigarette smoke coming into my window. The staff is constantly outside smoking on a busy sidewalk. Go in the back alley or something!
No wonder they have 2.8 stars place is a joke never again will I deal.with these clowns.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Cole,  Im sorry to hear that you experience has been less than ideal. If you wish to talk more about it, please feel free to give us a call at 604-877-7000. - MC

review_text: After 30+ years as a customer, with countless mortgages and fees paid, I am truly disappointed with this organization.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Nick, thank you for leaving your review. We always try support our members and our local communities as best as we can, but it seems that weve let you down. If youd like to share your experience or share any suggestions on how we can do better, please contact us at the Member Services Centre at 604-877-7000. As a member owned co-operative we take all member feedback to help better the experiences our members have when banking with Vancity. Thank you. -SW

review_text: Business banking service is really bad even business banking you have wait long time. They dont care. Very slow

Mark Jones is a decent soccer coach.  Thankfully that s not his true passion.
Biblical expository preaching. This church is Godly and under the authority of scripture. Highly reccomend.
Great combination of sequential expository preaching and welcoming people.

Hiren and Nicholas were very helpful and gave me the best deal and helped me with accessories too. 100% recommend this kiosk over the other store in the mall, they were rude the employees name was romin. Whereas employees in this kiosk were completely opposite and amazing

Hiren was very helpful and a very sweet manager, we initially came asking to port two lines but he gave us the best deal and we ported 6 lines. 100% recommend coming to this kiosk and taking his help!
I got a new number from here the discount was great and the service was also too good specially the assistant manager hiren guided us throughout the process and helped us get better deal.

Some weeks ago I went with my husband to this store as his mobile account is with Fido. We bought a new phone and needed help. A customer rep there name Kelly was awesome in helping us. She went the extra mile of transferring our contacts over, checked things over etc. That is real excellent customer service.
Excellent service at this kiosk. The assistant manager Hiren here is very friendly and helpful. Even the staff, would definately recommend coming here!
Great service at the kiosk. Hiren was extremely patient and helpful. Do see him
Me and my friend went there to buy a phone and the customer service was excellent and one of the associate (Waldo) has been of immense help in all aspect while we where getting the phone.
Fido screwed up blocking wrong number, but Bill and Samantha made a great job helping me out, also signed up for double data
Not that much good service
Find me online for Fido business, avoiding the trouble of queuing in stores! WeChat: yuanyuan472085
The worst service I ever had. Very rude and they asked me to wait for almost 40 mins. Fido should really provide proper training to their reps.

Very poor service, yesterday they took more than an hour to finish the porting request, today got a message that it is not approved and I have to provide a temporary account number which is not provided by them or explained by them. Never purchase SIM here

Hello guys Apple store finances through FIDO You can buy Iphones from apple store instead of going to this store. I was looking for 256gb iPhone in blue, They were not having it and salesperson told me no near store in BC have it and which was completely false. So I opted for 128gb instead. Call 611, This number is FIDO helpline for fido users! Salesperson a big guy there, you might see him, told me I have to take insurance if I need to get mobile iphone from there because my plan was $43 which is less than $50! So he added it by saying you have to get it!! I called FIDO and cancelled it! So I never recommend it to go to this store. Thanks Have a nice shopping day!!! (Note-I only know about big guy that he is dishonest rest all seems good to me!!)

The sales reps working here are very dishonest and are not transparent with their customers. They promised US calling to get the sale commission and then when I got charged they are denying everything. These reps are diluting the brand image with their poor ethics. Please I highly recommend that you go to other stores and not this location unless you want to be scammed.

The price that I m paying right now is not what they told me. I called and went to the story multiple times, they said they will fix it, but I m still paying the unchanged price, which is way more higher than they promised. Literally scam.
service reps are misinformed about company deals, so that different fido locations within the same mall quote different information. come here to waste your time and get looped in circles.
Such a waste of time. I was standing in line for 30min+, when i got in they just told me i can only get my phone online.
So Bad service

review_text: Handmade dumplings that are equally delicious steamed, boiled, and pan-fried! The shape is perfect for catching whatever sauce you want to toss them in.

review_text: We ordered 5 bags of Dickys dumplings, shrimps and scallops, and veggies. We have also tried the ginger chicken, and pork and chives. They are very high quality and taste great

place_name: Dicky's Dumps - Frozen Dumplings Handmade in Vancouver
review_text: We rate Dicky s Dumps 10/10, 5 stars, A+++! Ordering and communication was easy, delivery was delightful . Had a lovely conversation with Dickson, who truly cares about their business and their product! . Oh, and their   dumps  were delicious!! Yummm! Enjoyed the vegetarian ones . They are tasty!! Will definitely buy them again. Treat yourself!!

place_name: Dicky's Dumps - Frozen Dumplings Handmade in Vancouver
review_text: These are easily the BEST dumplings in town. My family loves all of the flavours but the chicken/ginger holds a special place in our hearts. Dickson and Pearl, thanks so much for the great food! We will be lifetime customers.

response_from_owner_text: Love to hear it! Thanks for the love and also for sharing with your friends! We re happy to help save you time!

place_name: The Church of God In Vancouver
review_text: Ive been going to this church for 18 years now. Everyone is friendly and welcoming and so passionate about God. Gods presence is really strong in this church. The community programs offered here is diverse and suitable for all walks of life. I volunteered here in their day camps and tutoring classes and learned so much from it!

place_name: The Church of God In Vancouver
review_text: I joined the church meetings there for years and really appreciate their passionate heart to serve God and the community. Many volunteers are so committed to serve others by helping in the free classes and programs for the community such as iPad/computer classes for Seniors, family Ukulele classes and many others.

place_name: The Church of God In Vancouver
review_text: Ive been here ever since I arrived Canada (13 years ago). I love the support and the sense of community that people give. The programs are diverse and suitable for all ages.

place_name: The Church of God In Vancouver
review_text: I have been coming here for the last 15 years. The people here are friendly, sincere and caring. The programs here are very well organized, diverse and suit the need from 0 - 80!

review_text: Church of God in Vancouver is not a building but Gods family which is full of love and care!

This is the best place to get fresh and authentic sea moss in Vancouver. The owner is so sweet and her customer service is amazing. I ordered a jar but it was delayed due to shipping issues and the owner made it a point to make up for the delay. This is the only place I trust to buy my sea moss and it actually works!

So its been 3 weeks of consistent consumption and I absolutely LOVE it. Sea moss is doing amazing things for my body. I am releasing a lot of mucous build up, and overall I feel lighter and full of vitality. It only took 2 days of use to feel where my body was holding onto water and mucous, and another 2 days (4 in total) to release and feel cleansed. I am definitely going to buy your products for a long time to come, and I have already suggested your product to all my friends and family to try it!

review_text: First order was some sea moss gel and some dry sea moss. Lasted us for months and was an immediate difference is energy levels and overall health. My wife suffers from severe eczema and her skins was some of the clearest we ve seen in years while consistently using sea moss daily.
I started taking their sea moss gel and instantly saw results. I felt a surge of energy. Had it with my morning tea, and cant wait to have some more! Great sea moss.

review_text: Excellent customer service   5 star Golden sea moss. Quick delivery. I make sea moss gel to put in my smoothies and also use the gel on my face as a mask. My skin looks amazing. Thank you Heal Market.

Without getting too personal I firmly believe this is reason why my health issues have improved.So  Thank you Heal Market, God has answered my prayers and I am forever grateful I found you.

review_text: I ordered two jars of sea moss on July 15, I asked when it will be available for pick up on July 20 and have not heard anything since. Is this a scam? *Update: I got my sea moss. It is tasty and does as it s intended .
response_from_owner_text: Hello Adiam, We apologize on the delay in our response in regards to your order. One of our team members will send you a message right now and will schedule your pick up. Sorry again for the delay in response and any inconvenience! This is not a scam your order is ready for pick up and we ll be in contact with you :)

review_text: Ordered 3 jars of sea moss from them. The shipping dates changed multiple times, which honestly was fine and I was very understanding of. When I received the product, the jars were bubbling and the product was seeping out of the top despite not being opened yet. I reached out to the company mutiple times by phone to no avail and then by text and patiently waited for a reply-to which Ive been left hanging now for days. I was polite and very understanding and to be left in the dark for days after reaching out to them after spending good money is not very good business. Going to try ordering from Serenity Seamoss and hopefully I will get a refund from The Heal Market because the product was compromised. Im not hopeful after the service Ive received so far which is sad because I love supporting local businesses.
response_from_owner_text: Hello! I m so sorry for your poor experience. We reached out back via email and will be making sure you will be receiving our dry pouches of sea moss so you can make the sea moss gel yourself as well as receiving a refund for this order. We also stopped shipment of sea moss gel orders as we will start a new way of shipping it out. So sorry again.

review_text: Just ordered it for a pick and tried to look for the vendor but couldn t find it. Also, never got an email confirmation

Site says   in store  shopping - I wandered all around the area shown on website. According to another shop owner in the area there have been other people looking for the store and asking around. I called the number provided and it was not in service, I emailed the address provided and received no response. What a waste of my time.  Not impressed at all. If this is a legit business then please update your website.
response_from_owner_text: Hello Jenn, Sorry you were unable to contact us. We lost the phone and did not get it back till last week. We don t have in-store shopping it says appointment required on google and on our website when you order it has the local pick up option available. All jars are made fresh to order because of the short shelf life. Once we receive orders we set a date and time for pick up. Our phone is back in service and we would love to assist you!

review_text: These people do not have a store front location. And do not pick up there phone so it s all around wack. I might change my answer if they get back to me but
response_from_owner_text: Hi Shemar! We currently are an online based business with local pick up available in a couple of provinces within Canada and shipping options available as well. We apologize on not answering the phone we have misplaced it and  have yet to find it. We are currently working to update this as soon as possible. We apologize on any inconveniences and look to make amends meet. We have reached out to you and look forward to hear back from you.

review_text: This day would of not been complete without my dress. After struggling to find anything different in wedding dresses I contacted Hrissa at Elika in Love. I had seen a picture of the dress I loved but it wasn t in stock. So I went in for a consultation to see what we could do. Over 30 swatches of lace later I picked the lace I thought was pretty. You can imagine how thrilled I was when it turned out to be stunning with tiny tasteful sequins, the perfect accent to my winter wedding. Through my meetings with Hrissa she hand crafted the dress of my dreams. I never thought I d get the  say yes to the dress  feeling but I couldn t stop smiling. And on the day of my wedding I didn t want to take it off, stunning and comfortable. I can t wait to have the reception so I can wear it again.

It was a pleasure to meet Hrissa and her beautiful gowns. I had a wonderful experience trying on her own creations as well as other affordable lines she carries in her studio. Would recommend stopping by this Mount Pleasant jewel for any one looking for a one-of-a-kind dress!

Wow, where to begin! Hrissa, was soooo nice and informative during my visit. To be honest with you I ve probably visited about 9 store before I came to this one and she was the nicest out of all those other bridal stores. I actually was eyeing another dress online and they didn t have it in stock to try. Hrissa, took the time to show me on a mannequin how the dress might look on me. Because she is a designer as well, she gave me a lot of insight on dresses that would look good on my body. While I didn t find my dress this visit with her, she gave me a lot of pointers on what to look for in the future. Also the dresses she designs herself are just gorgeous, definitely visit this spot (very boho/New York fashion week!)! Her designs are just soooo dreamyyy

Hrissa is a top notch bespoke designer. From the moment I visited her studio, shes greeted me with a warm attitude without compromising any professionalism. I love the fabrics she chooses for each of her dress (they are so unique and form-fitting!). Hrissas designs are extremely romantic and flattering. She is also great at communicating and following up to make sure I get all my questions answered. This is so important for a custom piece. I am so happy with my service with Hrissa at Elika in Love! Thank you so much! xx

I loved the dress that I bought from Elika in Love - it was flowy and perfect and fit like a dream. It was important to me during my wedding to work with designers who made beautiful things, particularly if they were involved in the process. So, on a trip to Vancouver I met Hrissa and ended up buying the first dress I tried on! It was lovely and perfect and looks as great in the photos as it felt to wear it. I also loved that I was able to get the dress in a colour that was verging on cream -- I have never felt really good wearing white or even ivory. And it matched the day and my husbands suit perfectly. Pro tip: Because if the train, the Athena works really well if you get married on a windy day.

Hrissa created my ultimate dream dress!! She went above and beyond to make me feel comfortable and involved in the process. This experience was a million times better than buying from a large store where you never get to meet the actual designer and creator of your wedding dress. This whole process was so much fun and the dress is even better than what I imagined! If I could give you more stars I would - thank you Hrissa!
response_from_owner_text: Alex, thank you for the wonderful review! It was an absolute dream working with you to make your Elle gown customized specifically for you:) Thanks for taking the plunge with Elika In Love, and making the trips from Kelowna all the way to Vancouver for your fittings! Cant wait to see the photos from the wedding! xx Hrissa

review_text: Hrissa and her designs are so equally charming and beautiful. I went to her after seeing her Elle gown featured in a BC Wedding Magazine. And Im so glad I did! Dresses are tried on in Hrissas well-lit studio and it already feels like magic with the bright surroundings and personalized experience. Although professional, Hrissa is not precious with her designs and truly works with the wearer to tailor the dress to fit the married vision of the designer and the wearer. Shes open to requests for custom tweaks, and makes recommendations when the need to be lead is evidenced. If youre looking for a romantic dress and experience, Elika In Love is the perfect studio to do so. Thank you, Hrissa!
response_from_owner_text: You are the loveliest, Olivia!!! Amazing energy and an absolute joy to work with. xx Hrissa

review_text: Hrissa is a true visionary. Her bridal designs are stunning, unique and thoughtful. The styles range from beautiful boho to sexy glam. I love that each dress is handmade. She really goes above and beyond to understand her clients vision for their wedding day to create memorable bridal gowns.

We had a lovely time meeting Hrissa. Her collection of gowns are plentiful, and we were greeted with a very warm and vibrant studio. I highly recommended anyone whos looking for bridal gowns to make an appointment to see Hrissa!

I couldn t be more happy with my wedding dress! Harrisa is such a gem! I found her after I had already a full day of shopping for a dress, frustrated that I was having a hard time finding one I loved for my special day and she was amazing to work with! I told her what I had pictured in my head and she exceeded beyond what I had imagined! It was absolutely stunning! Her style and designs are unique and beautiful and she is a lovely person to work with :)
response_from_owner_text: Chloe, you were an absolute dream to work with! Creating your custom lace wedding gown was such a pleasure, and you and your family were so lovely during our fittings! It was great to have you come to the studio and work together on your dream gown. You looked incredible and I cant wait to upload the photos from your wedding and share them with everyone:) xx Hrissa Designer / Creative Director www.elikainlove.com

review_text: after a very full day of wedding dress shopping with my daughter, and her trying on hundreds.. literally hundreds ! of dresses, to no avail. Everything looked the same. Exhausted we google searched and chanced upon Elika in love. Made an appointment for the next day. Chloe tried on three dresses, all looked amazing but with the final dress her face absolutely glowed! She had found the dress. Harissa was game to make the modifications chloe wanted. It was such a calm, comfortable experience, like a visit with a friend. Harissa was incredible to work with  and took so much stress out of the dress shopping experience The dress turned out beyond amazing. Any bride looking for THE dress , a classic local made original ...look here. ( there was even one I coveted but one must let the bride shine lol)

Elikas dresses are simply gorgeous. Its so refreshing to discover bridal options in Van that are unique with an ode to elegance. She truly cares about each customer, and her glowing energy shines through in-person and with her designs.
response_from_owner_text: Ola! Thank you so much! We had such a wonderful time helping you find your wedding dress! Cant wait to see the photos from the wedding! xx Hrissa

review_text: We are lucky to have such an amazingly talented and sophisticated bridal designer in Vancouver. Hrissa is the loveliest to work with and she makes DREAM gowns!!!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you SO MUCH Sarah! It was such a pleasure to work with you to help you find the one! xx Hrissa

review_text: I had my first ever wedding dress experience today and it was a great one! Thank you to Elika in Love for showing me such beautiful dresses and helping me to find my style!
It was very lovely to work with Hrissa.  She was so understanding, & made the experience so easy & pleasant & stress free from the very start.  I couldn t be more happy with the work she did.
If youre looking for fresh, effortless design look no further. Elikas newest collection is amazing and I was thrilled with my dress!
response_from_owner_text: Kari, you were such a wonderful bride to work with! It was a true pleasure to be part of your journey from finding the one to your wedding day! Congratulations Kari!!!

review_text: Well designed bridal dresses great to look at.
Lovely boutique!

I just wanted to thank you for your help and expertise in my dress shopping with you this past weekend. Im so glad I chose you as my shop, not only because the dress was perfect, but because it fit so well and was such great quality

place_name: Action for Animals in Distress Society
review_text: A positive, caring rescue that places great attention on finding the right matching homes for each cat they rescue.  Definitely recommend.

place_name: Action for Animals in Distress Society
review_text: Today I went and got another new kitten from Nikki. I went to her lovely home and met her cat crew. This is my second kitten from her in the last year. Just before Xmas last year my daughter and I got a little ginger girl and we love her so much we wanted to give her a friend.  Of course we went back to Nikki and she didn t let us down. Nikki briefly spoke of how some of these cats as well as dogs,  had been treated prior to her stepping in and rescuing them and about how the pandemic and natural disasters have increased the poor faith of these vulnerable animals.  She really cares for animals.  She is defiantly a cat lady through and through. The work she does for these animals is incredible. I don t know what will happen to all the animals in the b.c in distress when she retires. Although I can t see her retiring bc she cares too much about animals being treated badly. Weather it be an issue of hoarding, owners on substances and or natural disasters. As well as her program for seniors she is right on it. We often get caught up in our busy lives and  forget about animals and there well being.  If you can t adopt a cat from Nikki please consider sponsoring a cat or make a donation. I m not sure if she excepts blankets and towels but that could be an idea as well.

place_name: Action for Animals in Distress Society
review_text: Very passionate and kind. Ive gotten several cats from her and all were well looked after and adjusted well to their new forever home.

place_name: Action for Animals in Distress Society
review_text: Wonderful lady who helped me with my cats.

place_name: Action for Animals in Distress Society

review_text: This program of seniors for seniors is a big scam and financial and emotional  abuse of seniors.  I believed the video which promised to care for the health of the senior cat and all the senior had to do was love the cat.  From the first day Nikki s reluctance to care became evident.  The cat I was looking after was in poor health from the beginning.  Any time I called to get approval to go to the vet, Nikki would shriek at me saying he is  Just an old cat.  I m going to have him euthanized.    The first time she said that, I left the cat at the vets certain he would be killed.  Five days later, the vet called me to pick him up.  I was in SHOCK. Every occasion I had to deal with her was traumatizing and unpleasant!!  A horrible experience.  Abusive. Uses pre-approval to get out of paying.  Stay away from this one. I spent over $3,000 in medical care on my own and she owes me $1500 from pre-approved vet visits which she refuses to pay.  All from the scam that the visits weren t pre-approved.  And how can anyone prove that one way or another? This is cruelty .

Nichola was my physiotherapist after my car accident, and I cannot express enough how important she was to my recovery. Having an in-home therapist was incredibly helpful, and she was cheerful, intelligent, and overall a great therapist. These 5 star ratings are all well-earned. Highly recommended!

I was recently injured in a head on car collision and the damage to my IT Band and left hip joint was so severe I could not walk (my left leg could not support my weight and the pain was excruciating). My lawyer put me in touch with Nichola who came to my home, which was so appreciated and Nichola took care of direct billing ICBC. Nichola has it all. Nichola was excellent at diagnosing my issues (she is a terrific listener) and when it came to doing her magic, each session made significant steps in easing my pains so that I was soon able to walk again. If you are looking for a physiotherapist I recommend you check out Nichola. Shes awesome.

Nichola is the most effective Physio I have ever been treated by.  She treated chronic pain in my neck and after minimal treatments my pain decreased, and my mobility was back to normal.  I highly recommend her for long term pain, quick tune-ups, and anything else that is bother you.

Clover Physio has a handy mobile practice that really helps with my busy schedule. Nichola has a calm and conversational manner that really puts me at ease, as my injuries arent the easiest to work with! She has an array of treatments available - IMS, Massage, Exercises. I always feel better once shes seen me.

Nichola at Clover Physio came directly to my house in Burnaby. I had recently injured myself in a car accident and she dealt with all the ICBC billing with no extra charge to me. I have made a great recovery with the help and guidance from Nichola. The fact she came to my house made such a big difference and she was so kind and helpfull. I would highly recommend Nichola.

I attended Nichola with a pain in my lower back recently and have to say that I was so happy with the service I got at Clover Physio. Nichola was not only very professional but also such a lovely person to work with. I honestly cannot say enough of good things about Nichola and her team. Thanks Nichola for everything xx

Nichola is kind-hearted, very knowledgeable and can identify the root cause of the problem. She takes her time and knows a lot of techniques that have helped with the healing process of a knee surgery. Definitely recommend Nichola!
I went to see Nichola for my neck pain. It was amazing how she knew exactly where the cause of the pain was coming from. She really knows her stuff. After 2 sessions I was pain free. Highly recommend

Amazing approach to treatment! I really like the hands-on approach and appreciate the time and attention Nichola puts in every treatment. Very compassionate, and understanding physio. I highly recommend Nichola!
Nichola is awesome, caring and attentive.  She really helped my back pain that that was incessant for 5 years, now I dont even notice it!

Found Nichola excellent, in diagnosing my problem swiftly and follow up advice concerning exercise, excellent in treatment also. Its up to me to do my part of course, as Nichola says keep doing her advised exercise
Nichola at Clover was an excellent Physio who helped rehab my shoulder so I could continue to play sports, excellent service & very convenient.
An Amazing Physiotherapist Nicola I would highly recommend her my back was giving me so much trouble and after a few sessions Nicola had my back sorted excellent at her job
Nichola really helped me get back to my usual athletic activities quickly after my chronic overuse injuries.
Great physio, I highly recommend Nichola!

review_text: The stay was satisfying ) I got access to all the necessary kitchen facilities and other crucial staff needed for a comfortable stay. The Hotels manager is hospital and friendly. The location of the Hotel is in the hurt of Vancouver. Therefore I can recommend this Hotel for long as well as short stays.

place_name: Cozy Bedrooms in Oakridge, Vancouver West
review_text: Clean, tidy and the bed was quite comfortable. The owner was very nice and helpful. Very nice lady. I did stay  one night with my daughter. This place did satisfy my expectations and I really recommend it for any stay in Vancouver. The kitchen was shared with two other rooms, but me and my daughter had dinner out and left before breakfast. It is close to the sky train, bus, and Oakridge mall is a 7 minute walk. Its also close to a beautiful park. I will definitely be coming back to stay!

place_name: Cozy Bedrooms in Oakridge, Vancouver West
review_text: The owner Maria was very gracious, friendly  and helpful & made my stay very comfortable. The #1room was very clean and spacious. The shared modern kitchen area came with kitchen gadgets. The location is very near to Oakridge station, mall & supermarket - a walking distance. Returning, for sure

review_text: Ive only been here for a couple hrs... Had a nice shower and relaxing on a comfortable bed in my normal sized bedroom. Lots of closet space, a heater, snacks, waters, a large window, extra plug-ins with a power bar, hangers and shelves, blinds and curtains if ya want it dark! Theres a desk to work at if needed, two lamps and ceiling light! So far, so good! Will prolly sleep good tonite!!

place_name: Cozy Bedrooms in Oakridge, Vancouver West
review_text: Like many I missed the shared bathroom feature on the Hotels.com site, but looking beyond that the host is very welcoming and the place is kept immaculately clean. Even my single room was spacious enough. The kitchenette comes well equipped with hob, fridge and microwave. Crockery and cutlery is also supplied. Theres also a common kitchen upstairs. A TV in the room would have been preferred. If you are a pedestrian then location could be a challenge.  Like many areas of Vancouver redevelopment is killing the local stores and supermarkets so you need to travel further. A 10 minute walk takes you to excellent transit options. A car would open up even more choice. Not remotely accessible due to being an older home.

place_name: Cozy Bedrooms in Oakridge, Vancouver West
review_text: Maria and staff are so helpful and accommodating ...Very good location ..close to sky train station and bus stop a very short walk ..also close to airport... Room and house are very clean and kitchen facilities are good .

review_text: It is a great pleasure to get to work with Tatiana! She has a vast array of experience in the fields of healing, coaching, and has helped me greatly to improve my emotional well-being and life balance. I collaborated with her through emotional image therapy, art therapy, and other methods. We did amazing exercises that brought out many emotions, which always resulted in a cleansing and healing energy that allowed me to have a new, fresh perspective on life and how to tackle everyday problems; whether it was in my daily routines, with friends and family, or in the workplace. It is clear that Tatiana truly cares, and I would highly recommend her services for those looking for help and intuitive guidance.

review_text: My experience with Tatiana came from my life crises such as divorce. I was experiencing broken heart symptoms and I was very depressed and down . I met Tatiana through online search from her website Life in Glow and I found from the first time that Tatiana has very  positive peaceful energy. I had a session with Metaphorical associative cards. ( MAK) We had many  sessions during a year period. I love my experience with Tatiana and  i will recommend her therapy to anyone who need it. It was very interesting to find the solutions from my subconscious mind and open the idea to my inner soul. I would encourage anyone who is searching for emotional peace and calm to book a session with her. Thank you Tatiana it was very interesting and I am in love with the MAK cards now, and looking forward to see you again Sent from my iPhone

review_text: Always great connecting with Tatiana! This was a very interactive session, which I appreciate so much. The information was accurate and helpful, validating a lot of my questions. It gave me a lot to come back to and revisit, and this is when I really get more ahas. The reading was jam packed full of juicy information interpreted by Tatiana reading my chart, as well as intuitive information that comes through her. She has a remarkable talent for reading Astrology, that I feel is strongly backed up by her intuitive coaching work, and extensive knowledge in other healing modalities.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Stefanie! It was a treat to collaborate as always

review_text: I enjoyed very much my Metaphorical Associative Cards (MAC) session with Tatiana. It was the first time that I heard about MAC so I did not know what to expect but I enjoyed and got a welcoming, fresh perspective from it. The artwork on the cards, some chosen on purpose and other ones at random, helped me to talk about the career change that Im currently going through. The discussions helped further define what Im looking for in my ideal/dream job and clarifying some decisions that I have made. Moreover, Tatiana is a great facilitator, easy to talk to, open, kind and sincere.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Ingrid for your trust and review! Look forward to see more of your beautiful work and wish you the best of luck and lots of success.

review_text: Tatyana advised me during a very difficult, transitional period of my life, when I separated from my husband. Literally brought me back to life. She studied my natal chart in great detail and directed my thoughts in the right direction. Thanks to the consultation, I identified areas of activity in which I could reveal myself and demonstrate my abilities, which is what I am now successfully doing.

I was at a consultation on the natal chart, with several requests and Tanya answered them all 200% out of 100! I don t know how, but even touched on topics that I thought about, but didn t voice. It feels like everything is falling into place. She approached everything in great detail, carefully leads the session, one feels sincere immersion and interest! But the main thing is what conclusions I made and what to go for at least the next couple of years. Due to the events in Ukraine, I had to start life from scratch and of course there were questions about whether I should continue to do the same activities and whether I was on my way at all, the consultation helped me understand all this Huge thanks
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Katya! Thank you Katya, good luck with your projects!

Metro Vancouver Podiatry @ Pacific Medical Walk-In Clinic
Metro Vancouver Podiatry @ Pacific Medical Walk-In Clinic
review_text: I had a matrixectomy here for an ingrown toenail about a year ago. The podiatrist seemed very unsure of herself, which was a bit unsettling, but I decided to have the procedure done anyway because I just wanted it done and its relatively simple. The room was very small and cramped, Im not sure if the podiatrist has their own office. Because the office was small, the equipment seemed a bit disorganized. The procedure seemed to be done okay, the incisions seemed straight and I think the phenol was applied, but the ingrown toenail has returned. Everything about the experience was mediocre, and now I have to get the procedure done again anyway somewhere else.

place_name: Metro Vancouver Podiatry @ Pacific Medical Walk-In Clinic
review_text: Does anyone notice the fake five star review posted? The doctor always seems rushed and really, that much for these little orthotics that last a year? The doctor is nice and staff at one of the locations are nice. But, we will look elsewhere thats cheaper.

place_name: Metro Vancouver Podiatry @ Pacific Medical Walk-In Clinic

NLD Consulting - Reserve Fund Advisors Specializing in Depreciation Reports
review_text: Our strata contracted NLD for completion of our 2023 depreciation report. Terrys inspection of the property was detailed and thorough. It was obvious during our walk around the building that he was knowledgeable and very qualified. The report itself is also thorough and detailed with an easy to read executive summary (helpful as the document is 129 pages long). They made clear recommendations for property improvements along with a variety of reserve funding options. We will definitely use them for future depreciation reports. Thanks NLD
response_from_owner_text: Hi Robert. Thank you for your kind words; we are always pleased when a strata corporation benefits from the depreciation report process and the guidance on reserve funding options. All the Best! NLD.

place_name: NLD Consulting - Reserve Fund Advisors Specializing in Depreciation Reports
review_text: Michael LaPorte our Strata advisor for our depreciation report was second to none.  His patience and expertise made an arduous task  seem  more achievable.  The report appeared to take forever to be completed (Mar 2022 - Jan 2023) but through no fault of Michaels. We are a self managing complex so many questions needed to be addressed through adapting new bylaws which directly affected the depreciation report.  Michael was with us every step of the way to answer questions or direct us to the proper authority to get interpretation. He always answered emails promptly and shed light on any concerns we might have had. Michael presented a zoom meeting to our unit owners to clarify the depreciation report and answer questions  which greatly simplified councils position. So without hesitation we can recommend NLD Consulting as a firm that truly does care about their client.
response_from_owner_text: Wow - Thank You for the kind review. Guiding a self-managed strata council and owners through the process is actually one of the rewarding aspects of preparing the depreciation report. We are very happy that the process (although it took a while!) worked out well for your strata, and we hope the report provides an achievable path for healthy crf funding for years to come. Cheers. NLD.

place_name: NLD Consulting - Reserve Fund Advisors Specializing in Depreciation Reports
review_text: We at the Red Robs Condos in Rossland contracted NLD Consulting to develop our 2022 Depreciation Report. They were extremely professional and responsive, and the report was extensive and highly detailed, including multiple funding options and analysis levels. We would highly recommend NLD Consulting!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Mike. It was a pleasure working with your strata to prepare your depreciation report. All the best. Mike.

place_name: NLD Consulting - Reserve Fund Advisors Specializing in Depreciation Reports
review_text: Mike LaPorte of NLD Consulting provided Council and owners of our bare land strata excellent service and professional advice to produce a practical Insurance Appraisal and Depreciation Report in a timely manner. Mike has excellent presentation skills and made complex information understandable. We highly recommend NLD Consulting.

place_name: NLD Consulting - Reserve Fund Advisors Specializing in Depreciation Reports
review_text: Mike LaPorte has been professional, thorough and patient during the whole Depreciation Report process, and has involved our strata council at each step to establish a manageable plan for future project financing. We considered many companies, including engineering firms, seeking references from others in the industry, before selecting NLD. We would highly recommend NLD for Depreciation Report projects.

place_name: NLD Consulting - Reserve Fund Advisors Specializing in Depreciation Reports

place_name: NLD Consulting - Reserve Fund Advisors Specializing in Depreciation Reports

place_name: NLD Consulting - Reserve Fund Advisors Specializing in Depreciation Reports
review_text: Thank you, Mike. It is always nice to deal with someone who truly knows their business. I will be in touch down the road for an update.

place_name: Jai Plumbing and Heating LTD - Best Plumbing and Heating Services in North Vancouver, Surrey, Richmond, Burnaby
review_text: Jai is a very professional, efficient and caring technician. He carried out his work to my entire satisfaction. He came to repair my defected kitchen faucet and failed garburator. He quickly found compatible products and installed them all on the same date. He kept my kitchen clean during and after the repair work. He explained to me in details, making sure that I understood the proper way to use the new products after installation. He  has a good working attitude, presented a good image to the Jai plumbing and hearing ltd and I am very happy with the service he had provided.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for valuable feedback

review_text: Jai came to our home to remove our existing water heater and install a new one. Jai and his assistant were very friendly and attentive to detail. The removal of the old water heater and the installation of the new one was carried out with no destruction to my property. I am very pleased with the job and would highly recommend jai plumbing  and specifically Jai for you installation needs.
