review_text: Raechel John has been a Godsend to my husband after his hospitalization in the first month  of the year..  Rehab at home has been and continues to be a  blessing.  Our therapist is A one. Highly recommend this service if you have the funds or the extended health coverage like we do.

My family and I are very pleased the service Physio2U and Kingston Chung provided.  Kingston has been working with mom on her therapies.  Hes very patience, knowledgeable, and supportive.  I can see the improvement my mom is making these weeks and we are super grateful that we have him and Physio2U to support us!  Thank you team!

Kim Hall is my Physiotherapist. I m recovering from a total hip replacement. Physio 2 U service has been exceptional in skill, knowledge, caring, compassion. The service Physio 2 U provides is far and beyond what is provided at a Physiotherapy Clinic. Kim s care has ensured a safe and effective pathway to my recovery! My sincere thanks for everything you ve done.

Just wanted to put in a good word for Jason. He has just been really excellent with my father who broke his hip about 5 months ago. For 5 weeks he was in rehab and we were disappointed as  there was absolutely no improvement.  With Jason onboard, we are very much encouraged by the progress that my father has made. Jason is excellent and would recommend him to all our friends.

Physiotherapist service met expectations however they are either not aware of or do not provide the correct info in regards to dealing with post-op rehab. I was also not informed of the correct rate until it was invoice time (a 5 dollar difference only, but still not ideal).

I sent both of my kids to this Montessori. My older son went here for one year and he didnt even know how to hold a pencil in the beginning. When he graduated, he could read, write, add , subtract and learned a lot of other life skills which he uses in his daily life. Same excellent result with my younger one as well. I am always recommending this school to everyone I know.

Sent our first child here on the experiences that family and friends had with their own children. The school has exceeded my expectations and I am amazed at my childs growth. Looking forward to our second child starting here.
Highly recommended Montessori. Amazing results seen in a short time. I think my little one will hit the ground running when kindergarten rolls around.

response_from_owner_text: Dear Rik: This is Victor. Nice to meet you here.

review_text: Extent light rail
Great company to work for

response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much.

review_text: Meh
A wonderful foundation that cares about people.
This place is home to the coolest organizations ever. A hub for social innovation in the city of Vancouver. If you get the chance swing by and check it out, Darian Kovacs
Friendly staff and great friends...what more could you ask for?  Doing important work for the city of Vancouver and beyond.
Excellent folks, do some amazing work.  Went to a breakfast at Terminal Club, very well done.  Props.

place_name: Laura Ting, In-Vision Coaching ~ Personal Excellence Coach
review_text: I was new to coaching when I began working with Laura and have found the journey to be extremely gratifying in ways I could not have anticipated. Throughout the work we have done, Laura has displayed the utmost professionalism and genuine desire to help me realize my potential. I thought coaching would be about spreadsheets and processes, but rather, the work has been centered on equipping me with a better understanding of myself, which is of far more value and use than any spreadsheet. In deciphering the mental shifts and habits that will bring me closer to my goals, Im creating changes that will serve me for a lifetime. Laura holds the space for these positive changes to come about. I highly recommend her.

place_name: Laura Ting, In-Vision Coaching ~ Personal Excellence Coach
review_text: Laura is engaging, extremely empathetic coach focused on empowering you to find solutions to any number of challenges or goals you re trying to achieve. She s a great listener and has a thoughtful arsenal of questions that help you dig deep and get results. I highly recommend Laura for Personal Coaching services.

place_name: Laura Ting, In-Vision Coaching ~ Personal Excellence Coach
review_text: A person has to ask the right questions to find the right answers. Laura Ting dedicates the time to find those answers that are unique to your needs. I experienced a high level of professionalism. Alejandro Bello Chef/ Owner Poblano Food Company and Food Truck Caterers

I am very happy with Qawsain. My daughter goes to this school. She is doing very well there; I am very glad of the strides she has made at Qawsain both in character and academia. Their program is well-rounded and they pay attention to all aspects in their students  life. The Quran, BC curriculum and Islamic studies programs are all expounded with a great deal of thought, and care and with Islamic pedagogy that seeks to preserve the natural disposition of the student. I recommend any parent to place their child in this school.
May I know if your school welcome student from Singapore who currently studying in Arabic School in Singapore?

My 3 daughters go here and Im impressed by their accomplishments and by the staff that ensures that the students understand their work better    my kids feel shy or hesitant sometimes if they dont understand something, but the teachers help them when they see they need help

polish community needs place like this to preserve our culture , history , and teach our kids of the heritage. PVA  under  new leadership and they trying to bring those values back, good luck!!  they have nice banquet room and rate are very reasonable, cheers!!
Super helpful with booking our first cruise!
response_from_owner_text: Sean, Thanks for your review. We pride ourselves in the service we provide. We love to hear from you once you return from your cruise.

review_text: For all your travel plans.

place_name: A Taste of Nature: Eco tours with wild food tastings in Stanley Park
review_text: Highly recommend this eco/gastronomic tour. At 2+ hours, would make a great add-on to your day exploring beautiful Stanley Park. I rode my bike along the Seawall to the rendezvous point and added a wonderful 2nd Beach ocean swim at the end; a perfect way to experience the park for locals and visitors alike while also learning about BC West coast natural history and ecology. The feast on the beach was beyond my expectations: Dungeness   crab, smoked salmon, mussels, scallops, local wild mushrooms, sea asparagus and huckleberry tarts.  This tour would be a great idea for a foodie group, group birthday event or stagette/hen party.

place_name: Jova Xu | Real Estate Advisor in Greater Vancouver
review_text: I had the privilege of working with Jova, a phenomenal realtor and a true professional, during my home search in North Vancouver. Her extensive knowledge of the local market, combined with an unwavering commitment to her clients, made my experience not only successful but also enjoyable. Jovas proactive communication, attention to detail, and expert negotiation skills were evident throughout the process and were crucial in securing my dream home. What sets Jova apart is not only her exceptional skills but also her friendly and approachable nature, making the journey feel like a collaboration with a trusted friend. For anyone in search of an outstanding realtor in North Vancouver, I wholeheartedly give Jova my highest recommendation and five well-deserved stars.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Taylor!

place_name: Sylvan's Custom lron and Stair Railings Work in Vancouver
review_text: Sylvans completed the railings and fences for a Heritage Project with Formwerks Architectural and his craftsmanship, detail and on site service was excellent.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Matt.

review_text: Funny story, we went to this area because we bought pizza, there was a 15 minute wait for the pizza so my wife and I decided to look around, and found Wang s. we went in and ordered, i must say the food is inexpensive and not cheap because the quality is really good. One part of the kitchen has a window where you can see the dumplings being freshly made. Note: the wonton come with 10 pieces, we already tried 2 before I decided to take a picture. We are definitely coming back for more!

By far the best soup dumplings I have ever had! I always have to order another order because they are that good! You also know it s gonna be good when you can see them make them the dumplings right in front of you! I have been here many times already and their food does not disappoint. I got the Steamed Pork Buns (Xiao Long Bao/Soup Dumplings), Pan Fried Pork Buns, Pan Fried Dumplings and Beef Roll! I would recommend everything because it was really affordable and yummy. The soup from the Steamed and Fried Pork Buns was really flavourful! The Pan Fried Dumplings had a lot of filling and isn t like other dumplings I ve had at other restaurants (which are sometimes frozen). You have to get the Beef Roll, I love the amount of meat, cucumbers and sauce there is in it! Another thing I like is how they have chili oil and vinegar at the table for you! I can t wait to come back and try their noodles and wontons,unfortunately it was too hot for that today.
*Cash Only* however, they have delicious soup dumplings! It was my first experience trying soup dumplings and they did not disappoint. Super fast service as well!
The best Shanghai fried dumplings and Shaolongbao I ve had. The soup was very flavourful and also came out smoking hot. There s a big line every time so you ll have to wait for a bit.
Great small place to have authentic tasting flavours. The Dan Dan noodles were my favourite. We went on a weekday at 2pm and it was still busy.
Food was delicious ,very small and busy place . The lineup was not long when we arrived. They dont take reservations and cash only . will come back again to try other things on the menu.

I have been coming to Wangs Shanghai Cuisine for years and it is simply the best, in terms of quality, freshness, taste, portions, and affordability. My person favourites are the soup dumplings, the wontons in chili oil, and pork/pickled vegetables noodle soup. This is a no frills, small restaurant, fast dining experience, that hits the spot everytime. It gets busy quickly with line-ups out the door and make sure you bring cash.

Got the XLB, Beef Noodles Soup, Pan-fried Pork Buns, and Chilli Oil Wontons. All amazing! If you want to try just one thing, its gotta be the XLB. Juiciest and biggest XLB Ive ever had and for an amazing price! Will be back to try their fresh siu mai.
Satisfyingly good food! My top three were the beef rolls, pan friend dumplings and xiao long bao. Noodles were ok, but not a big fan. Price was pretty good.

Awesome soup dumplings! The staff were very friendly when we arrived. We put our order in and the food came out within 15 minutes of ordering. They make the soup dumplings in the back, they have a window where you can watch them being made! Everything we ate was 10/10. I highly recommend this place for your next meal. Wang s is cash only, so just plan accordingly.

Delicious dumplings and Taiwanese food. Love their noodle soup. Their xioa long baos are one of my fave as well. Been coming here for years and will continue to. Be warned, they take cash only. Also they are small and gerlts busy so expect a line up. But I guess that means its good food inside.

Amazing xiao long bao! And incredible pan fried dumplings  XL size, with amazingly thick, chewy/crispy wrappers, with fantastic pork filling full of crunchy cabbage. We also had the pan fried Shanghai noodles, which were perfection.
Very quick service. Delicious food. The soup dumpling and rice cakes blowed my mind. The soup dumping was called steamed bun, 1st thing on the menu.

Just a small place to come and eat. There was a line out the door, but the wait wasnt too bad. Cash only - they accept USD, but their exchange rate is less than at a bank. The XLB and chili dumplings were great. However, I personally was not a fan of the pan fried pork baos in general.

Very authentic Shanghainese place, and as a Shanghainese myself, I am very pleased with the foods that they make! They literally make the dimsums fresh in front of you, from the dough, and their dishes are fantastic too. It is cash only, so keep that in mind, and the washroom is outside the restaurant as a heads up as well. I highly recommend their rice cakes :)

I was seated right away. Service was great, very friendly! The food is excellent. I ordered the pan fried dumplings and they came out fast and piping hot. I wish the chili oil was a bit more spicy, but thats just my personal preference. The dumplings are great with just vinegar. Give Wangs a try!

Been coming here for years, they have some of the best XLB and Pork Chop Soup in the Lower Mainland. They make their XLB and noodles fresh and you can watch the process through the window at the back of the tiny store. Its truly a hidden gem of a restaurant. Service is always good and food is consistently delicious.
Very delicious Shanghai food.  Fast and friendly service.  Will come back.

Updating my review on this place.  This place has become my favourite go to for a quick fix of dumplings. It s just a small hole in the wall, short menu but focused on what they do best, delicious dumplings. Low prices are a plus too. With just a few tables, it gets crowded very fast. It s definitely worth the wait. I m amazed at how much volume they can put out in such a small kitchen, but the staff are really efficient.  My favourites are the pan fried pork buns and pan fried dumplings.  There s a new item in the menu, Shanghai mini wontons but there s nothing mini about them.  The seaweed in soup broth adds a different twist that s a bit like a fusion of Japanese flavours.  I be coming back regularly Drop me a comment or a like if you found this helpful.
This place is a hidden gem. Amazing food and service. Go if you love authentic food, and bring cash! Update after 1 year as I m back in town - still amazing, still the best XLB in the city.

This place has been on my radar for a while, though there are line ups it moves quickly as its fresh fast food. The service was quick and fairly friendly (typically of what youd see in an American fast food joint) possibly better if you are just as respectfully- they are humans. We ordered dumplings, mini buns ( fried - sweet) and Dan Dan. The food was quick!! And the flavors complex, fresh and definitely a steal for the prices. I would highly recommend this place if you want fresh quick fast-food/takeout, that is made in front of your eyes and has great flavor for a great price.

Authentic tasty Shanghai cuisine with phenomenal pricing and good portions! We just totally stumbled on this place and I will never regret finding this place! Wow! The noodles OMG, the dumplings, the wontons, the green onion pancakes, the pork dumplings etc etc etc, everything is good, reasonably priced with great flavour and delivered quickly and piping hot to your table! Service is great and friendly menu is simple but that s exactly what you want fast simple and super tasty, it was so good and I was so full but I didn t want to stop eating! Great for take out and even tasty the next day! What a treasure! You must try this place!
Extremely fast service, received food within 5 minutes. Dan-Dan noodles and 5-spice beef noodles are very flavourful with generous portions.
Wow super busy But well worth the wait, very affordable and great tasting shanghai food.

Generous portions, quick service, and everything on the menu is delicious. Keep in mind that this place is cash ONLY, but its absolutely worth the ATM trip. There can also be a bit of a line for dinner service, but it moves quite quickly and is worth the wait anyhow. I recommend the soup dumplings (xiao long bao) and shanghai style noodles!
Delicious and fast meal! Love that their deep fried buns and XLB have soup in them. Busy little place but fast service. Make sure you bring cash and use the bathroom beforehand.

The best dumpling shop in town! I love their soup dumplings and pan friend dumplings. So cheap and so so delicious! Small shop so expect it to get busy when they open. The washroom is also outside the restaurant so you have to ask for a key.
Awesome value. Extremely fast time for food to arrive at your table. Awesome tasting foods. Will definitely come back. Xia long bao was great and the pan fried dumplings too.
Real authentic Shanghai food. Will recommend to anyone. The restaurant is small so you may need to wait in rush hours.

Really good food at a really good price.  Its not the nicest place and they only accept cash, but the food makes up for it.  We tried several dishes among 5 people and paid about $25 each (including tip). Everything was good - standouts were the fried buns, beef rool, Dan Dan noodles, and Shanghai noodles

XiaoLongBao skin was thin and filled with tasty soup and meat ball. Sichuan beef noodle was tasty too. I think food is so perfect at this pricey level. Would recommend to dine here if u want to have a cheap dinner yet to have some quality Chinese noodles and dumplings.
We ordered dan Dan noodle, Sichuan spicy noodle, fried and steamed buns, everything was delicious   we are so satisfying after the snowboarding trip. Will surely come back again!
All the food here is amazing. Small shop without a lot of space but its really authentic top quality food. Just fyi its a cash only place
Soupy delicious pan fried pork buns    , quick and affordable. Very filling and yummy Chili sauce! Paid with cash.

The steamed pork soup dumplings were delicious! Though the wrapping was thinner than the usual, there was ample soup within. Served piping hot, they were devoured quickly. We also ordered the thick stir fried Shanghai noodles with pork and vegetables. Wonderful wok essence and minimal oil. Very nicely done. Its a small space and its usually quite busy, but they turn over tables pretty quickly.
Food is excellent, especially for the price.  The staff is friendly and the service is quite fast. If you dont arrive early you will probably find yourself waiting, because there are not many tables.
The waitress was very friendly and answered all of our questions. The soup dumplings and chili wontons were good. The pan fried dumplings were okay.
Perfect Xiao Long Bao! Great soup/filling to wrapper ratio
Authentic, reasonably priced, and DELICIOUS! I highly recommend this place, but remember to bring cash as they re cash only. Dining space is a bit small but the food is so good.
This small shop serves delicious shanghainese food.  Limited tables, so theyll seat max 4. When we arrived there was a 10 min line but the food comes wicked fast. I recommend.

Food comes out quick. Made to order Xia Long Bao.  Dine in doesnt have many tables and the traffic was constant when we were there.  Very good food, great authentic flavors and good option sizes.  Recommended if you are in the area.
I can t believe it took me so long to try this place. Everything was delicious. The staff is friendly. Their dan dan noodle is excellent. The dumplings are yummy.

The service and the food was great. They banter with everybody in Cantonese and Mandarin, dont be alarmed when they yell at other people. Beef rolls, dumpling with soup, spicy beef noodle are all very authentic. Ordered and everything came in about 5 mins. Cash only, I was 50 cents short, and was planning to get some cash from the bnk, but the lady was nice enough to forego that. Will definitely revisit.

Amazing food and prices, line up always to get a table at this small restaurant but food is authentic and definitely worth the wait, brought back memories of my travels to Asia! But if you re expecting ambience, not the place for you.

Love this place! Great price for selection and quality! Friendly service central Location. Decor not  he best but if u want delicious food this is the place to visit. My favourite thing to order is not the XLB but the tan tan mien. The peanutty soup is rich and delicious and hot. Although theres no meat in this noodle dish I always order it with a side of beef roll so i still get the meat i crave. The XLBs are soupy and hot and the pan fried buns are nice and crispy. I love the fried rice cakes. Although the colour is a little bland the taste is still very prominent.

My coworkers and I ordered noodles, wonton, beef wrap, pan fried buns and steamed buns for lunch.  We all agreed that the food was very delicious and would go back again. Steamed buns would be great if we ate there to preserve the hot juice.
Great value, no frills spot. Super fast as well. The chilli sauce is incredible
Best Shanghai cuisine in town! Amazing dumplings, buns and spicy beef noodles. And very good prices! A repeat for sure.
very delicious, I recommend the steamed soup dumplings, the fried pork buns, and the Shanghai thick noodle. the beef roll and mini buns were good too
Very tasty and the service it was fast. Ordered: steamed pork buns, Pan fried pork buns and Shangai fried thick noodles. Remember to bring cash, the only down side.

Food is always fresh and they gave great dumplings        price wise very reasonable Unfortunately the place is a bit too small,  customers have to wait outside but parking is kind of convenient it is located inside the complex right next to London Drugs Food

They have one of the best Xiao Long Bao in town. Me and my boy will often order 2-3 orders of Xiao Long Bao everytime we visit, another couple of  dishes I would recommend are the Spring Roll and Dan Dan Noodle, although the waiting time can be a little bit of a headache due to the capacity of the restaurant, the food is worth to wait. I highly recommend this place!

Amazing little place with really delicious soup dumplings and noodles.  Everything is freshly made to a high standard and is so flavorful.  There was a constant stream of customers dining in and getting take out. Everything we tried was delicious (steamed pork buns, pan fried pork buns, spicy beef stew in soup, stir fried rice cakes and beef roll). Cant wait to go back. Keep in mind that it is CASH ONLY, but the prices are very reasonable so you can get a lot for your money

Came here at 8:30pm on NYE with my partner. There was plenty of seating, servers were extremely attentive, my hot tea was always refilled when it was about half full without asking. Food came out very fast. Very yummy and authentic. After spending 3 times the amount I paid here on well known places in Bay Area, Seattle and Portland, this is probably my favorite place for soup dumplings!
amazing service, food came quickly and was extremely delicious. i would get the classic shanghai noodles and pan fried dumplings for sure!
Ordered a few dishes and they came out quick, and service was good! My top favs are the dan-dan noodles and pan fried buns.
Great little hole in the wall, quick service, foot comes out fast and hot, best dumplings and beef roll around. Cash only

Its a bit tight inside. But were not here for the atmosphere, honestly! Good food and quick service. They havent upped their prices which is a pleasant surprise! We had the spicy Shanghai noodle, juicy dumplings, pan fried buns, and pan fried dumplings. Cash only.

Love this place. Perfect for when you feel like a quick and simple but filling meal. You won t find anywhere else for this price at this quality.  I ve been here many times and always ordered the xiao long baos.  I d say it s best in town as the skin is thinnest of all the places I ve tried. The Szechuan beef noodle is good as well.  The pic here is of the pork chop noodles. Simple broth and tasty meat. The only thing I don t like is that they put the pork on the noodles so they get soggy quickly. It d be better if they came on a separate plate. The pan fried pork buns are amazing. Very juicy inside and the buns are soft and fluffy. I ve also tried the green onion pancake and they re good as well. These don t taste as  homemade  but good nonetheless.  Usually busy but wait times go fast. Worth the wait anyway.

Amazing, fresh, full of flavour, fast, quality dishes.  We consider it one of our go to places in the hood. And best part very reasonable prices... Honestly, The best hidden gem of Collingwood, maybe the East side. Ps You know its East Van even its still cash only :) You can dine in or take out. Also there are some veggie options, and they are pretty tasty. You can also ask to make meat dishes veggies.

I love Wangs. Xiao long bao, spicy beef noodle, deep fried pork buns, dandan noodle, Shanghai noodle, wonton in chili, all amazing. Tea is also very good. the service is friendly and prompt and food arrives within seconds (well, I try to go when its not prime hours as it can be busy) having been here 2 times this week... firmly cemented as a staple.
Just amazing quality of XLB. I really love the ratio of filling, and soup of each dumplings. The elasticity of the dumpling was perfect so its not easy to break when picking up the dumpling.

Barely even uttered our extra order of XLB before it was on the table. So fast! Everything we had was delicious and at a great price. Only downside is that my toddler is sensitive to MSG (his face gets red blotches) and definitely saw it eating here. Anything dumpling like probably has it. Will come back to explore other things on the menu! Steamed pork buns (Xiao long bao) - top notch. Perfect. Pan fried pork buns - amazing! So juicy. Cold wontons with peanut sauce - they were pleasantly warm, it says spicy but it was only slightly spicy. The sauce tastes good but unappetizing looking. Beef rolls - great Shanghai noodles - good Bean paste noodle (ja Jiang mian) - good Boiled dumplings - pretty plain. More cabbage than I expected. Fried green onion pancake - ok. Dan Dan noodle - good but wouldnt order again. It is just noodle, sauce and some green onions. I expect at least something else in it.

Great food quality, average prices   hard to find good Shanghai food in the Collingwood neighbourhood. Restaurant is very small, would recommend taking out or only eating in with 2-4 people. Love to eat here whenever I have a chance.
Closed temporarily till Feb 22 2023, quite a long vacation IMO, still very good XLB, its no frills so dont expect too much unless great shanghainese food, XLB handmade that day
Worthy of being anyone s soul food. Soup dumplings, beef rolls, and dan dan noodle are my favourites for now.

Pretty good XLBs. Pan fried dumplings and beef noodles are consistently very good. Small place so it can get busy very quickly. CASH ONLY. Parking: Tight parking spaces in the lot. Park on the side street.

Really delicious xiao long bao - thin skin and juicy. The people who are complaining about the spicy wontons (chow shou) are probably used to the Szechuan style. The spicy wontons here are Shanghai style so do not have as much of a kick. The chille sauce provided here is very good. I added it to everything.
Very very delicious pan fried dumplings   xlb are also delicious! Beef noodle soup also decent. Cash only place btw  . A must try! Recommend.
Food quality is good, value is good, service is good. Authentic yes and cozy yes. Can get crowded and warm inside but service is fast so turnover is quick. Definite neighbourhood feel.
This place is a small gem. Food is delicious everything on the menu is fantastic. Oh yes you have to line up! Dont order too many dishes your table is not large enough.

We waited in line for about 25 minutes. We ordered the steamed dumplings and pan fried buns and they served them to us in like thirty seconds. The liquid inside is really hot so be careful. The food was great and the price was reasonable. The restaurant is cash only.

came here with my boyfriend a while ago! im vegetarian so i didnt have too many options but the green onion pancake and vegetable dumpling was soooo yummy i cant stop thinking about it now!! the tofu puff soup was perfect too. my boyfriend got himself a beef roll and some wontons as well and altogether our meal was 36 dollars which was great. ill definitely come again!! but just a heads up, it s cash only here!!
Their Shao long bao, Beef roll, pan fried pork bun is delicious! Also, great price.

Love that you can see the staff preparing the XLB and wonton handmade from scratch through the plexiglass window..very authentic. 5 stars for their wonton in spicy chilli oil, Xiao long bao, wonton soups, and their secret housemade chili sauce(they even sell it by the bowl). Cash only.

The cuisine served in this establishment is some of the most authentic and delicious Shanghai-style you can find in town. If you have the opportunity to visit, I highly recommend trying their xiao long bao and shengjian - two dishes not to be missed.
Great food and great value. The Dan Dan Noodle and the Pan Fried Buns are my favorites.
would recommend wangs, super good xlb with good classic prices just be wary it s cash only! My new favourite spot
Excellent place and service. Some menu items arent great but majority are good
This is my go to place for fast and delicious Shanghainese foods. The price is great and the services are nice and attentive. Highly recommended! This place is cash only
Delightful! A quick cheap bite. Simple yet satisfying! And I didnt even have any of the hand made dumplings!
Best dumplings Ive ever had!

Great Shanghai dumplings.  Very fast service and still very fresh food that comes out.  Its quite small as there are only a few tables but food and service is fast so you wont need to wait long if there is a wait.  The only down side is that there is no hot and sour soup.  Its like going to eat dim sum but they dont serve shrimp dumplings :)  but overall really good.  Go visit.

If you come as a group of two the wait for a table is very short. Food comes incredibly fast and piping hot. Definitely my new favourite affordable soup dumpling place as it s probably the cheapest around. Cash only.
Dumplings at this place is amazing , they do live up to their fame for it. Cheap price with great quality Noodle are a little bit dry but it might just be my personal preference

The food is phenomenal. The pricing perfection. I dont know how they do it. I had the curry chicken with rice and the pan fried pork buns. The buns are chewy with a gorgeous golden bottom and juicy pork inside. The curry chicken was a balanced blend of sweet and salty flavours. Everything delicious. I havent devoured a meal so quickly in a long time. Wish I hadnt wasted so many years before eating here!

This restaurant is delicious. If your goal is yummy food, this is the place for you. Looking for a cozy or modern spot, this is not the one. Good prices, great flavours. Kid-friendliness: I wouldnt dream of bringing my kids here. Small and cramped, no space for a stroller.

One of the best shanghainese dumpling houses in town!! Its really a hidden gem, the dumplings are always freshly with lots of flavor, the staff are just amazing, and their chili oil is to die for. You know the place is super authentic when theyre making the dumplings right in front of you ;)  Always have such a great experience here!!!would give it higher stars if i could
Food is sooooo good!!! Tiny restaurant with only a few menus, but everything they offer is super tasty.

Its a very small restaurant reminiscent of old eateries in Hong Kong that serves the best xiao long bao Ive had so far. Their pan fried bun or sheng jian bao are also a must. Service was good although I can see those that do not speak Mandarin or Cantonese may have a harder time ordering but the ladies were lovely and its cash only although US dollars are also accepted. Its also very cheap and everything is served piping hot.

The food is really good. Tastes authentic and home made. We tried the steamed pork dumplings, the beef roll, dan-dan noodles and their sliced beef noodle. We got everything out of our meal that you could hope for from a small Shanghai dumpling restaurant. The prices are great and its a bit hard to believe the value you are getting. They clearly have the approach of having a limited menu but making sure every item is a winner. My wife, daughter and I really enjoyed trying this place out. I would recommend ordering out since their restaurant space is pretty small. Half of the total space is kitchen staff cranking out their dumplings and noodles. Just be super clear if youre ordering in English because I had the unfortunate circumstance happen where I ordered 12 pork dumplings and showed up to find 12 ORDERS of pork dumplings ready for pickup.
Best handmade xialongbao in Vancouver! Cheap price also
Top-notch service and delicious Shanghai dishes.

The food here is amazing and really cheap! This is one of my favourite hidden local gems, hands down. The place is really small so you will probably face a bit of a wait if you go during peak hours, but its worth it. All their food is delicious! I always get the pork dumplings in chili sauce, and layer on the chili sauce they have at the table too. Only thing is that this place isnt really vegetarian friendly. But if you love pork, youre in luck!
Great food and staff. Steamed pork buns are a must!

Ive been coming here on the regular ever since I first came here a couple months ago. Its so fast (you can literally be in and out in half an hour) and the food is really good. There are a few dishes that I wasnt really a fan of but my top choices are: juicy buns (they are great!), beef rolls, beef noodle in soup & shanghai pan fried noodles. The pork chop rice and pan fried are also good. The green onion pancake is tasty too but a bit on the greasy side for me!

Oh so good! Weve had fried dumplings, marinated beef noodles soup, fried beef rolls, fried juicy pork buns...ALL SO DELICIOUS! Awesome that 2 grandmas handmake everything, friendly service. Even our picky 6yos love it all!

Standard dumpling and noodle dishes, served very quickly on your table. As if they know what you are going to order beforehand. The taste reminds me of Peaceful Restaurant on Broadway, however the noodle dish variation is much less. Great small mini restaurant

Wangs is still the go to place in East Van for Xiao Long Bao. They still have a comfort food menu. Their Dan Dan noodles still one of my favorites and prices are still reasonable and easily a good quick place to eat. One of the best Shanghai dumpling places on the east side. Juicy and lots of meat and not much dough. Smaller place and sometimes theres a wait outside the door during busy times but worth the wait
Best XLB i had ever in Vancouver! Im a regular customer here, do order the xlb and try the chili oil, its to die for. Not very spicy and it has rich flavor.

Plato Filipino takes me back home with their authentic Filpino dishes. Name your favorite dish and they have it! I commend not only their appetizing food but also their great customer service. The front staff are nice and helpful. I recommend their Combo Special where you can choose any two dishes and a cup of rice. My husband loved their Lechon Kawali, Buko Pandan and Leche Flan. Yes, they have a variety of desserts as well! So many to choose from so we always make sure to order takeout. We will surely go back again.

Plato Filipino will always get 5 stars from me. I am fortunate to have this location only a few minutes walk from my house. Ive also visited their other location in New Westminster. The food is always delicious, and no matter what I order, be it a combo meal or one from their a la carte, I am always satisfied! Servers are also excellent, and they are always efficient, happy, and polite. I cant wait to go back and would recommend it to anyone looking for a Filipino Restau to eat in. Truly a taste of home away from home

It was great food was very good, and I really felt like being back in Philippines    with the people coming in after work getting their food in and out. The young daughter waiting for her mother to get off work playing its is so unique to find this gem    of a restaurant you must try it.  My wife and I will definitely make the trip back in from Delta.

This place is a classic Filipino restaurant serving authentic and traditional Filipino dishes with many choices. The foods are outstanding at a reasonable price. One of my favorites is their signature dish  Crispy Pata  which I always order for takeout. Very crispy and cooked to perfection which is completely paired with their signature vinegar dipping sauce. They also serve various desserts such as halo-halo (sweet shaved ice dessert with various toppings), Turon ( sweet banana-jackfruit spring roll), Buko Pandan (coconut and pandan flavored gelatin with cream and sweetened milk), and a lot more. The place also features decor and ambiance, reflecting Filipino culture with Filipino music playing in the background. Plus, they have a very friendly, welcoming, and pretty staff. This is a must-try restaurant that tastes like Home. If you miss Pinoy foods or want to try authentic Filipino cuisine, this place is for you.

Plato is a MUST VISIT restaurant if you re around Joyce-Collingwood SkyTrain station, it is just few blocks away and they have one too by the New Westminster SkyTrain station   Highly accessible! Plus! They you can also avail via Uber, Skip or Grab! Why be sad and crave for Filipino dishes when you can visit or order online here! They serve scrumptious meals that doesn t only warm the stomach but give us a taste of home! I love that they serve here Authentic Filipino dishes such as Dinuguan and Kare-kare which are my all-time favorites. People here are very courteous too, serving you with a smile. Their wide variation of meals can make you go back for more and try their desserts too :)

Ever heard of crispy lugaw? It s the best of both worlds: warmth of lugaw and crunch of #LechongKawali. @platofilipino serves more than just tasty dishes, they provide the comfort when we re missing the Philippines, or just craving for something yummy. #PlatoFilipino
GOOD FOOD , GOOD SERVICE, good atmosphere, and Friendly staff . I WILL RECOMMENDED THIS RESTAURANT.    My son loves their food especially DINUGUAN , caldereta , pork liempo, and  also the Halo Halo.

Great Filipino restaurant with awesome service and casual atmosphere as you select your food at the counter and pay. Yummy dinuguan, chicken bbq, chicken adobo, bistek, turon and more. I want go back again to try the crispy pata, lechon kawali and sisig. Kudos to the chef.  I feel the Filipino food here is real good and doesnt seem too oily either, at least to me. They even take Visa and Mastercard too which is very convenient.

im in university right now and have been away from my parents for a looong time! feeling homesick i ordered the silog from here and OMG i loved the food so much... seriously amazing. the soup that came with the meal was also delicious and reminded me of the one my mom makes for me. my only complaint is that i wish there was more food! :D especially that lumpia! overall such amazing comfort good and will be a forever customer now!
response_from_owner_text: Wow, thank you so so much Ms. Maxine!!! We super appreciate you taking time to write a review. Will try our very best to serve you authentic Filipino cuisine that would always remind you of home. See you again soon. Take care and stay safe.

review_text: The very first Filipino restaurant that Ive tried here in Canada and it really feels like home from the friendly staff to all the amazing pinoy foods! Will definitely go back. Super love their Tapsilog and its really good spiced vinegar and coffee!

its my first time to visit the place and i must say its all 5 star.  the food where cooked properly, not too salty not too bland, despite its turo turo style like how we had it in the homeland, the food seems to be fresh and not overcooked. me and my wife odered the 2 combo each, 2 dish with rice, dinuguan & ginataang tulingan and sisig & laing. the serving is the right perfect size. we definitely be coming back. and to top it of, the staff makes you feel like you are part of the kapitbahays. just like those turo turo/karinderyas back home.

Ordered platters for my sons birthday. Food was great and portions are big. They were very accomodating and helpful. They also sent a thank you message after. I also called in to order a platter for pick up. They called me back 10mins later to let me know that the order will be ready earlier and the lady asked if id like to pick it up at that time. I just appreciate how they deal with customers. And how they went above and beyond to provide a great service.
Intimate spot right by the skytrain station that reminds you of really good food from home. Service is excellent!
response_from_owner_text: You made our week Sir Dominic! It is our goal to serve the best and be our best. Thank you so much for inspiring our whole team. Take care. God bless.

review_text: Very accomodating atmosphere, super love their Kare-kare! Must try!
It is like stepping thru a door directly back to the Philippines. Good delicious Filipino food. Good Price. Wonderful workers.

This is the best place for some amazing affordable food. The homemade food is so yummy and served with love. Me and my friends have been here when they were closing and they waited for us to have our meal and didn t rush to close the place. They are very sweet people who serves the best food in Joyce area. The barbecued pork is a must try.
Good food and the staff are nice and friendly too!
Very friendly staff and great tasting affordable Filipino food.
Excellent customer service and delicious filipino foods.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Ms. Julie, appreciate you taking time to give us a very inspiring thoughts on how we serve you. We hope to see you again. Take care and stay safe.

review_text: Regarding the person below me that gave only 1 star, Im not gonna say whether hes wrong or right about his experience, but trust me when I say that Ive been to many restaurants in my life (still counting), and I can tell yall that ALL of them have had their worst day too, even those with full 5 stars reviews. We had the chance to eat at Plato Filipino and I can say that they have delicious Filipino food, and sure, some dishes may need more love, but what restaurant in this world has a perfect record when it comes to pleasing everyone? When you have a problem with your food, you should at least try to be courteous and calmly tell the people in the restaurant what you didnt like: the texture, taste, plate, whatever you think is valid. Remember, it helps both ways, as we get better food and service, and they get to know their own strengths and weaknesses. More power to their business and more mouth watering food for our stomachs, lol.
Delicious food and variety of choices!
Service: EXCELLENT. Food: FANTASTIC! Ive had several dishes from here and every single one has been delicious. The people are always friendly and the food is fresh. Authentic Filipino home cooking!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Ms. Cherlyn for taking time to write a review. Authentic Filipino cooking indeed! We hope to see you again. Take care and stay safe!

review_text: This restaurant has amazing food and drinks, the price is really affordable and the inside is really nice and cozy. They never disappoint with the food and service here. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND EVERYONE TO CHECK THIS PLACE OUT!
response_from_owner_text: Jaden, this inspires us to do better! Thank you so much! Take care and stay safe.

review_text: Super kind staff and cute ambiance.  Affordable and delicious portions.  Would recommend and will go back if Im ever in the area again!

Plato Filipino is the greatest food experience I have ever had in my life so far. Amazing customer service and after having a meal from there i had a dream about it that same night. I was never the same.
response_from_owner_text: Incredible! Kirk, we are absolutely delighted to hear that you had an ethereal experience with our food! Thank you very much for taking the time to share you review, take care and we hope to see you again :)

review_text: My favorite go-to Filipino eatery! Our friends come here everytime were hungry and I would very often come by here to get to go food caz its just so delicious! My favorites are always the kare-kare, kaldereta and menudo. I also love their buko pandan salad and leche flan for dessert! What makes our experience better is the welcoming staff, very accommodating and friendly! I can see them working so hard and always with a smile:). Reminds me of home! I also love the places design bringing the traditional filipino culture here in Canada:) I understand the building is quite old but i hope they can improve their ventilation if ever...
Delicious food. Small but cozy place with just a few tables inside and the food is amazing. No parking on the street though, but there are a few spots behind the building.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your great review! We will always try our best to provide delicious food and great service. Stay safe. Take care.

review_text: Excellent food service, best Filipino food you can get in Vancouver with so many options and an accurate taste from home. You can tell they re authentic. High recommend this place
response_from_owner_text: Fantastic! Were absolutely ecstatic to hear this! We heavily appreciate your review and were so glad you had a pleasant experience at Plato, take care and hope to see you again!

review_text: Its the best Filipino food in town with delicious dishes and great people as well. Would highly recommend to anyone who wants to try some real authentic Filipino food.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Joshua. One thing that we could be  really proud of is our authentic taste! Take care and see you again soon =)

review_text: Tried the crispy Lugaw with pork. Absolutely delicious and savory with balanced spices.
The food here is really good and the people here are really friendly!! I love their beef caldereta, it definitely hits the spot. I really recommend this place!
response_from_owner_text: Erika, we really appreciate your wonderful feedback and recommendation! Take great care and were very glad you enjoyed! See you again soon =)

review_text: Awesome little restaurant! The prices are great. You can get rice and two dishes for $8. The service was very friendly
My friend told me to try this place out and im definitely going back. Food was great and owners are very friendly. Yummy yummy. :)
response_from_owner_text: Hey Justin! Excellent! Thank you so much for taking the time to share such a wonderful review, take care :) see you again soon.

review_text: I rate Plato Filipino the best Palabok  ..Dinuguan bc of the big meat chunks and calderetta on the block! So yummy
Definitely recommend this place. Food is good and staff are friendly. Been there many times now. We love this place on our first visit and we even love more and more!
the food was so good that Im never eating at pampanga ever again Plato Filipino on top After eating their food I was moving real shiesty
response_from_owner_text: Hi Rion, thank you for appreciating our food! Our Chef is making sure that youre getting the best and authentic Filipino food in B.C. We hope to see you again soon! Take care.

review_text: Amazing food and great customer service! Very friendly and professional staff. Thank you!
Really great filipino food, absolutely love and recommend to everyone especially to those who want actual authentic filipino cuisine.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Jade! Were incredibly glad you enjoyed your experience with Plato Filipino, take great care and we hope to see you again :)

review_text: Amazing food and excellent customer service. Really makes me feel like I m back home with my Kuya s and Ate s.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Matthew! You will always have Kuya and Ate in Plato FIlipino! See you and take care =)

review_text: Great food, fantastic service, amazing price. Really, what else can you ask :)
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so so much for appreciating our dishes Mr. Souza! We are so glad that you enjoyed it. See you again and thank you for your support in small business like Plato. Stay well.

review_text: The fabulous food had me josliding all over the place. After finishing triumphantly I woo walked humbly out.
response_from_owner_text: HI Josh, were so glad that you really love Plato Filipinos food. We hope to see you again. Take care.

review_text: Our new go to place for Filipino food. They were so nice and the prices are reasonable.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Bryan for visiting us! Reviews like this inspires us to serve your better. See you again soon. Take care and God bless.

review_text: The food is amazing. Their Liempo and Sinigang was really good. Great service and at a great price
Good portion and very nice food quality. The price isnt too bad either.
food is very yummy!!! Rion served me and was a great waiter.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you RM! Our pleasure to have you. Stay safe and see you again soon.

review_text: food was peng. If you order enough, rion will give you halo halo for free! much love kuya rion!
The food is great, always hits the spot when I go there!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Jay for the 5- star rating! We will continue to give you the best! Keep safe.

review_text: Absolutely amazing... eating here makes my feel like i m in the Philippines again.
response_from_owner_text: We always have to keep the nostalgic feel of the place and were glad that we achieved it! Stay safe.

review_text: Pinoy comfort food. Great combo value. The turon is a must-buy.
Good food, reasonable prices and very friendly service.
response_from_owner_text: Hello Ramos Wong, thank you so much! We hope that you will continue to support us esp during this time. You take care and stay safe.

review_text: This is my favorite Filipino restaurant! My go-to for a kare kare fix. The people here are very friendly as well.
Consistent and reasonable price. Owner and staffs are friendly. I highly recommend this place.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Ms. Mercedes, we would love to see you again soonest. Take care and stay safe!

review_text: Staff are very friendly and attentive.
I enjoy eating at this place. They have a lot of different dish .
Food reminded me of home, and the workers are so comfy! Will come here much more often!
Very Good   Food and Friendly staff.
Great filipino food. Portions are great and the selection is wide.
Good value for money, delicious food, friendly and attentive staff.
Love every bite
One of the best Filipino resto in town!
response_from_owner_text: Hi Apot Lee, wow! Thank you so much for appreciating us so well. Take care and stay safe.

review_text: Great food and nice service.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mr. Rod for the very inspiring review and giving us 5-stars. We will continue our efforts to serve you better. Take care and stay safe.

review_text: Great food great staff
Suit on a budget
Excellent Food and Service!
response_from_owner_text: Hi Mateo, thank you for appreciating our service and loving our food! Keep safe. See you again!

review_text: Delicious food as always!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Ms. Hanya for visitung us. Appreciate those insipring words. Take care and stay safe.

review_text: Good food

review_text: Great place to grab a bite

review_text: Good food, good service

review_text: Pretty good food
best filipino food ever
response_from_owner_text: Wow! So glad you really love Plato Filipinos food! Thank you so so much! We hope to have you again soonest. Take care and stay safe.

review_text: My favorite Filipino turo-turo place! They also have fried spring rolls!
response_from_owner_text: Hi Mr. Andy, thank you for having Plato again. These words will serve as our inspiration to serve you better. Take care and stay safe
review_translated_text: My favorite Filipino turo-turo place! They also have pritong lumpiang gulay!

review_text: Tasty dinuguan, beef mechado and pork rice porridge
review_translated_text: Tasty dinuguan, beef mechado and sinigang na baboy

review_text: Why do I give In-Motion five stars? Because that s the level of service they give me. I know there are other rival background agencies but for me personally they have been amazing. I was lucky enough to get a meeting right away and have been in the union since 2004 but that doesn t mean it s easy to get booked. Chelsea James and Jade have literally gone beyond the call of duty to get me booked. As a visible minority there are fewer parts but I ve been working steady with them since day one of joining them,  and won t ever change agents. Thanks guys! I appreciate how hard you work for me.

Love In Motion! I have always appreciated how hard they work for me. ( Note:Getting work on Background isnt just about your agency getting you work. The level of professionalism on set you provide is key to getting more jobs. Having a great agent is important but you have to be great too.)
In motion is amazing for background performers.  The staff is incredibly nice and helpful, they work hard to find me jobs!  I have no complaints at all.
There Genuine People ,they have been around a long time and showed kene interest  in me and I felt  recognized ,and they made me feel  very comfortable in doing  business with them . 1st Class
Very nice staff and professional. They get work for you , thanks to In Motion Talent my daughter loves to go work as a background performer. ;)
Great staff.  Well organized never had an issue with them.  They work hard for you.  Everyone is respectful and super awesome.
Professional Excellence! Highly Respected Professional Agency. 5 Stars  The Best!
In motion is a great agency and are amazing at getting you work!
In-motion seems to care about their clients, and you recieve calls for work when theres work available.
I was represented here and I have nothing but good things to say about my friend, James Strand.
Top notch people! Definitely recommended!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Jesse! We really enjoy working with you!

review_text: Wierd office spot but nice people
Great staff very informative and friendly
Great people to work with
Great Agency. Not the best at communicating but they are great at getting you work. Really nice people. The only negative thing I have had to say is the communication part.

The people in this agency are RUDE! It is very clear they care about making money out of you, but they are definitely ok with you working in the worst work conditions! I just moved to Hollywood North and you can see that the agents there really do care! (Also, if you want to work constantly and become a full-time extra, INMOTION is not the right place!) If you are new to the industry I would HIGHLY recommend to look for other agencies! Best of luck

This agency is a joke. One of the agents, J, is incredibly rude. I had to cancel a booking because I was sick and I was threatened by her. I was told that if I wasn t going to show up on set I would have not worked anymore. You know what?? BYE FELICIA. You will not make any money through me!
Communication skills? Zero. It is hard to get clear and upfront informations from them. Not happy :(
I do not recommend this agency .

Ive been going to see Wendy for over 10 years. Shes the best hair dresser in this city, in my opinion. I enjoy the ambience at  In Moda Hair Salon, where Im greeted with a smile and fresh coffee     I was last there around Christmas time, and of course Wendy exceeded my expectations....always a professional
Loved Wendy and my new hair colour! She does perfect balayage!
Great prices great people great location
Excellent!!

Had a walk-in haircut. Not a bad place. There were Spanish and Cantonese stylists. The people there were nice. Not sure why there were rags infront of the door upon entering, but might look cleaner if it wasnt there/not a tripping hazard. I had Helen, she was from Taiwan and spoke Mandarin/Taiwanese. She was nice and took her time with my hair. Had an elongated cut for $18. She tried to sell hair streaks but I dont dye my hair.
Wendy is a delightful person and excellent hair dresser!* Muchas Gracias
Nice one
Wendy is very unprofessional she doesnt keep her appointments.  And the place is dirty, dont recommend this place.

It is the worst experience I have ever had in my life.  The barber who is there has no idea what he is doing, he is not a professional and an amateur barber.  They left me the cut in the middle because I wasnt able to finish it.  terrible service

Great experience, and definitely will use again! Kevin was able to come by today on very short notice.  He installed my dishwasher and garburator in about 1-2 hours time. He was very friendly, knowledgeable and both items are currently functioning perfectly. The price was very fair for both parties and I am am very happy with the whole experience. I would recommend Kevin to anyone looking for a residential plumbing services. Service: Garbage disposal installation
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Brandon, we are glad to hear your appliances are in proper working function and and you had a great experience with our technician Kevin today. We appreciate you for taking time to leave us a review. Have a good day! Pipeworth Plumbing Inc. 604-724-8529

review_text: Kevin was prompt in replying and was able to come out quickly for a piece of old school pipe that was leaking and had to be replaced. He was not only professional and efficient but personable and communicated well along the way. 100% will recommend to anyone needing service! Service: Plumbing pipe repair
Kevin came and replaced our horrible old hose bibs at our house and they work great now! Very quick and responsive. Would consider using him again for our next plumbing needs!

place_name: Sunrise In-Home Multiage Child Care Inc.
review_text: Ravi is a very caring and dedicated childcare provider.  Our son started with her in August 2022 and the transition from mommy care into Ravi s care was difficult, but with her loving nature and gentle way with him, he settled in and loves to go see  teacher Ravi  through the week.  Her daycare is tidy and thoroughly cleaned multiple times a day.  I cannot say enough good things about Ravi.  She s absolutely wonderful.

place_name: Sunrise In-Home Multiage Child Care Inc.
review_text: I have worked with Ravi for three years.  She has made great relationships with both children and families.  Ravi is an amazing person with such positive energy.  She is very dedicated, loving, caring and passionate towards children.

place_name: Sunrise In-Home Multiage Child Care Inc.
review_text: Ravi is the most personable caring respectful co worker I ve ever had. Her centre is beautiful and centrally located! I would recommend Ravi and her gorgeous centre to anyone I know looking for quality care.

review_text: Great daycare, management and teacher. Communication is also quick and we receive daily photos and updates.

place_name: Baby Shark in home multi age daycare
review_text: We have had both of our sons at Baby Shark In-Home Multi-Age Daycare. Our eldest son was there for four years and just left for kindergarten and our youngest is still there. Arzoo has been such a gift for our family. Our boys have received so much love, care, and learning. Arzoo fills their days with activities and art and makes sure that they play outside every day. They never want to leave when I pick them up! We are so lucky that Arzoo chose us. She and her daycare are just the best!
